name: Holiday Harry
summary: He’s evil on a shelf… Holiday horror creeps into your home, and he’s waiting right above your fireplace.

name: Hobo Life: Greg's Christmas
summary: Someone has stolen all the crack in the city, so you team up with the Brick Guy and try to find a way to bring happiness and crack across the city once more.

name: Horny Elves and a Moral Orc
summary: ased on a 4-panel comic by Tomokichi about the only suvivor of the orc tribe and a pervert elf who gets aroused by the orc.

name: Hole in Won
summary: Create the golf course by laying down tiles in the correct order. Play 100 handcrafted levels, create your own, or check out others in the Arcade.

name: Hot Air
summary: Use your fan to blow a balloon safely through each trap filled environment.

name: How the Cossacks searched for Mona Lisa
summary: A Ukrainian point & click adventure game. It is based on cartoons made in the USSR at the KievNauchFilm film studio by director Vladimir Dakhno.

name: HotCarts
summary:
HotCarts is a 1-player go-kart racing game for Macintosh.

The player races against three other opponents on a track. Split screen allows for 2-player games. There is a track editing program for creating custom tracks.

name: Hot Shots Golf: World Invitational
summary:
The tenth game in the Everybody's Golf series.
It is also the fourth game titled Everybody's Golf in Europe.

name: Horror
summary: Horror is a test of your logic in the face of primal fear. You are unarmed. You are vulnerable. All you have is a flashlight with a dying battery and your intellect.

name: Home Sweet Homecoming
summary:
Ryoutarou Shinozaki has been forced to live abroad for most of his life due to his parents’ work, but he's kept in touch with his childhood friend Tooru Hanazono—if only to gripe.

With Ryoutarou unable to overcome the language barrier overseas, and his yearning for his native country of Japan growing more with every passing day, Tooru sympathizes with his old pal enough to ask his parents if they’d let Ryoutarou come stay with them in Japan...
And after talking it over with Ryoutarou’s parents, they’ve agreed to let him move in! Not only is Ryoutarou thrilled to finally return home... but perhaps he’ll even find love?!

name: HoPiKo
summary: HoPiKo is an intense speed run platformer where you get to save gaming. Jump from platform to platform avoiding death, exploiting shortcuts and ripping through 100s of hand-crafted levels, each one dropped into a 5-stage mini run designed to break your mind!

name: Horror Nightmare Collection
summary: The Horror Nightmare Collection is an anthology of retro-style horror games. Immerse yourself in unique stories, from eerie forest horrors to forsaken prison nightmares, pushing your nerves to the limit. Explore psychological and grotesque terrors in this dread-inducing assortment.

name: Hotdog Cart Simulator
summary: Hotdog Cart Simulator is a co-op cooking and business sim where you and up to 5 friends run your very own hotdog cart.

name: Home Sweet Gnome
summary: Play as Saga, a small gnome with big dreams, as she opens a Bed and Breakfast for creatures from Nordic folklore! Welcome guests, decorate rooms, explore the forest and make strange friends in this cozy, hand-painted adventure.

name: Homeless Experience Simulator
summary: You have nothing. Try to survive as a homeless person in the ruthless streets and pay back your debt. Will you escape the streets to live with honor and pride, or will you lose yourself along the way?

name: Hollow Knight Randomizer
summary: Welcome to Randomizer 4, the newest version of the Hollow Knight item and transition randomizer released for the Hollow Knight 1.5 update.

name: Hot Wheels: Hot Rod Customization Pack
summary: Fanatics of the World of Customs rejoice! This Pack is dedicated to the iconic Hot Rods! Bring the vintage culture of the Garage directly into your Basement and customize environment and Unleashed Profile with themed graphics!

name: Home for Friends: Beloved Pets Collector's Edition
summary: Rescue adorable pets, solve puzzles, and build the perfect sanctuary in this cozy hidden object adventure!

name: Horror Storm
summary: Unearth chilling secrets in a town's underground hospital.

name: Horror Tales Eats The World
summary: Move silently through dark and desolate areas with a photorealistic bodycam perspective. Find the hidden tapes cassettes scattered across the map each one unveils a different paranormal horror story… stay silent, stay alive.

name: Hometopia
summary: Unleash your inner architect in Hometopia, the ultimate builder's game with limitless customization and high-fidelity graphics. Build your dream home or design entire neighborhoods, solo or with friends, bringing every creative detail to life exactly as you envision.

name: Homeless Simulator
summary: Homeless Simulator is a homeless person simulator. Homeless persons are those who find themselves living on the streets because of family conflicts, somebody’s fraud, loss of the job or health problems. They are those who need help.

name: Hot Pot Panic
summary:
A game about the struggle to have a conversation while also stuffing your face with food. 
 
You are at an all-you-can-eat hot pot restaurant. You're hungry, and you just want to do nothing but chow down. 
 
But you're here with a friend, and you don't want it to seem like you're only here to eat! 
 
Can you manage to keep up a conversation while cooking and filling your belly?

name: Holoemblem: The Search for Seiso
summary:
HoloEmblem: The Search for Seiso is a Hololive fan game and rom hack of Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones made with FEBuilder.

The game has 56 playable characters across 40 chapters, 10 are optional, in a unique story with in-game cutscenes.

name: Hopzi
summary: Hopzi is a colorful and fun 4-player multiplayer platform game where cute aliens race through crazy obstacle parkours. Be the fastest, leave your opponents behind, and prove that you are the true Hopzi Champion!

name: Host
summary: When your spacecraft crashes on an unknown planet, you navigate your way through its dark and puzzling corridors. Using only your hands and your wits, will you be able to solve its rooms and explore what's beyond?

name: Hollow Hometown
summary:
When your father calls you frightened, telling you that strange things are happening in your hometown, you decide to return to investigate.

People are no longer themselves. They fade away. They behave strangely: blank stares, icy smiles, emotionless voices.

And when your father also disappears, you realize you have no choice. You have to act.

Something is happening.

And you may be the only one really ready to deal with it.

Or die in the attempt.

The alien invasion on Italian soil is something no one expected. But you can still do something about it!

This game was made for the "SPAGHETTI INVASION GAME JAM 2025"

name: Holy Breaker! The Witch Betrayed Blue Moon Wicca
summary: Hinoue Itaru's visual novel project, with Kashida Leo as the scenario writer. A low-priced visual novel that was initially sold at Comiket 87.

name: Hope Harrison
summary: Hope Harrison takes a twist on the survival horror genre and remixes it with Hand Crafted RNG, Nightmarish Monsters and Permadeath. Can you find hope?

name: Hounimal
summary: Hounimal is a roguelite command battle RPG where you journey with Hounimal, a reliable companion and your home. Place colorful and powerful furniture to build the best Hounimal!

name: Home Is Where Chip Is
summary:
Feed yourself with chips.

Feel like home.

name: Homeworld Defense
summary: Homeword defense is a strategic game in which you will protect your planets from the waves of asteroids, find out why they appear and save your world from the threat once and for all. To protect the world, you will have to use weapons that asteroids can help you discover.

name: Horus Idle
summary: Horus IDLE is an IDLE rpg where you see similar scenarios but with a differnt approach. Horus IDLE has only one mission type and one Enemy Type. Horus IDLE was an attempt to pick what I liked from certain games. I also tried to shorten the game a little bit.

name: Hotel Giant 2
summary:
Following its international success, Hotel Giant is back and bigger than ever. In Hotel Giant 2 you will create the hotel of your dreams and manage prestigious locations around the world. Your goal is to attract as many guests as possible and make sure they are satisfied throughout their stay.

In order to meet your objective, you must develop a high standard of service, hire an excellent staff, decorate every room to your liking and never forget that the customer is always right. Exceed your guests’ expectations by improving their stay, earning more money and becoming the most successful hotel chain in the world.

Impressive realism: observe and influence the lives of your guests, meet their needs, face their wrath…

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Through the Petals in the Land of Repose
summary:
Version 3.2 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Castorice and Anaxa
• New Trailblaze Mission: "Through the Petals in the Land of Repose"
• New areas: Demigod Council and Dragonbone City
• Two-year anniversary celebrations and QoL features
• …and more!

name: Horny Sweeper
summary: Horny Sweeper is a turn-based strategy game. The player begins the game with Kazuya and Henry alone, but afterwards more and more girls join the party. Most of the battles are against government parties, which consist of various character classes (soldiers, mages, robots, etc.). The player's party also acquires different talents over the course of the game: a healer, a shotgun-wielding character, etc. When characters attack each other, an animated sequence is displayed.

name: Hologuard
summary: Hello there! Sorry for the rush, but could you start tomorrow? Don’t worry—think of the details as “on-the-job training.” You did study the materials I gave you in advance... right?

name: Hollow Sorrow
summary: Hollow Sorrow is a dark yet heartwarming 2D exploration adventure game where you confront your lost past.

name: Hooters Road Trip
summary:
Fast cars, an open highway, and young women - Hooters Road Trip calls out to its target audience by its title alone. Players choose one of several classically styled muscle cars and hot rods to drive in freewheelin' races across the good ol' U. S. of A. Winners receive the singular reward of a chance to "hang out" with attractive Hooters Girls waitress characters, known to patrons of the owl-mascotted restaurant chain for their friendly service and distinguishingly informal "short shorts and short shirt" uniforms.

The game features well over a dozen different automobiles, though many of these must be "unlocked" by skillful play. Races take place across the country in such fair weather locations as Florida and California. In the words of the restaurant's own slogan, "Delightfully Tacky, Yet Unrefined."

name: Honkai: Nexus Anima
summary: Honkai: Nexus Anima is a brand-new creature-collector adventure strategy game and the latest installment in the Honkai series. You’ll take on the role of a plane-hopping traveler who has escaped captivity, forging deep bonds with mysterious creatures in a new world, battling through thrilling encounters, and uncovering the truths buried within your past.

name: Hotseat Wagons 2: Level Pack
summary: 65+ new levels to all modes and worlds.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Woven from Last Snow
summary:
Version 6.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Dreamweaver & Terminal Aide 0017
• New Story Chapter XXXVII: Of Salt, Snow, and Sand
• New Featured Event: TeRiRi's Magical Quest
• ...and more!

name: Horizon V
summary: While on a routine patrol of one of the five planetoid outposts of the Galactic Federation, you are set upon by angry G-bellians who believe you have kidnapped one of their most prized performers, Paulette the G-belly dancer. Before you are able to explain your innocence, the G-bellians attack and you are forced to defend your planetoid. Using radar and plasma weapons you destroy first the ships and then the G-bellians themselves before you run out of fuel. As you make a run for fuel, some of the G-bellians follow you into the time warp. But before you can get to your fuel you have to destroy the oncoming G-bellians. Finally you reach the fuel dump and lock into the center of the fuel target... then onto the next planetoid...

name: Home Safety Hotline: Seasonal Worker
summary: It's 1996, and there's only three days left until Christmas. Rebecca, a yearly seasonal employee at HSH, has been brought back to help answer the helplines during this busy (and deadly) time of the year. Featuring the talents of Trevor Henderson, Longmont Potion Castle and more!

name: How to Bathe Your Cat: Drawing
summary: It is well known that cats aren' t really fond of water, but, as pet owners, we know that sometimes a good bath is welcome. Draw and use bombs to channel the water and clean your cat!

name: Hole Digging Simulator
summary: Dig Your Way Through History, Mystery, and Adventure!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Batman Expansion
summary: Batman fans - one and all - cannot miss this expansion dedicated to the Dark Knight, which puts you among the criminals and heroes of Gotham City. These themed vehicles and new track environment are worthy of the battle between good and evil!

name: Honey Peach Clicker
summary: Honey Peach Clicker is a Clicker game, which you can keep click the honey peach to Relieves stress. And also, Honey Peach Coin (HPC) will drop after a period of time while the game runing. HPC can be used to exchange special items to Enrich your community inventory collection!

name: Hottaaman no Chisoko Tanken
summary:
Players get to dig up dirt beneath the surface, find keys behind four doors, and then find the door to the next level. The most obvious game to compare it to is Dig Dug, but without the boulders and with various devices like teleporting doors, speed, dynamite, and a wet suit. There are 15 levels in the entire game; which repeat themselves after the 15th level is finished.

Lava can spew out at a vertical direction towards the player and kill him; it does not reset itself even after the players loses a life (but it does reset itself after a game over) Passwords are activated by pressing a certain button combination on the password screen. Several passwords results in cheat codes that does certain things; such as deactivating the lava in all levels of the game.

Certain type of blocks are worth different points once they are dug up; ranging from common dirt to destructible blocks. The game features an instant death clause where players die in a single hit. Killed enemies reappear at the same location where they were killed the first time.

name: Horses of Gavarnie
summary: Horses of Gavarnie is set in a fantasy world inspired by the Pyrenees, you must care for your horses, build a community, and adapt to industrialization. Discover and create new horse breeds, lead a second horse by your side as you ride, and help both horses and humans find their perfect match.

name: Hole io & Candivity
summary: Here's the ultimate arcade bundle you've been waiting for! Grow & merge solo or with friends in multiplayer mode!

name: Honey Bee With Guns
summary: Your main mission is to explore a vibrant and lively scenario filled with beautiful flowers. As a skillful bee, your goal is to collect the nectar from these flowers. But wait, there must be more to it, right?

name: Hockey Shooter VR
summary: Have you ever dreamed of being alone in a hockey stadium? Is the rink just yours for unlimited fun and practice? Put on your VR headset and step into a virtual reality, where the new Hockey Shooter VR game gives you the chance to try yourself.

name: Hoshi no Oujo: Uchuu Ishiki ni Mezameta Yoshitsune
summary:
Her brother Shanaou was killed by a member of the Heike clan.
For vengeance and to restore the Minamoto clan, the protagonist Sakurako vows to destroy all the Heike.
Introducing herself as Shanaou in place of her late brother, along with her childhood friend Kisanta she goes off to Kurama Temple for training.

One day a merchant named Kichiji appeared in front of them.
He had been told to come and pick them up by order of Fujiwara no Hidehara.
In order to defeat the Heike, they couldn't afford to stay at this tranquil temple any longer...
So Sakurako decided that they should go to Oushuu Hiraizumi where Fujiwara no Hidehara was waiting.

Hiraizumi where Hidehara ruled was a peaceful land that had no relation to war.
There the protagonist trained her sword arm in the dojo of the famed teacher Satou Tsugunobu.

However, Kichiji brought news that would smash that peace.
Sakurako's big brother Minamoto no Yoritomo, was raising an army to defeat the Heike.
She wanted to run to her brother's side immediately, but as she was now she was powerless.

Once again she went to the capital. To find a man whose name reached even Hiraizumi, the "Demon of Gojou", and become his retainer.

She advances deeply and quietly into an entangled destiny like many heroes before her.

name: Hoshizora no Memoria -Eternal Heart-
summary:
The fandisc for Hoshizora no Memoria. 
 
It contains addition story routes as a sequel to complete the Yume and Mare routes of Hoshizora no Memoria, as well as an additional side story for the other heroines of the game. 
 
The HD rerelease of Hoshizora no Memoria includes this fan-disc.

name: Hospital Manager
summary:
Experience something novel, bursting with extraordinary phenomena and strange situations in your hospital! Only you have the power to make the best decisions and to make your hospital the most popular one! But beware: Several events will add some spice to your life!
Embark on the career of your life!

name: How To Build A Snowman
summary: Build a snowman following the instructions your grandpa told you once, and watch how a Christmas miracle does it´s magic this winter! Surely nothing wrong could happen so close to holidays...

name: HooperVania
summary: Welcome to HooperVania, a free and non-profit French fan game celebrating Castlevania, the French videomaker Hooper, his community, and video games as a whole! Navigate through various stages using the famous Vampire Killer to defeat numerous enemies, and large bosses and ultimately vanquish Dracula himself!

name: Hometown Story
summary: Originally announced as Project Happiness, HomeTown Story is a simulation game from Harvest Moon creator Yasuhiro Wada about a shopkeeper taking over their grandmother's shop.

name: HolyHunt
summary:
HolyHunt is a roguelike shooter game that unites the nostalgic and fun 8-bit aesthetic with modern and complex shooting mechanics.

Make your way into the church hall to shoot and dash through different species of demons and bosses with unique mechanics that keep challenging your abilities each run.

Buy improvements and different bullets suited to your enemy's weakness and receive blessings from angels as you keep fighting to get even stronger. Trust in your faith and keep shooting to save the world from the doomsday prophecy.

name: House Mansion Flipper
summary: Rebuild, redesign and make your dream homes!

name: Hong Gildong-jeon
summary:
A+'s development debut was at times hailed as the first Korean RPG, during the temporal collective amnesia regarding the 80s home computer generation. In more recent times, this claim had to be corrected to "first Korean colored RPG for MS-DOS PCs", which sounds much less impressive. However, it can also be labeled as the first to follow the JRPG route a la Dragon Quest, because previous games all either stemmed from Western influences or were action RPGs. 
 
As one of the many games based on the story of Hong Gildong and thanks to its screentexts kept completely in Han'geul (it even sacrificed the full VGA color palette for a higher resolution to make it more readable, though everything other than the text was just upscaled) in a time when even the wave of Taiwan-localizations had just started to catch some current, it caught a bit of attention. A+ sold 7,000 copies of the game3, which wasn't that bad for a Korean game in 1993, but even then most reviews weren't that favorable because of a number of flaws. 
 
First and foremost stands the obfuscated design, that often leaves players not knowing what they are even expected to do. Then there's the overly simple and boring combat system, especially due to the lack of a party, which really limits the tactical depth. The rest is done by a fair share of bugs and glitches, as well as some more incomprehensible decisions like having an option to throw away items permanently while pretty much everything picked up except weapons and armor is quest-related.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Annals of Pinecany's Mappou Age
summary:
Version 2.6 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New character: Rappa
• New area: Penacony Paperfold University College
• New Trailblaze Continuance: Banana Outrage: Battles Without Ninja and Humanity
• …and more!

name: Hogwarts Legacy: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
Hogwarts Legacy is an immersive, open-world action RPG set in the world first introduced in the Harry Potter books. Now you can take control of the action and be at the center of your own adventure in the wizarding world.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- 72 Hours Early Access
- The Dark Arts Pack
- Onyx Hippogriff Mount
- Dark Arts Garrison Hat
- Both generations of the game (PS4 & PS5, Xbox One & Xbox Series X|S)

name: Hope is Gone
summary: A retro-style first-person horror game set in a dark, decaying parallel dimension where people from our world are not welcome.

name: Howlville: The Dark Past
summary: Many years ago an artifact was found in one of the mines near the small town of Howlville. The government asked scientists to examine it. Dr. Joseph was one of those scientists. Strange events began to happen in the underground lab, and something went wrong, causing a strong earthquake. The experiment was halted and classified, while the territory of the town was closed. Nobody knew what had happened to Joseph, and he was listed as a missing person. Fifteen years later his daughter Rachel is on the verge of solving the mystery, but somebody is doing everything possible to keep her from succeeding. Rachel is institutionalized in a secret mental hospital. She starts having horrible nightmares in which her father is pleading for her help and talking about a looming catastrophe. She manages to escape. Fleeing from the police, she reaches Howlville.

name: Horcrux College
summary: A Chinese Idle Gacha title. Gameplay consists of combat comprised of a team of five female units, where the player's only input is to manually activate their special skills (which can be done automatically too, if the option is enabled).

name: Hole of the Legend Monster - Monster Complete World Ver.2
summary:
Hole of the Legend Monster - Monster Complete World ver 2 is the sequel to Monster Complete World. The player controls a young boy (or a young girl) that have to start his journey buying a pet and after that he (or she) will explore the land in search of new pets. The battle system is like this: You order different kind of attacks to your pet and try to defeat the enemies and grab the items that you encounter during the game.

The player can also buy different kind of goods to cure his pets or improve them. There are also character profiles to watch.

name: Houkagou Colorful Step: Bunka-bu!
summary: Houkagou Colorful Step: Bunka-bu! is an otome game, developed and published by honeybee+, which was released in Japan in 2014.

name: Horny Blocks
summary: Horny Blocks is a classic block-breaking game with progressively challenging stages. Enjoy calm and relaxing moments as you break blocks and reveal beautiful girls.

name: Hover Rancher
summary: Pilot your hovercraft across a wild, untamed world in Hover Rancher—a point-and-click adventure packed with action minigames like aerial dogfights and snowboarding! Explore, collect, and deploy troops as you build your ranching empire from the skies.

name: Horror Inside the Forest
summary: Plunge into the captivating realm of "Horror Inside the Forest," an exhilarating game that tests your bravery. Explore a mysterious forest, confront supernatural forces, uncover secrets, survive the darkness, and escape its shadowy embrace in this immersive horror experience.

name: Hotwing Hellions
summary: Hotwing Hellions is a high-octane, 2 player couch competitive arcade shooter set in a lawless space-western universe. You and a rival bounty hunter race through hostile fleets, dodge swarms of bullets, and take down massive bosses as you blast through stages in split-screen chaos.

name: House of Snark 6-in-1 Bundle
summary:
This is a huge collection of games that includes 3 Collector's Editions and 3 steampunk games!

Snark Busters: Welcome to the Club
Snark Busters: High Society
Snark Busters: All Revved Up
House of 1000 Doors: Family Secrets Collector's Edition
House of 1000 Doors: Palm of Zoroaster Collector's Edition
House of 1000 Doors: Serpent Flame Collector's Edition

name: Hotel Espir
summary: Trapped overnight in a grand Alabama hotel built on plantation soil, you must outsmart the echo of a century-old killer. Use sound, stealth, and your instincts to survive the night and uncover the secret beneath Hotel Espir.

name: Hoonigans
summary:
Hoonigans is a top-down racing game which pays homage to the classic retro racers of yesteryear. The aim of the game is simple: prove your worth as you tackle the game's diverse array of tracks and challenges, and earn medals to unlock a host of characters, tracks, vehicles, and more!

The game comprises twelve challenging tracks, three playable characters, and a huge array of vehicles.

name: Hole
summary:
Hole is a text adventure for the Dragon 32/64.

The year is 2208, and the player is the sole crew member of a medium-range starship. Their mission is to visit a sector of space previously explored only by the starship Zelda. As the player enters the sector, they find themselves losing consiousness. The player now wakes up in some strange galaxy interlinked by a series of black holes. The player can travel to a series of different worlds useing their ship's navigation system. Each system has unique environmental conditions that require wearing specific suits.

There is a save and restore feature. All commands are via VERB NOUN entry.

name: Holy Breaker! 2 The Wish in the Night of the Star Talers
summary: Sequel to Holy Breaker.

name: House of the Dying Sun
summary: House of the Dying Sun is a tactical space shooter that puts you in the cockpit of the Empire's most deadly interceptor and in command of the Harbinger Fleet. Hunt down the enemies of your dying empire and upgrade your warships with new weapons and abilities earned during your campaign of terror.

name: Homecoming: My Monster-Hunter Girlfriend
summary: A short linear visual novel about love, mental-health and werewolves. Developed for Spooktober VN Jam 2023.

name: Hot Air Bloon
summary: Hot Air Bloon is an online flash game released by Ninja Kiwi in November 2008 that is currently available on the Flash Archive. It is a horizontal scroller where the player is tasked with navigating a monkey hanging from a damaged blimp through an ever-accelerating series of obstacles while popping as many bloons as possible.

name: Horse Racing
summary: Welcome to "Horse Racing," the thrilling game where two players compete to reach 1000 coins first. Place bets on your chosen horses, watch the race unfold, and strategically use your winnings to stay ahead.

name: Hotel Investigation 09
summary: An archival of a strange game that cropped up online. Play as Howlz, explore the hotel's halls, and rescue the captive under the building.

name: Horizon Chase Turbo
summary: Horizon Chase Turbo is a standalone homage to classic 16-bit racers that defined a generation of high-speed, frenetic arcade fun. The game ignites an instant blast of nostalgia with catchy contemporary chiptune music, split screen multiplayer and retro design with modern gameplay.

name: Home Is Where the Haunt Is
summary: A short game where you can haunt a couple who've moved into your home.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: AcceleRacers Free Pack 2
summary: Piledriver takes its name from a wrestling move that leaves no opponents a chance. Technetium, on the other hand, is a beauty shrouded in mystery. The only thing that won't be a mystery is that they will take you straight to the podium!

name: House of 1000 Doors: Evil Inside - Collector's Edition
summary:
Use the power of light to defeat a devastating darkness before it destroys mankind!
Locate cleverly hidden objects, solve cunning puzzles, and complete challenging mini-games as you cleanse everything the infection has touched!

Guide Emily as she explores three amazing worlds ruled by the members of the House, whom the darkness has possessed.
As you locate cleverly hidden objects, solve cunning puzzles, and complete challenging mini-games, you'll use the light within Emily to cleanse everything the infection has touched.
With stunning artwork and animation, cinematic quality cutscenes, and an original soundtrack that will immerse you in the thrills of a breathtaking adventure House of 1000 Doors: Evil Inside is an experience you'll never forget!

name: How Many Secrets Under Ceiling
summary: The first light novel-style immersive detective game's here! A dentist dead in a double-locked room seems like a suicide, but unexplained contradictions connect different truths. Each investigation and puzzles are up to you. But wait, what's wrong with this suspicious "assistant" following?!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - As Tomorrow Became Yesterday
summary:
Version 3.7 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New character: Cyrene
• New Trailblaze Mission: "As Tomorrow Became Yesterday"
• New areas: Great Tomb of the Nameless Titan and Ruins of Time
• New game mode: Currency Wars
• New events
• ...and more!

name: Hope Land
summary: Hope Land is a third person Survival multiplayer RPG set in the world after the ending of the world. Can you survive in the world that “Hope” is the only thing that keeps you alive?

name: How to Fool a Liar King: Remastered
summary: The cute fantasy visual novel, "How to Fool a Liar King" returns as a remastered version. Regina, a girl who loves cats, a bit forgetful but confident in her strength, suddenly appears inside a forest in Eroolia. Juli immediately finds her, but how did she get here?

name: Horse Life: Find Horses in Open World, Survive in Wild Nature as a Foal or Pony
summary: Play as a horse in this horse life simulation game. Survive among predators like wolves or bears. Find other horses to make a family. Explore an open world, reveal mysteries. Survival game in wild nature as a foal or a pony. Find secrets in this scandinavian inspired environment.

name: Hob: The Definitive Edition
summary: Hob: The Definitive Edition is an artfully crafted single-player adventure which sends gamers on a mysterious, breathtaking journey through the ruins of a lost civilization, where they will encounter strange creatures and unlock satisfying puzzles hidden throughout the world. The team at Panic Button has developed a version of the game for Nintendo Switch that provides adventurers with brand new ways to unravel the mysteries of Hob. This includes added camera controls, improvements to the game’s UI, a variety of quality-of-life improvements and new features only possible on the Nintendo Switch system, including HD rumble and touch screen functionality.

name: Honey Rose: Underdog Fighter Extraordinaire
summary: One student, two lives and six months to go. This year, Red must meet her idol Big Blue in the ring and make it to the top of the masked fighting tournament. Her dream will come true... as long as she also graduates!

name: How to Date a Magical Girl!
summary: You're invited to the elite academy for magical girls! Will you take the opportunity to make new friends? Learn magic? Or... Will you try and date a cute magical girl?

name: Hoosegow
summary: Hoosegow is a dark comedy about survival and adventure in a prison. At the beginning you get character, a crime and a prison sentence. Your task is to make the right choices to survive. Live by the thieves' laws, keep your shank with you and trust no one.

name: Ho Ho & Move
summary: Collect gifts, and plan the perfect path.

name: Horizon Drift Unlimited 2026
summary: Drive the horizon. Feel the freedom.

name: How to God
summary:
Are you a wise and benevolent leader, or a vengeful deity? Will you assist your villagers, or throw them into the sun?
In How to God, a sandbox God Simulation game, you alone choose how to shape your world. Command your followers, experiment with alchemy, build up your villages, and make the choice between good and evil. No judgement from us, of course - only you can choose How to God.

name: Hot Hands!
summary:
Hot Hands is the new fast and furious tip-of-the-tongue game from The Ellen DeGeneres Show and the makers of Heads Up!, combining all the fun of celebrities and pop-culture savvy with a big red button. 
 
Choose from a variety of categories, from TV Stars to Award Winners, and Musicians. See a picture of a celebrity on the screen, say their name, and press the red button, but hurry! You have only three seconds to identify who each celebrity is! If excitedly shouting celebrity names isn’t an option, you can also play in Multiple Choice and Initials modes. Think you’re hot? Challenge your friends to compete in Multiplayer mode. May the hottest hands win!

name: Horrher
summary: Horrher - a creepy exploration mystery game

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Song of Perdition
summary:
Version 5.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the Elysium Everlasting arc, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Disciplinary Perdition & Golden Diva
• New Open World: Elysium Everlasting
• New Story Chapter XXIX: Tochter aus Elysium
• New Featured Event: Shattered Dimensions
• ...and more!

name: Hong Kong Mahjong
summary: Hong Kong mahjong.

name: Horse Adventure: Tale of Etria
summary:
Horse Adventure: Tale of Etria is a free-to-play adventure game where players explore Etria to recover four stolen legendary horses, each tied to one of the world’s four regions (beach, mountains, canyons, forest) and their regional guardians.

Players complete 40+ challenges, 50 quests, and puzzle-piece hunts to customize their avatar and companion. A horse-upgrade system develops each horse’s personality as the story progresses.

name: Hokuto no Ken: Hokuto Shinken Denshousha no Michi
summary:
Hokuto no Ken: Hokuto Shinken Denshousha no Michi is an Action game, developed and published by Spike, which was released in Japan in 2008.

Advertised as a "vital point striking" action game, the player takes control of Kenshiro and must use the DS's touch screen to strike the vital points of adversaries to defeat them. The game's graphics consists entirely of colorized panel art from the original manga. The story mode consists of 22 chapters and adapts the manga's storyline from the beginning and up to the conclusion of Raoh saga. Other game modes includes a Battleship-style Versus Mode between two players, a Quiz mini-game, and a database of characters and famous lines from the manga. Akira Kamiya and Kenji Utsumi both return to provide their voices as Kenshiro and Raoh, with Shigeru Chiba as the narrator as well.

name: Hoshigami: Ruining Blue Earth
summary:
Utilizing a host of new gameplay elements, Hoshigami: Ruining Blue Earth expands upon the formula made popular by the cult classic Final Fantasy Tactics. The continent of Mardias serves as the game's primary world, and is divided into three kingdoms: Nightweld, the Valaimian Empire and Gerauld. The story begins as Valaimian troops advance into Nightweld, a peace-loving kingdom. Lacking the military might to repel the invaders from multiple fronts, Fazz - a mercenary and the game's protagonist - is hired to defend the Tower of Wind. Needless to say, this is just the beginning of a dire and perilous journey for the unwitting Fazz.

As you and your party trek across the world map, you'll take part in various battles. Ready-for-Action Points (RAP) determine which, as well as the number of actions that can be performed by a particular character. The more actions performed (and thus, more RAPs expended) during a turn, the longer you'll have to wait for your next chance to act. When attacking, an interactive gauge appears that does damage based upon where the slider is stopped. Stopping it at the very end will result in greater damage dealt to the enemy. Wait too long however and the slider will return to the beginning.

name: Homecoming: Kitaku
summary: Uncover the truth hidden in the darkness with your own hands.

name: Hotloop
summary: Hotloop is a dynamic mix of old school arcade and simulation. In the game you will meet a realistic system of spacecraft behavior and pricise orbital mechanics. You have to curb the force of gravity of the planets in order to repulse numerous enemies.

name: Horace Goes Skiing
summary:
In 1982 Tang also produced Horace Goes Skiing. In it, Horace must cross a dangerous road teeming with traffic to rent out a pair of skis, à la Frogger, get back over the road and successfully navigate a ski course.

This title is not a true sequel, as it does not follow on from an original story and is only similar in that it features the same character. Like Hungry Horace, this title was available on the ZX Spectrum, Commodore 64, and Dragon 32. As before, Sinclair distributed the Spectrum version, Melbourne House the Commodore 64 and Dragon 32 versions.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Starbound Painter
summary:
Version 7.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of Part 1.5 of the main story, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Cosmic Expression (Griseo)
• New Story Chapter XLII: Earthbound Order
• New Featured Event: Starry Voyage: Strike Back!
• UI Overhaul
• ...and more!

name: Hoyle Card Games
summary: Hoyle Card Games is a Game Boy Color-only video game that was developed by Sandbox Studios and published by Sierra On-Line under their Sierra Attractions label.

name: Hockey League Simulator
summary:
Make the "Power Play" on and off the ice!

Experience the other side of Hockey, the side most people never see. Behind the scenes, where an elite few make the decisions that ultimately lead to victory or defeat. Enter the fast paced world of international sports management, where the movers and shakers spend millions to build their dream teams. Where an injury on the ice can create or destroy empires. Now you can be a player in the game behind the game. Arrange trades and close deals, find that hot new talent in the farm leagues and draft him up to the majors. Keep one eye on the competition and the other on the bottom line as you work to turn your team into an unstoppable juggernaut on the road to the cup!

Build accurate emulations of any team from any year and play the fantasy games that you've only dreamed of. Imagine, the 1970 Bruins versus the 1987 Oilers face to face in the most incredible play off series of all time! Or, build an invincible All Star Team and take on all challengers!

The choice is yours- this time you're in charge!

name: Hollowglass
summary: Try to survive in the desert for at least a few more moments and let neither thirst, nor jackals, nor death stop you...

name: Horde Arena
summary: Horde Arena is a third-person shooter roguelite where you survive endless enemy waves. Pick a character, upgrade your stats and weapons, and evolve to dominate the battlefield. Play solo or team up with up to four players in co-op mode.

name: Hot Shots Golf 2
summary:
Hot Shots Golf 2 is the sequel to PlayStation game Hot Shots Golf. While the sequel is in many respects similar to the original, it brings some improvements to the series.

Like the original there are several characters to choose from, and many more to be unlocked throughout the game. Each character has his or her own strengths and weaknesses, making character selection more than just choosing a skin. The character models themselves are of a more realistic style this time around, as opposed to the big-head anime style of the original Hot Shots Golf.

There are several different modes of play, from standards like stroke, match, and tournament, to the 'vs. mode', through which new characters can be unlocked. Gameplay itself is a version of the standard 'tap-tap-tap' variety used by the majority of golf games.

name: Holy Deadline
summary: Holy Deadline is a surreal, story-rich visual novel where you play as a demigod lawyer. You have one week to investigate the divine divorce of Adam and Eve! Flirt, drink, raise your stats and make bold choices in minigames and Heaven's drama.

name: Hour of Redemption
summary: A action adventure where every second counts. Slow time, fight your way through dungeons, and conquer the clock before it conquers you.

name: Hollow Knight
summary: Unofficial port of the hit game Hollow Knight for PlayStation Vita.

name: Horror Vacui
summary:
HORROR VACUI is an experimental video game by Christoph Frey, that deals with the subjectivity of the memory and takes place in the world of thought of a patient in a comatose condition. It was created in 2012.

The player can explore this world, that is represented by rooms and objects.
Found fragments of memory affect the content of the following fragments, making it necessary to play it more the one time.
There is no winning or loosing, no enemies.

name: Holding It
summary:
An exercise in patience.

Design, programming, and sound by Toby Alden

Art by Taylor Dow & Sam Alden

Writing by all three

name: HoloCall: Send Your Cheers!
summary: A rhythm music game where you press buttons while doing fan calls. Show your support for your favorite hololive idols by cheering with your voice!

name: Hope
summary: Help the protagonist escape from the inner world and make a choice.

name: Homing
summary: A sad, queer, narrative-focused epistolary game.

name: House of Necrosis
summary:
House of Necrosis is a Mystery Dungeon-style game inspired by Survival Horror and RPG classics of the 32bit era.

Survive the horrors of the mansion that changes every time you enter.

name: House Flipper VR
summary: Virtual makeovers were never more real! Thanks to the VR technology, you will be able to single-handedly take care of ruined properties, gaining your clients' appreciation and satisfaction from a job well done! Put on your goggles, take a firm grip on the controllers and become a master of renovation!

name: Hotel Dusk: Room 215
summary: Take control of an interactive mystery novel and discover the secrets of Hotel Dusk. Who is Kyle Hyde- and what really happened in Room 215? Take stylus in hand and navigate a tangled web of lies, betrayal, and murder to learn the answers.

name: Horror Night with Tung Tung Tung Sahur
summary: Horror Night with TUNG TUNG TUNG SAHUR Your car broke down. Middle of the forest. No signal. You spot a creepy mansion up the hill. You knock. No answer. Just as you turn to leave—CREAK—the door opens by itself.

name: Hopeguard
summary: Hopeguard is a third-person dark fantasy game about loss and acceptance. You have been chosen to eliminate the Dragon Queen, but the confrontation will not go as expected. Journey through caves, ruins, and forests to solve environmental puzzles and fulfill your quest -but with a new perspective.

name: Hoptale
summary: 《Hoptale》 is a casual and strategic Rougelite game that combines slot machines with combat. Players will use the slot machine to determine the character's next behavior, the damage caused to monsters, and the loot obtained!

name: Honeycomb Beat
summary: The first music-driven puzzle game for the Nintendo DS, Honeycomb Beat features intuitive touch screen gameplay and more than 200 unique puzzles to energize your mind. Solve each puzzle by touching on a Honeycomb tile, which will change the colors of the tiles around it. Line up tiles of the same color to eliminate them or create different shapes and patterns. Solve mind-bending challenges of increasing complexity in Puzzle Mode, or play through Evolution Mode where the board advances upwards and you have to eliminate lines before it's too late.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Flickers of a Spacetime Warp
summary:
Version 8.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter IX: If Destiny Concludes Today
• New Part 2 Open World: Dragon Ruins
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Planar Armament: Warped Spacetime (Helia)
• New Featured Event: Bon Voyage! Toward Blessings and Wishes!
• ...and more!

name: Homeseek
summary: Homeseek is a post-apocalyptic survival base builder placed at the beginning of the next century. There is almost nothing left of the Old World. Overpopulation, environmental exploitation, and complete disregard for nature resulted in the depletion of drinkable water by 2040. It took less than 15 years after that for the complete annihilation of our civilization. But a few lucky souls survived the destruction inside enormous bunkers. Now they have to get back to the surface and rebuild civilization.

name: House Flipper: Luxury DLC
summary:
No more small houses with dozens of little rooms - size is what really counts!
Glass roofs, plate glass windows for walls and a ceiling many feet above your head - this is how kings live!
Take run-down tenement houses and old industrial buildings - factories, large commercial buildings and warehouses - and turn them into luxury apartments.

name: Home Sports
summary:
Get ready to play, laugh, and move like never before! Step into a mixed-reality world with five dynamic sports that everyone can enjoy. Whether you’re hosting a friendly match or showing off your skills, Home Sports brings the action to life —all designed for social fun.

Pickleball - Our simplified rules make the game more intuitive than ever! Swing your paddle and try to outsmart your opponent without hitting the net.
Hockey - Experience what feels like a mix between ice hockey and air hockey with this original twist! Bounce the puck off the sides or go straight for the goal.
Bowling - It’s not how you bowl, it’s how you roll! Will you be able to make a perfect 300? Or will you become a gutterball guru?
⛳Mini Golf - Try to get as many hole-in-ones and birdies as possible in three different beautiful courses: classic, modern and nature.
Badminton - Play the fastest racket sport in the world for the first time in mixed reality!

Invite up to three friends to join you, locally or online, and compete in thrilling multiplayer action. Every sport adapts to your personal play space, making it easy to jump straight into the action. Whether you’re aiming for a hole-in-one in mini golf or defending the net in hockey, Home Sports is packed with endless entertainment, laughter, and competition.

Want to become the best of class? The game also features solo matches, drills and a career mode.

Experience your favorite sports like never before. Play today!

name: Hollowpath Chronicles
summary: Claimed by the Hallowpath, a living road between broken realms, you fight, bargain, and trespass under the gaze of unseen gods. Every kill, kindness, and lie rewrites how the path remembers you, opening new roads or marking the place you are buried.

name: Hotel Abyss
summary: Collect Coins and Items while Avoiding certain "Entities" while communicating with your team using Proximity voice chat.Save your coins and customize your character with it.

name: Hotel Transylvania: Scary-Tale Adventures
summary: Hotel Transylvania: Scary-Tale Adventures is a 3D platform adventure that will take players on a fairy tale journey, putting them in control of their favorite characters as the game re-imagines classic stories, such as “Little Red Riding Hood” and “The Emperor’s New Clothes.”

name: Hope: Unlived Life
summary: How to get out of a dull life? How to overcome your fear and become happy? HOPE: Unlived Life is a story about growing up, finding yourself and lost love in the scenery of Russian reality.

name: Hobo: Tough Life
summary: Hobo: Tough Life is a city survival RPG. You play as a homeless and your main goal is to survive. To do this you will have to deal with hunger, hostile environment, human unconcern and with forthcoming winter. Play with friends or with other players online and do whatever it takes to survive.

name: Horror Royale
summary: Horror Royale is a split-screen and online multiplayer psychological horror game that involves trying to escape a level as monsters try to hunt you down and kill you. With three different game modes and five different monsters, scream and cheer with your friends as you try to survive.

name: HoloVillage: Our Cozy Days
summary: Farm, fish, mine, craft, and decorate your home in this cozy multiplayer life sim. Venture into dungeons and take on bosses outside the village for some added excitement. Share relaxing and thrilling moments alike with hololive talents as you shape your countryside life.

name: HordeCore: Training Ground
summary: HordeCore is a kick-ass side-scrolling shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Play alone, or as a team - and destroy, survive, craft, and explore!

name: Horde: Zombie Outbreak
summary: Ever wanted to control a bloodthirsty horde of zombies and wreak havoc on cities around the world? Well now you can! In Horde: Zombie Outbreak the player assumes the role of the zombies and must overthrow the world by infecting the humans! Each person you infect will become part of your horde. As your horde grows stronger so to does the human resistance, the player must use abilities that are linked to certain zombie types to help them fight through the police, swat and army!

name: Homebody
summary: Homebody is a survival horror puzzle game about a group of friends haunted by memories of the past and hunted by a relentless killer. Move on or die trying.

name: How Heavy Are My Nuts?
summary: Do your Steam friends think you're too normal? Do you need a status that'll spice up their life? Introducing "How Heavy Are My Nuts?" The Game. Have the time of your life explaining this one to your father when he inevitably walks in on you playing it.

name: Hotel Dash: Suite Success Deluxe
summary:
Make a reservation for Hotel Dash: Suite Success Deluxe on your iPad! It’s all the fast-paced fun of Diner Dash, Cooking Dash and Wedding Dash with the added bonus of hotel drama and chaos.
An addicting combination of time management and strategy, Hotel Dash: Suite Success Deluxe has been specially enhanced for your iPad. Build a thriving hotel business by renovating and running hotels all over DinerTown. Within minutes, you’ll be directing the flow of guests with a few taps and slides of your fingers. Can you achieve 5-star status on every level to restore all of your VIP rooms?

name: Home Game 3
summary:
This adventure-RPG features a bleak world full of secrets within secrets, hectic real-time combat and a custom inventory system of curious items and combinations.

It is about the hermit living with girl.

Exist at home or traverse dangerous realms, seeking Truths and age...

name: How to Survive
summary:
You are shipwrecked on an isolated island, a desperate castaway in a total freakshow world. How will you survive?

Collect the pages of a Survival Guide and figure it out, of course! Find food, water, and shelter before you perish. Uh oh, is it getting dark? Figure out how to get through the night! While you’re at it, gather up some of this awesome stuff and piece together over 100 handmade weapons and tools—from shotguns to Molotov cocktails. Now you can defend yourself and your friends like a boss… but can you escape?

name: Hordes of Fate: A Hand of Fate Adventure
summary: Return to the world of Hand of Fate! Deckbuilding meets auto-shooter in this new title from the original creative team. Draw your cards and carve your way through hordes of lethal monsters. Unlock new heroes, upgrades and encounters, and stack your hand against the Dealer’s fiendish challenge decks.

name: Hot Swap Rave
summary:
Hot Swap Rave: a Village Discotheque Simulator is a musical game set in the mid nineties in a post-soviet village of Pupkovka. At his first shift as a DJ at a rusting culture house, our protagonist Pyotr finds himself in an unprecedented situation, which eventually puts the fate of the entire village on his shoulders. Will he survive this ordeal? It is for the player to find out.

Pyotr has to host 4 discotheques at once by switching between cassettes, CDs and vinyls. On this journey his guide is Borysych - an old culture house manager speaking to our protagonist via an intercom. Because all parties happen at once, Pyotr has very little time to switch between discs in order to accommodate all the crowds. That time becomes shorter the longer the night lasts.

name: House Flipper: Party Furniture Pack
summary:
Get ready for an absolute blast! This time of year, PARTY is all you need!
Jump into the newest furniture pack that will allow you to throw the wildest parties in the House Flipper Universe!

name: Horny Housewives
summary: Horny Housewives is an RPG game that allows you to play as a suburban housewife in a high-stakes world of betrayal, mystery, and adventure. Help attractive women in a suburban neighborhood with their daily tasks, solve puzzles, and make choices that will affect the story.

name: How to Live a Healthy Hentai Lifestyle!
summary:
Gotou Hajime has enrolled in Penile University, majoring in perversion in order to study and deepen his understanding of the art and eventually carry out research on the subject.

Due to Hajime’s chosen field of study, he has registered to live with the Maezono family – a family whose mother is the legendary pervert that prevented World War 3 with her sexual diplomacy!

name: Hopping Mappy
summary: The game brings back the characters from Mappy but it is not as effective; the reason for this is most likely because the player does not get any new weapons after each bonus round. The rounds do not get any more confusing because the cats move in preset patterns - and the main strategy that is used to get past them, is comprised of a difficult way to more or less stand still. There are a total of thirty-one distinct rounds that the player can continue through even if he runs out of lives

name: Homeworld: Remastered Collection
summary:
Homeworld Remastered Collection updates and introduces the landmark space strategy games to modern audiences. The collection includes Homeworld and Homeworld 2, painstakingly remastered by Gearbox in cooperation with key members of the original development team and members of the series’ passionate fan community. As a free bonus, this collection also includes the original versions of Homeworld and Homeworld 2 with compatibility updates, preserving the purest form of the original releases. Anyone who purchases Homeworld Remastered Collection will also receive free access to the Homeworld Remastered Steam Multiplayer Beta when the collection releases on February 25, 2015.

The Homeworld series has a long legacy and is regarded by many as one of the best strategy series of all time. Following its release in 1999 by publisher Sierra and developer Relic Entertainment, Homeworld received several Game of the Year awards and redefined the RTS genre. Its sequel, Homeworld 2, launched in 2003, and was similarly praised by critics for its innovative controls and changes to multiplayer. Brian Martel, Gearbox Software's Chief Creative Officer, has great love and respect for Relic's brilliant, fun and innovative franchise and personally spearheaded Gearbox Software’s acquisition of Homeworld from THQ in 2013.

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - The Rainbow Tack Set
summary: Discover 3 magnificent rainbow harnesses for your horses.

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - DLC Pack
summary:
In this pack, you will find:

The “Limited Digital Bonus” pack with:
An additional horse breed, "Irish Cob", to enrich your stable
3 splendid knight harnesses
3 new outfits for your avatar
An exclusive hairstyle for your avatar
The Unicorn Harness pack

The “Arabian Horse” pack, which includes:
An additional horse breed, “Arabian Horse,” to enrich your stable
3 new harnesses

The Foal Care Pack, which includes:

The possibility of having foals in the game
2 new “Cow-boy” outfits
The Rainbow Tack Set

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - Unicorn Tack Set
summary:
Add a touch of fantasy to your stable!

Discover 3 magnificent unicorn tack sets for your horses.

name: Hop Step Idol
summary: Hop Step Idol * is a otome game, published by Media Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1997 for the Sega Saturn.

name: Homeworld Mobile
summary:
Embark upon a galactic journey to settle in an unexplored galaxy in this online space strategy game that will require every bit of your wit. Build ships, establish bases, join a clan, engage in coop or solo strategic battles, and discover uncharted systems in this Homeworld-bound space adventure.

Battle strategy is key to victory. Command your faction’s fleet and immerse yourself in a dynamic, real time space battle. Take control of spaceship carriers, interceptors, and destroyers to outmaneuver opponents in exciting sci-fi gameplay. Employ strategic battle tactics to gain the upper hand and command your space team to victory.

name: Horroyale
summary: Horroyale is a multiplayer horror game where only one player can remain alive. The playing field is silent and in total darkness: the only thing that occasionally illuminates the field is the moonlight. To make the hunt more enjoyable, terrain has been made to look lifelike and realistic.

name: Hotel Transylvania 3: Monsters Overboard
summary: Dracula, Mavis and their monster friends are marooned on the mysterious Lost Islands – and only you, in command of lovable little creatures, the Impa, can save them! Explore the islands, discover new Impa abilities, and rescue Frankenstein, Murray and Wayne from fearsome enemies. But hurry – the Drac-Pack’s lives are at stake!

name: How to Sing to Open Your Heart
summary: "How to Sing to Open Your Heart" is a fully voiced romantic otome visual novel. Can the cat-eared princess' song rescue her people and find true love?

name: Honest Hearts Reborn
summary: A story overhaul mod for the Honest Hearts DLC, with a whole new story for Joshua Graham, the tribes, the Legion, and the New Canaanites. Fully-voiced with almost 30 completely new NPCs, deep moral choices, and a fresh take on the story of the Burned Man. Literary, intelligent, with plenty of explosions and gunslinging.

name: Houchou Shoujo Gensoukyoku
summary: Houchou Shoujo Gensoukyoku, commonly known as Yume Nikki Gensou among the western community, is a Metroidvania-style fangame made by Atelier Izumi (AKA Studio Izumi).

name: Hot Wheels: Battle Force 5
summary: Battle Force 5 is an elite team of teens whose mission is simple – to defend against the robotic armies of The Sark and the brutal and barbaric Vandals who are intent on invading Earth. Armed with 5 super-cool, ultra-fast, and battle-ready vehicles, team Battle Force 5 must race, smash, and bash these aliens in an effort to protect the fate of the Earth. Your mission is simple – defend the Earth from invading aliens with your battle-ready vehicle. Race, smash, and bash your way to victory. The fate of our planet hangs in the balance.

name: Hope
summary: Hope is a cinematic puzzle-adventure about a boy lost after a shipwreck. Explore a mysterious island, solve environmental puzzles, and survive against the odds - only to discover that escape isn’t what it seems.

name: How to Raise a Dragon
summary: In How to Raise a Dragon, players guide a dragon through its life phases, shaping its abilities and behavior.

name: Hohokum
summary:
Hohokum is a colorful exploration based adventure game. Players control a space worm, flying around rescuing people from their city under distress.

Hohokum is a collaboration between Honeyslug, an independent game developer based in North London, and Richard Hogg, an artist and designer. After launching as a web-based gaming experiment in 2010, Hohokum comes to PlayStation consoles now fully formed thanks to a collaboration with game design studios Honeyslug and SCE Studios Santa Monica, delivering the same unique exploration experience in a refined and expansive adventure waiting to be explored!

name: Horrified Hector!
summary: Horrified Hector! is a puzzle/exploration game for the Playdate, inspired by spooky kids cartoons and brain-scratching ice maze puzzles.

name: Hotseat Wagons 2: Space World
summary:
New models.
9 game mods (4 new).
37 new levels.
New world!

name: Hockey League Simulator II
summary:
Experience the other side of hockey, the side most people never see. After two years of additional work, Bethesda has managed to surpass the original Hockey League Simulator! Now, you can enter the fast-paced world of International Sports Management on a completely new level! Where the movers and shakers spend millions to build their dream teams and carry them through to the Stanley Cup! Where an injury or a bad decision can mean the difference between sweet success or bitter defeat! Enter the world of Hockey League Simulator 2! Now you can be the real power behind the game! Hockey League Simulator 2 makes it happen with more realism than ever before. Arrange trades and draft them up to the majors. Keep one eye on the competition and the other one on managing your team all the way to the top! Imagine pitting the 1992 Penguins against the 1970 Bruins for the most incredible Playoff Series of all time! Or build your own All-Star Dream Team and take on all challengers.

With Hockey League Simulator 2 it's up to you!

name: House Party: New Content Pack
summary: Expand the party with fresh clothing items, a short new storyline, and two new characters from the minds of the Eek! Games team. New clothes will be wearable on all NPCs, you can enjoy a themed side-story separate from the Original Story, and one male and one new female NPC will join the party!

name: Horror of the Deep
summary: Fallen into a giant old dungeon, unclear for any destiny, you have to descent deeper and deeper to a place, where even all cries will be silenced.​

name: Hollowspire
summary: a chill, clicker-inspired game where you dig through blocks of dirt and stone, craft, and upgrade your abilities — all in pursuit of reaching the depths and uncovering its mysteries.

name: House of Velez
summary:
House of Velez is a horror game based around stealth/puzzle elements. It emphasizes sneaking, running and hiding mechanics to surpass obstacles rather than combat.   
   
The game features a "Focus Mode" that allows you to see your pursuers' field of vision and hearing radius, while also monitoring your own noise levels.   
   
Another feature is "Heart Rate Suppression" that restricts movement, but allows you to become "invisible" when used effectively.   
   
House of Velez draws inspiration from titles like Haunting Ground and even film such as the 1980's Hellraiser.

name: Hoyle Casino
summary: Set in a virtual Las Vegas casino, players create profiles and are given a set amount of virtual money. A player can then visit any part of the virtual casino and wager their virtual money as they could in a real casino. The game offers instant access to the rules for each game, as well as real time tips and strategies as the player plays a game. Hoyle Casino features 25 default characters to choose from, or players can simply create their own unique custom character.

name: HoneySun
summary: HoneySun is a CASUAL FARMING and DATING SIMULATOR. Grow crops, fall in love with numerous amazing characters, and explore unique game mechanics in a vibrant SANDBOX OPEN WORLD!

name: Holy Night
summary: Holy Night is a bloodthirsty action-adventure metroidvania set in a haunted space cruise traveling to Mars. Explore, rescue, and survive, upgrading your unique combat skills and weapons. Kill hordes of vampires and monsters that stand between you and your family to celebrate Christmas on time.

name: Hope
summary: Hope is a Bitsy game about learning to rely on others and fighting against hopelessness, together.

name: Hot Action Pak
summary: Three Activision games on one Atari 2600 cartridge, bundled with a copy of River Raid.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Drumming in New Resolutions
summary:
Version 8.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter VII-EX: To None May God Pray
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Ba-Dum! Fiery Wishing Star (Kiana)
• New AstralOp: Theresa Apocalypse
• New Divine Key: Flawless Benediction
• New Featured Events: Make-A-Wish Fest! & Celebration Lobby 2025
• ...and more!

name: Hot Wheels: Extreme Racing
summary: Hot Wheels Extreme Racing is a racing game for the PlayStation, released in 2001. It features vehicles based on the Hot Wheels series of toys.

name: Homemade TCG
summary: Yugi-inspired card game -roguelike with an extra deck. Enemies use the same cards / rules as you. Reduce opponent's life from 20 to 0; by playing cards and attacking. Pick a card of 3-choices after each win. Use the deck-builder between games. A lot of unique cards, 5 floors, and the final boss.

name: Honekawa Marionette
summary: At an unknown corner, a marionette broken—— That was too sad and lonely, so I picked her up from the darkness.However, the marionette was severely damaged and difficult to repair.———"Let's make a new marionette." the puppeteer smiled. ————— What kind of marionette will be made this time?

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Moonshade Epic
summary:
Version 6.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the "The Day of Transcending Finality" arc, which includes:

name: Hotel Lust

name: Hog Heist

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Honda Modern Classics
summary: Enrich your collection with four iconic vehicles that come straight from the land of the Rising Sun! 1990 Honda Civic EF, 2018 Honda Civic Type R, 1985 Honda City Turbo II and 2022 Honda Super Cub bring the best of the Japanese scene to the track. As the name of the pack suggests, these modern vehicles from Honda have become instant classics. Lightweight and aerodynamic, perfect for drifting on the streets of Tokyo and on the tracks you’ll create thanks to powerful engines and extraordinary performance. Special mention for 2022 Honda Super Cub, proof that 4 wheels are not always needed to have fun on the track. Use its agility to weave through traffic and wheelie towards the finish line! Add Honda Modern Classics Pack to your collection!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Corvette Stingray Convertible 2014
summary: When you own a car like this you know you've really arrived ... on the top step of the podium. A convertible with an unmistakable design, as beautiful as it is fast. Feel cool with the hottest car around and unleash all its power!

name: Homerun Clash 2: Legends Derby
summary:
As the sequel to "Homerun Clash," the casual baseball game centered around home run derbies and downloaded 12 million times, "Homerun Clash 2" boasts a rich and diverse range of content, which includes features such as ranking systems that rank players from around the world, 1vs1 Match, 2vs2 Match, the Challenge Derby where the player must play against a pitching machine, and more.

The game also features legendary batters from four different countries where baseball is a popular sport as in-game characters: "Dae-ho Lee" from South Korea, "Albert Pujols" from the United States of America, "Michihiro Ogasawara" from Japan, and "Tai-shan Chang" from Taiwan. Not only do these baseball legends appear as in-game characters, but they are also featured in the story-driven "World Star" content, which has been designed to enhance the gameplay. Already people are quite interested in seeing home run derby matches being played featuring the legendary batters.

name: Horse Farm
summary: Create the ranch of your dreams, with cute horses, diverse buildings, amazing features and captivating quests. Download Horse Farm now and take care of your horses!

name: House Flipper: Farm Bundle
summary:
Renovate, decorate, and manage your dream home and farm in one exciting bundle!
House Flipper is a unique chance to become a one-man renovation crew. Buy, repair and remodel devastated houses. Give them a second life and sell them at a profit!

Farm DLC
Have you ever dreamed of becoming a happy owner of a prosperous farm, leading a peaceful life in harmony with nature? With the House Flipper – Farm DLC, your dreams will come true! Immerse yourself in the idyllic countryside, bask in its charm and deal with all the usual aspects of farm life. Enjoy a wide range of new crop plant species and grow them. An abundant harvest will help you take care of your animals, such as sheep, cows, horses or alpacas… you can choose your companions from many breeds!

name: How Would You Survive?
summary:
How Would You Survive? is an education program based on the book series of the same name. It covers Egyptians, Aztecs and Vikings. The premise is that it shows children the ropes of the people's lives in those time periods in case the player should become one of them. The program mostly consists of interconnected, narrated slides which contain explanations about the subject in question.

It also contains a quiz. Here the player chooses a difficulty level (which only changes the number of wrong guesses before the game is over) and is presented with 10 multiple-choice questions. The goal is to answer all questions before all wrong guesses are spent. When a wrong answer was chosen, the game creates a link to the appropriate slide. After reading it, the player can switch to the quiz and try again. Normally the quiz covers only one time period except for the masterquiz option which is about all three periods.

name: How Buddy's Parents Met
summary: Discover a romance through the eyes of the cat Buddy in this minimalist jigsaw puzzle game, told in 6 scenes illustrated by Katia Numakura with her lovely art style.

name: Hoosegow: Prison Boss
summary: Choice-based prison guard sim. Manage staff, stop riots, survive the shift.

name: Home Designer: Makeover Blast
summary: Help your clients in this match3 game turn their drab living space into fantastic rooms! Solve matching puzzles to design and decorate the perfect home with beautiful furniture!

name: Hotel City
summary: Hotel City was a Facebook game about building and decorating your very own hotel.

name: Hoser
summary:
An adaptation of Snake where your multi-segmented character represents a garden hose: move it about in four directions across the playfield, collect targets to proceed, and make sure to avoid your own tail and other barriers.

All targets ("faucets") shown on screen must be picked up before the timer runs out. In earlier levels you only get one at a time, but this later increases to two and three; if you take too long, a new set appears and your hose grows longer as punishment. Beat the clock three times to proceed to the next "yard", with an extra life ("spare hose") for your trouble. Later levels also set the "pressure valve" higher, which increases the timer's speed.

Two different level sets are included: in the "amateur" levels, movement controls behave as you'd expect, and you turn at right angles; the "professional" levels feature a pseudo-isometric scheme, where the vertical axis becomes diagonal, to make things trickier.

name: Honey Guardian
summary:
Short score-attack shmup in the "caravan" style.

Jenny has two minutes to save her hive from invading insects. Power up her sting shot with honey crystals and shoot invaders coming from all directions! No ads, no pay-to-play, no pay-to-win.

Original game made for Gunner Parade Jam 2022.
Ported to Android for Android Port Jam 2023.

name: Horace and the Spiders
summary:
In 1983, Tang produced the third title in the series, Horace and the Spiders. This was primarily a platform game with the Horace sprite retained from the first two games. The first level sees Horace climbing a hill while jumping over spiders. The second level involves crossing a bridge by swinging on spider threads. The third level is the final confrontation with the spiders – he must create holes in the web, luring the spiders into the holes to fix them and consequently jumping on them.

Unlike the earlier two titles, this game was only released for the ZX Spectrum. The first stage of this game shared similarities with both Pitfall and the Colecovision game Smurf: Rescue in Gargamel's Castle, whilst the third platform stage is essentially a Space Panic clone.

name: Hoshi wo Miru Hito: Bad Ebuna Patch 2
Homo Machina
summary: Homo Machina is a 2D exploration mobile game, inspired by Dr. Fritz Kahn’s medical illustrations. Journey through the human body which becomes a gigantic mechanized factory, filled with tiny workers that are controlling every function of the human anatomy. By adapting his work into a video game, we want to share his vision that science can be fun and raise awareness about his iconic work. Young players will find a fun entry point into exploring the human body with the artistic expression in Homo Machina, with each level exuding charismatic animation and sound effects. The game makes it possible to operate the main functions of the human body with straightforward gameplay appealing everyone with its charm.

Hoppi's Adventure

name: Horror Stories
summary: A co-op horror game.

name: HoloRun
summary: HoloRun is a fast-paced, fun-filled game designed for Hololive fans to connect, compete, and celebrate their favorite talents in an exciting virtual playground.

name: Hokuto no Ken
summary:
Hokuto no Ken is a video game released in Japan on July 20, 1986 by Sega for the Sega Mark III gaming platform. It is a side-scrolling action game that follows the events depicted in the first television series from Kenshiro's battle against Shin and his gang to his final showdown with Raoh. The game consists of side-scrolling levels where the player must reach the goal while defeating numerous enemy grunts and sub-bosses along the way, each leading to a one-on-one battle with the stage's boss. Despite featuring similar gameplay, this game is unrelated to Toei's video game version of Hokuto no Ken for the Family Computer released a few months later. The game's lead programmer was Yuji Naka, who would later be known for his work on the Sonic the Hedgehog game franchise. Despite appearing on the cover artwork, Rei does not actually appear in this game.

The original Mark III version game is included along with an enhanced remake in Sega Ages 2500 Hokuto no Ken for the PlayStation 2 in 2004. The game was later re-released for the Wii Virtual Console in Japan on February 26, 2008. An overseas version of the game was produced for the western Master System titled Black Belt, which lacked the Hokuto no Ken license of the Japanese version and featured altered graphics as a result.

name: Horror & Sports Pinball
summary: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. Discover all the secrets, in these thrilling games, a great challenge awaits you. Complete all the missions and become number 1 in the world or the best among your Friends, posting your high score on the online leaderboard.

name: Hope Deferred
summary: Hope Deferred is a first-person psychological horror RPG. Explore nightmare worlds and search for understanding in this PSX inspired dungeon crawler.

name: HoloReversi
summary: Experience a New Twist on Reversi with Hololive Members! Use original stacking mechanics and Hololive member skills to enjoy strategic battles! Take on intense CPU matches or online battles for the ultimate brain challenge!

name: Hokuto no Ken 4: Shichisei Hakenden - Hokuto Shinken no Kanata he
summary:
Hokuto no Ken 4: Shichisei Hakenden - Hokuto Shinken no Kanata he is the fourth Hokuto no Ken video game released by Toei Animation and developed by Shouei System for the Family Computer, released on March 29, 1991. It is second of three role playing games based on the series produced by Toei, following the previous game in the series. The story takes place in the 21st century, several years after the conclusion of the original, in which a new generation of martial artists seeks to follow the foot-steps of Kenshiro and his rivals, and save from its third dark age.

The game's story was written by Hiroshi Toda, who wrote episodes of the Hokuto no Ken anime series, and supervised by original author Buronson.

name: Hook, Line, and Axe
summary: Swing into action in this third-person hack-and-slash parkour set in a sci-fi dystopian America. Strike down corruption with your trusty battle axe. Grapple onto enemies and the environment alike. Chain abilities for the ultimate combo of destruction in Hook, Line, and Axe.

name: House Party: Winter Holiday Pack
summary:
Have you been a real ho ho ho this year? Are you on Frank's naughty list? Do you wanna ride Santa's sleigh all year long?

The winter season is here and the House Party is looking merry and bright! Madison has filled the house with holiday cheer, snowflakes are falling outside, your favorite partygoers are bundled up in Christmas-themed hats and holiday sweaters, and there's a hysterical new short side-story quest featuring “Santa” Frank.

It's time to get into the holiday spirit, doods and lady-doods!

name: Homework is Crazy

name: Holmes from Homes
summary: Included in the Story Me app.

name: Hollywood Mogul 4

Play online or offline with a friend or AI. Loosely inspired by Cyberpunk, 5 Element, Wipeout, Blade Runner, NFS and 1983, 1990, 3077.

name: HorrorCore: Maze and Pools of Horror
summary: Instead of a traditional flashlight, a camera flash – a brief, flickering, blinding light that reveals dark secrets and leaves you in total darkness when it fades. Every step is a fight for survival, and the use of the flash completely redefines the way you explore dark locations.

summary: How Do You Do It? puts players in the role of an 11-year-old girl whose mother has just stepped out for an errand. The girl immediately grabs her dolls and furtively attempts to figure out how sex works using these plastic surrogates.
developers: Nina Freeman, Emmett Butler, Decky Coss, Joni Kittaka

name: Hollywood Animal
summary: Make your dreams come true — or crush someone else’s. Take the helm of a major Hollywood studio at the dawn of sound cinema, and guide it through decades of creative achievements and glamor, debauchery and dark deeds, tough choices and unpleasant compromises.

name: Honey Milf
summary: Honey milf is a game for training mindfulness, memory and concentration.

name: Hoard's LLC: Limited Labyrinth Corporation
summary:
Hoard’s LLC is a cozy, story-driven puzzle game where you play as Barry, a mild-mannered minotaur working deep in the depths of a corporate dungeon. When Barry starts to realize his coworkers are being exploited, he sets out to do something truly radical: help them.

Navigate a maze of departments—like Loot Logistics and Monster Resources—solving puzzles to reconnect isolated coworkers. Along the way, you'll uncover endearing stories, roll your eyes at cheesy corporate puns, and bring together a community that needs each other now more than ever.

name: Horde Survivor
