summary: Battle hordes of monsters in this top-down roguelite arena bullet hell game. Choose what character to play, what stat to gain, and which spell to learn. Every decision matters in your survival against the hordes of monsters.

name: Hourturn: Echoes of Time
summary: Hourturn is an atmospheric game that begins inside a large, constantly turning hourglass. You are a tiny grain of sand within it, striving to stop it and escape, but what awaits the grain of sand outside? Is this the only way to measure time?

name: HoneyFury
summary: Base Construction and Strategic Card Management. You will construct and defend your base from enemy invasions. Employ clever layouts to enhance your base's defenses and acquire resources through card management. Get ready to embrace this strategic and thrilling honey-fueled frenzy!

name: Ho-Ho-Home Invasion
summary:
In Ho-Ho-Home Invasion (very nearly titled Santa Game Solid), play as Santa preparing his stealth skills ahead of the big night (Christmas Eve), delivering presents under trees, filling stockings, and making a swift exit - without getting caught!

Whitepot Studios is excited to announce this free festive stealth micro-game, created especially for the festive season.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Highway 35 Free Pack
summary: Ballistik was born for pure speed, thanks to its aerodynamic line that cuts through the air creating a zero friction effect. Muscle Tone is driven by the desire for redemption and admiration, a force that pushes it to take on every race always at its best.

name: Hometown Store
summary: Experience Simulation Management, the charm of running a retro Thai convenience store from the 1990s! Build trust, unlock nostalgic products, and expand your business to the community.

name: House of Everlast
summary: A mystifying puzzle game that weaves a profound tale exploring the essence of life and family bonds. Immerse yourself in the narrative, as it unfolds through the eyes of Nala, a young girl trapped within a haunted house, accompanied by an unexpected ally, Mr. G.

name: Hoop Fighters
summary: Knock your friends down to the ground and destroy their hoops! Hoop Fighters is an online basketball game for up to 6 players, free from rules. Create your character and join the game. Trip up or slap opponents, do whatever it takes to grab the ball. Remember, there are no rules in Hoop Fighters!

name: Hotel Renovator: Steampunk Furniture Set
summary: This content requires the base game Hotel Renovator on Steam in order to play.Introducing the Steampunk Furniture Set, a DLC that brings retro-futuristic elegance to your Hotel and embraces Victorian aesthetics infused with advanced machinery.

name: Hot Seat
summary: Hot Seat is a first person, dark comedy, narrative puzzler. Don't loose your nerve under the building tension in the Hot Seat... uncover secrets and find the truth. It's just a normal first day on the job right? VR Version also in development.

name: Holstin
summary: A psychological survival horror game set in an eerie, isolated 90s Polish town consumed by an ominous presence. You’ve come looking for answers, but everyone seems possessed by something foul. Explore the festering town, interrogate locals and fight ungodly manifestations to get to the truth.

name: Hollow Knight: Silksong - Sea of Sorrow
summary: Voyage across and beneath the salt-stricken seas in this thrilling nautically-themed expansion of Hollow Knight: Silksong, free for all players in 2026!

name: Horg's Brewery
summary: Foul-mouthed dwarves brewing beer and blasting enemies with rifles in the darkness.

name: Hop & Seek
summary: Hop & Seek is a multiplayer egg hunt game set in a game show for Easter bunnies. You can hide eggs, seek eggs and trick your friends.

name: Honkai: Star Rail
summary: Honkai: Star Rail is an all-new strategy-RPG title in the Honkai series that takes players on a cosmic adventure across the stars. Hop aboard the Astral Express and experience the galaxy's infinite wonders on this journey filled with adventure and thrill.

name: Hotel Hima
summary:
One day, a boy named Stepan (Styu) wakes up and realizes that this is his last night at home.

His mother tells him that he is moving to a hotel for a month. Not just any, but a real Carpathian Castle.

It has everything that a person can imagine when they think of entertainment. Billiards, swimming pool, water park, massage, aromatherapy and even roller coasters.

Will Styu be able to cope with the challenges he faces? With your childhood fears and the yoke of adulthood? Will he find a job or become homeless?

Or maybe it's all about something else? You will be able to find out in this fascinating short story.

name: Hole io: Gold Edition
summary: Show who is the biggest black hole in the entire universe!

name: Hostile Mars
summary: Hostile Mars is a Tower-Defense Factory-Building game. You must create efficient supply chains, salvage destroyed enemies, and upgrade structures to support your gigantic cannons that defend your base against thousands of enemies.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Inherit the Flame
summary:
Version 5.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Flamescion
• New ELF: Sirin
• New Gamemode: Elysian Realm
• ...and more!

name: Homestar Runner: Halloween Hide n' Seek
summary: A short Halloween-themed point n' click game featuring the dumb animal characters of Homestar Runner dot com.

name: Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak
summary:
Before you can find your Homeworld, you must first unlock the secrets of the desert.

Blackbird Interactive and Gearbox Software invite you to visit the deserts of Kharak in this new Homeworld story, where danger lurks behind every dune. Homeworld: Deserts of Kharak is set for release on January 20th on Windows PC.

The planet is dying, but deep in the southern sands of Kharak, an anomaly has been discovered. Could Kharak’s salvation lie in the desert? Led by chief science officer Rachel S’jet, the Coalition of the Northern Kiithid sends an expedition deep within enemy-controlled territory to investigate the finding, which could forever alter the fate of humanity.

name: How to Train Your Human
summary: How to Train Your Human is a video game about cats using themselves as sleeper agent weapons to take down humanity.

name: Horror Remake
summary: This is Horror Remake, a game where you run around from an Infected Monkey in a Abandoned Laboratory.

name: Horror in the Asylum
summary: as it becomes night , you take your pills and go to sleep , what happens next is up to your twisted imaginations .

name: Horny Teachers Want to Fuck
summary: Prepare for unforgettable moments filled with flirtation, romance, sex, and conversations that could change the course of events during this unique team-building trip. Will love ignite in the hearts? Will relationships grow stronger? It all depends on you and your virtual reality seducer persona

name: Hong Kong Haunting: Fishball Girl
summary: Fishball is a first-person simulation game where you run a traditional Hong Kong street food stall, selling iconic snacks to survive. But something strange is happening. Unexplainable events begin to unfold—until finally, you're forced to face her.

name: Hockey Showdown
summary: Match up against your friends, your enemies, or anyone worldwide in a head-to-head Hockey Showdown!

name: Hockey Hockey Club
summary:
Hockey Hockey Club is a feel good ice hockey game with the cutest and wobbliest animals of the whole polar circle. But don't be fooled by their adorable little faces, Hockey Hockey Club is a die-hard hockey game with all the usual hockey stuffs (5 on 5 games, faceoffs, one timers, bodychecks, one on ones , ...) and a twist of arcadey moves (super shots, flips, slowmo...).

Eight teams of determined hockey players are present in the game with a lot of statistics for all the numbers fans: stamina, speed, handling, shoot... Pick the best teammates to defeat the other teams!

Play against the computer (3 levels of difficulty), or play with your friends locally (for up to 4 players). You can even play the game online with the help of the fantastic Parsec technology!

name: Homestead Arcana
summary: Become a farming Witch and pioneer the range that has been mysteriously corrupted with Miasma. Discover the secret behind its appearance, grow plants to power up your spells, and use nature’s magic to heal the land. Build your very own homestead from the ground up. Discover new plants and tend to your ever-growing garden to heal the land and make it your own.

name: Holoidle
summary: A relaxing Hololive idle game. Unlock upgrades, complete your card collection and take care of your idol to increase your influence!

name: House Ghost
summary: In this slow-burn BL visual novel, build trust and uncover the past of a gentle spirit. Make choices that shape your bond with him, explore his memories, and discover if love can truly cross the boundary between life and death. Romance. Mystery. And a ghost who might just steal your heart.

name: Hotel Giant
summary:
Our Hotels. Your Rules. In Hotel Giant, you call the shots as you direct every aspect of hotel operations. You control the construction of your hotel – from site selection to building type – to personalized room features. Build up to 19 different hotel complexes, ranging from romantic get-away hotels to skyscraper business hotels to luxury 5-star hotels with exquisite spa and entertainment facilities.

You’ll also get the chance to satisfy your inner voyeur by observing your guests’ every move and reacting to their feedback.

name: How a Retired Strategist Saved the Country
summary: This is a real-time strategy simulation game in which players develop their country while managing and operating its resources. Players are asked for help by various heroines, including elves, beastmen ......, and others, and command the armies of their countries.

name: Hot Wheels Infinite Loop
summary: Experience Hot Wheels Infinite Loop – an action packed mobile game that blends the legendary toy with real-time PVP racing. Stunt, crash, and smash through adrenaline-rushing races as you compete to top the leaderboards. Collect and upgrade iconic Hot Wheels like the Bone Shaker, Twin Mill, Rodger Dodger, Shark Bite, and more to compete in the ultimate motorsport.

name: Hope Left Me
summary:
You wake up in a mysterious place, alone and freezing to death, the only person around seems to be a weird girl with a long sleeve soviet jersey.

Hope Left Me is a post-noir visual novel released as a tie-in to the album of the same name by Astrophysics.

name: Hokuto no Ken 3: Shinseiki Souzou Seiken Retsuden
summary: Hokuto no Ken 3: Shinseiki Souzou Seiken Retsuden is the third Hokuto no Ken video game developed by Shouei Systems and released by Toei Animation for the Family Computer (the Japanese version of the Nintendo Entertainment System) on October 19, 1989. Unlike the first two Hokuto no Ken video games for the platform, which were side-scrolling action games, Hokuto no Ken 3 is a role playing game which adapts the storyline of the original manga from the beginning to the Kingdom of Shura story arc. It was the first in a trilogy of RPGs based on the franchise.

name: Hordelord
summary: Hordelord is a hi-octane arena mobility shooter (horde & endless modes) where you face waves of nasty enemies. Armed with powerful weapons and high-mobility skills, zip around and fight to achieve the highest score on global leaderboards. Hordelord sports tight gunplay, satisfying kills, and meaningful upgrades.

name: Hospital Renovator
summary: Become a one-man renovation company and take care of the reconstruction of a ruined hospital! Save a neglected facility and create a fully functional emergency complex. The entire process of cleaning, planning, repairing, and arranging is on your side. Build a dream clinic in the Hospital Renovator!

name: Hospital 9
summary: Hospital 9 is a little game for players who want to easily enjoy a FPS adventure game. The goal of this game is to get to the last scene.A free soundtrack is included.

name: Holo vs. Robo
summary: Build a strong defense of hololive dolls to defeat a robot army in this exciting hololive-themed tower defense game!!

name: Hot Couture
summary: Hot Couture is the first and only book of the Hot Couture series.

name: Hood RPG
summary: Dark Humor & Satire: Experience a story that blends comedic mischief with clever parody, ensuring laughs and surprises at every turn. Engage in unconventional turn-based battles. Be ready to fall over laughing!

name: Hot And Lovely: Violet
summary: Hot And Lovely: Violet is a find-the-differences mini-game. By clicking on the picture area with the mouse to select the difference between the left and right pictures, you can unlock the hot CG with the motorcycle girl!

name: HordeCore
summary: HordeCore is a kick-ass action side-scroller set in a post-apocalyptic world. Become the leader of an ever-expanding group of survivors. Manage supplies, upgrade your team, and craft deadly contraptions to defend yourself! Remember, exploration is vital in this harsh new world. Prepare to forge bizarre alliances and, together, face the many dangers of the wastelands. Take survival gameplay, combine it with base management, add RPG elements, and spice it up with a fully-fledged collectible card game - and you get HordeCore!

name: Home Designer: Living Room
summary: In this classic hidden object game, Hazel wants to help her aunt with home refurbishment. Sell off the old stuff and renovate the empty living room with real world furniture and design the room of your dreams!

name: House Tidy
summary: House Tidy is a meditative and calming game that will help you relax and unwind from the hustle and bustle of everyday life.

name: House Party: Detective Liz Katz in a Gritty Kitty Murder Mystery
summary:
Your favorite house party flirts with a bit of blood and darkness in its second-ever guest expansion pack — featuring famous cosplayer, streamer, actress, and model Liz Katz!

Enjoy a thrilling new branching Original Story addition focused around and fully voice-acted by Liz Katz herself! Be prepared for the lights to go out, fear to reign, and unsolved mysteries to come to light in this wild new comedy-noir DLC!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Acceleracers Expansion pack
How to Sing to Open Your Heart: Remastered
summary: The cute fantasy visual novel, "How to Sing to Open Your Heart" returns as a remastered version. Princess Myana, who loves to sing, finally comes to Eroolia. A lot of people, like the Imperial Guard Captain, Ludovic, and Princess Anna, are unhappy about it. What will happen?

name: How to Say Goodbye
summary:
How to say Goodbye tells the story of a character recently turned into a ghost, lost in an unknown world populated by spirits.
In this narrative puzzle game, move the elements of decor and the characters to guide them out of the liminal space between life and death in which they are trapped.
Help them find their friends who are prisoners of a mysterious wizard and accompany them on their journey to the other side.

name: Hot Shots Golf: Out of Bounds
summary: The fun, addicting and ever-popular Hot Shots Golf franchise, tees it up on the PLAYSTATION 3 system. High Definition) detail of course graphics accompanied with new, more accurate golf physics, brings a revolutionary new level of immersion to the already established signature style of pick-up and play gameplay. With vibrant new courses, zany new characters and a wealth of new online features, Hot Shots Golf: Out of Bounds strives to enter the next generation strokes ahead of the competition.

name: Hope's Peak
summary: A mystery told five paragraphs at a time.

name: House Flip
summary: Buy, fix, and sell houses with a click of your mouse in House Flip! Browse the listings, then purchase and inspect a house to see what needs fixing. Hold an open house to see which renovations prospective buyers want. Choose a section of the house to clean, repair, or upgrade, and then play mini-games to do the work yourself.

name: Hot Springs Story
summary: Build your own resort and propel it to success with but a touch of the finger in this one-of-a-kind simulation!

name: House Flipper: HGTV DLC
summary:
This is the second paid DLC for House Flipper. We are moving to Sunset Bay, where we can flip&renovate new houses and watch the beautiful sea in the meantime.  
 
The game has been released on May 14th, 2020, and developed by the Frozen District studio based in Krakow, Poland.

name: Honey Time! with Pooh!
summary:
Pooh is no longer the cute little bear he used to be... something has corrupted him, and now he thirsts for blood. Gather your courage and investigate.

Play as Friend, Pooh's favorite human in the world. Not just anyone can taste Pooh's honey. Read the invitation he sent and then head to his house in the forest. When you enter his house, you'll discover that Pooh has changed a bit. But that's okay! Have a chat with Pooh; he has something to show you. Notice that Pooh's new honey is a bit too red for your liking. Try to escape by exploring Pooh's house while he's distracted. He'll attack you if he catches you trying to escape or snooping around his things. Bears are very territorial, you know?

name: Hotel Overloop
summary: You've stucked into a loop in the mysterious hotel. Find anomalies to escape the hotel's loop.

name: Hotch Kiss
summary:
Shigeru is a smooth-talking 2nd-year student at Tsunekusu Gakuen, which prides itself on offering an enjoyable school life for all students. To this end, there is a shop that almost every student knows about, selling everything from exam cheat sheets, scouting reports for upcoming matches, photos of girls, and even things that look like love potions. In the past, good luck charms for attaining love were also sold there and were quite popular.

This shop is known as ‘gakuen seikatsu sougojo kenkyuukai’ (research society for helping each others’ school lives), shortened as ‘gojoken’. Shigeru went to check it out of curiosity and instead found the school idol Yukino there as a replacement salesperson for the leader. Irritated at her awkward service, he decided to help himself, but ended up being mistaken for a salesperson by the other students. One day, Yukino called him up to the rooftop and gave him a stapler. She told him that it was a stapler of eternal bonds.

name: Horrortale: Waterfall
summary: A sequel to the original point and click Horrortale game.

name: Holopoint: Chronicle
summary: Holopoint: Chronicle is intense archery combat. Explore the once lively island while skillfully weaving your way through waves of relentless holographic enemies, all while swiftly loosing arrows toward your targets.

name: Homebound
summary: Homebound is a 2D platformer all about a journey home. Collect and use powers you find along the way to find your way home.

name: HoloSeeker
summary: A deckbuilding roguelite RPG featuring hololive members.

name: Hotel Hideaway
summary: An immersive 3D social simulation MMO where you customize your avatar, build and decorate rooms, collect rare items, and join live community events in a nostalgic yet ever-evolving virtual world.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Saha and Rebirth
summary:
Version 6.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Rebirth
• New ELF: Project Bunny
• New Story Chapter XXXIX: Daughters of the Sea
• New Captainverse Event: Before the Endless Dream Ends
• ...and more!

name: Hoshizora no Comic Garden
summary: Hoshizora no Comic Garden is a visual novel for the Nintendo DS.

name: Horror Fan House
summary: Explore the house and turn on all the lights, if you can...

name: Home Behind
summary: In Home Behind, you take on the role of a refugee cast out from your homeland by a band of rebels. Your home and the peace you enjoyed has been destroyed, and your family has disappeared. Can you survive the struggle, famine, and sickness to make it to the safety of Europe?

name: Ho-Ho-Maze!
summary: **Rescue the reindeer: ** Find each lost reindeer scattered throughout the maze and lead all of them to Santa's sleigh. But be careful! The wolves are always on the prowl, eager to snatch a tasty treat, as the more reindeer following Santa it's harder to escape!

name: Hook: Complete Edition
summary: Unwind and challenge your mind with Hook

name: Holiday in Europe: Wonders of Germany - Collector's Edition
summary: Unveil the beauty and history of Germany, the land of poets and thinkers! Explore stunning castles, bustling cities, and captivating cultural treasures.

name: Hole io
summary: Can you move the black hole to swallow the buildings into the hole like an attacking hole master? The clock is ticking, tik tok, tik tok, will you succeed to swallow?

name: Hop Ball: Hop to Crush Slices
HoneyWorks Premium Live
summary: HoneyWorks Premium Live is a rhythm game based around the popular 'Confession Executive Committee' series. Songs and characters from the original story as well as other sub-franchises HoneyWorks have created — Dolce and a handful of PVs made for CHiCO with HoneyWorks — are in the game. Premium Live also comes with recolored and remastered versions of the earlier songs' original PVs.

name: Holy Knight Luviria
summary: In order to stop the demon lord before he returns to his full strength, the Holy Knight Luviria sets out with a brigade of knights to bring down the demonic leader. However, the newly resurrected demon lord has taken a special interest in her, and comes up with a devious plan to corrupt the righteous knight...

name: Holy Potatoes! What the Hell?!
summary: Holy Potatoes! What the Hell?! is a whacky hell-themed cooking management sim where you take on the role of a chef in an Afterlife populated by potatoes! Sort potato sinners into cooking stations to extract sinfully delicious ingredients, cook up incredible potato-based recipes, and appease the gods in your Pantheon by serving them savory spud dishes!

name: HoloSona5
summary: A Hololive fanmade RPG inspired by modern phantom thief games. You save the "Poitter" from being taken over by a millionaire. A 1-2 hour turn-based game where you explore dungeons and exploit weaknesses in combat.

name: Hot Lap League: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Take complete control of your vehicle, perfect your driving, and prove your place in the Hot Lap League. Drift and race your car around 150+ mind blowing tracks, each requiring unique techniques and strategies. Improving your time by racing your best is the only way to the top.

It’s you, the track and the clock - no driving assist, no nonsense.

name: Honke Sankyo Fever: Jikki Simulation 3
summary: Honke Sankyo Fever Jikki Simulation 3 is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Vistec and published by Boss Communications, which was released in Japan in 1996.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Aurelia Invicta
summary:
Version 4.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Dea Anchora (Durandal)
• New Story Chapter XXI: Wings of Reawakening
• New Featured Event: Stellar Mythos
• ...and more!

name: Hotel Hustle
summary: Take a very hands-on approach to managing a bustling hotel and make sure your guests leave with a smile on their face.

name: How Much Items: Vehicles
summary: Game genre find hidden objects.

name: Home of the Yokai
summary: Home of the Yokai is a creature collecting Eastern fantasy RPG featuring an expansive world filled with rich stories and unique Yokai. Tasked to uncover a mysterious evil, you embark on a journey with your Yokai, forming new friendships, engage in intense battles, and face countless challenges!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd
summary: Honkai Impact 3rd follows Valkyries as they defend the world from Honkai, the “mysterious power responsible for destroying human civilization countless times.”

name: Horse 2
summary: A dramatic story about friends and horses.

name: Honor of Nations
summary: Honor of Nations delivers unmatched MMORPG experience in mobile platforms. Honor of Nations mobile captures the essence of classic MMORPGs, offering a vast, open world filled with quests, dungeons, and a rich lore. Immerse yourself in epic adventures, all within the convenience of your mobile device. Whether you're commuting, waiting in line, or just relaxing at home, your journey in Honor of Nations is always just a tap away.

name: Hot Shots Golf 2
summary:
Experience Hot Shots Golf 2 originally released on the PlayStation console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Combining addictive gameplay and stunning visuals, Hot Shots Golf 2 delivers a comprehensive golfing experience, with a wacky sense of humour.

name: Hopeful Day Inside Room
summary: Right after moving to a big city and getting a new apartment, you were fired from your job! And now you don't want to go outside again! Improve your skills, manage your time and find a way to make money without having to leave the room! Watch as your plans go down the drain and you sleep through the whole week!

name: House Flipper: Pets
summary: It's finally time for finding your perfect renovation partner! Max, Phil, Bella? It's up to you to decide what's the name of your adopted companion. Take in an adorable pet and let him help you on your flipping journey in the friendly area of Cozy Village!

name: How Am I Still Waiting for the Bus?
summary: You've been waiting for your bus. And waiting. And waiting. And now you're dead. Your soul is being drawn toward the afterlife, but you have to fight the urge. You can't die -- you have to get to WORK!

name: Horror Drift
summary: Drift on japanese touge circuits while scary presences try to stop you from delivering your tofu.

name: Hot Wheels: Unlimited
summary: Buckle up! Get ready to race around Hot Wheels Islands! We’re all about awesome cars, monster trucks, fun racing games, crazy challenges, and building the coolest race tracks around. Head on over to Hot Wheels City to test your skills with fun puzzle or car racing challenges. Race solo or compete against friends! Start your engines, this is going to be an awesome ride!

name: Homeworld: Vast Reaches
summary: Immerse yourself in a bold new story in the beloved Homeworld saga that brings real-time strategic space battles to VR. Your fleet is at your fingertips in this all-new game where you can execute strategic attacks on your enemies from any direction or angle.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: For the Stars Shall Defy Fate
summary:
Version 8.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter IX-EX: Yet the Stars Still Sparkle
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Behold! Fate-Defying Dragon (Coralie)
• New AstralOp: Chenxue
• New Featured Event: Assemble! Summer Friendship Resort
• ...and more!

name: Hogi's Adventure Run
summary:
Join Hogi and embark on an endless journey full of adventure and different challenges. Your character plays the role of Hogi – A Scarecrow. Join him in his adventure, explore the world, jump through obstacles, avoid traps, collect coins and complete various challenges.

The game includes a fluid dynamic weather, lightning system, mountain views, ambient and classical style soothing music helps you relax and as you play it give you a sensational feel.

Features:
*Easy to learn, difficult to master double tap jump trick
*Procedurally generated terrain
*Dynamic lighting and weather effects
*Immersive minimalist environment
*Compete with friends and beat high scores
*Ambient and relaxing music

name: Howling Village: Echoes
summary: Explore every corner of the village while trying to escape menacing ghosts who want nothing more than to stop you... forever! Solve mysteries and reach the ultimate true ending by making full use of items you find!

name: Hololive Treasure Mountain
summary: Stack the Love of Captain Marin! A Simple yet Exciting 3D Physics Puzzle Game!

name: Honu
summary: Honu is a first-person puzzle game set in a story-rich, stylized world filled with magitech and charming characters. Developed by H-BRS DevTeam—a German hobbyist game development team supported by Hochschule Bonn-Rhein-Sieg.

name: Hot Pot For One
summary: You are alone on a cold, Christmas night, stuck at home, in a foreign country. You get through it by cooking a hot dish intended for six people.

name: Hollow Knight Gun Mod
summary:
A Hollow Knight mod that gives the Knight the ability to wield a modern day assault rifle. Why did I make this? I wish I knew too.

While this mod is not to be taken seriously, It still aims to make a semi-serious fun ranged weapon mod to capitalize on Hollow Knight's movement system.

name: Holdfast: Age of Sail
summary: Ahoy! Prepare to raise the black flag. Holdfast's Age Of Sail Expansion

name: Hometown Hero
summary: A cute, casual turn-based combat game where you'll fight with foam swords and protect your new hometown while exploring its secrets and building your reputation.

name: House Party: Doja Cat
summary: Keep the wild and crazy party going with House Party’s first-ever expansion pack — featuring award-winning music star Doja Cat! This DLC adds hours of fun new content and branching stories to the House Party game's Original Story centering around and fully voice-acted by Doja Cat herself, as well as brand new content for all of the other House Party characters!

name: Hope: A Sky Full of Ghosts
summary:
In this narrative-driven, sci-fi point and click adventure, unravel the secrets of a stolen spaceship and your enigmatic crew. A new future away from corporate tyranny awaits. As captain, your choices matter and forging your crew's connections, even more so. Flying free has a cost.

Will you pay it?

name: Horses of Hoofprint Bay
summary: Horses of Hoofprint Bay is a lovingly hand-drawn 2D point and click barn buildup game. Take care of your horses, train them to build up their strength and confidence, and compete for prize money! Breed adorable foals, hire and manage staff, and build the stable of your dreams!

name: Hound: Automaton
summary: In this hyper-realistic multiplayer horror game, one player starts as The Hound, while up to 15 players are human survivors trying to hide. Navigate through hyper-realistic environments, and experience the ultimate survival horror experience in multiplayer.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Starlit Sanctum
summary:
Version 3.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Bright Knight Excelsis (Durandal)
• New Story Chapter XVI: Imminent Storm
• New Featured Event: Honkai Kingdoms: ZERO
• A Post-Honkai Odyssey Continuation
• ...and more!

name: House of Wolves
summary:
A tribute to Real-Time Strategy greats such as Age of Empire and Starcraft you will harvest trees, hunt animals, explore, build and conquer in your quest to seek vengeance on Lord Vilereck for taking control of the crown.
Prepare to save princesses, train wizards and even build mighty fortresses to recruit your own legion of knights and lead your massive armies to victory, or die trying…

name: Hololive Error
summary: Hololive Error is a survival horror game where an occult magazine journalist decides to visit the town of Aogami to investigate its strange happenings.

name: Hollow Knight: Lifeblood
summary:
Lifeblood is a DLC for Hollow Knight and is the third out of the four free contents that were released. This DLC was announced on the 23rd of March 2018 and was released on the 20th of April, 2018.

Lifeblood Overview
Lifeblood mainly focused on enhancing certain aspects of the game such as:

An optimizable theme, allowing players to change the background of the title screen.
Visual Changes to the game such as using charms, locations, and new animations.
Buffs and Nerfs to Combat, Enemies, and Bosses such as:
Added two new attacks to the Traitor Lord.
Hivelings appearance is larger and has increased health.
A stagger can be performed on The Collector
Hive Guardians deals two masks of damage to The Knight.
Upon Death, a Volatile Mosskin quickly explodes.
A Husk Hive grew in size, is faster, and summons Hivelings in a shorter period of time.
A Desolate Dive can no longer be used on a Flukemarm.
The Knight must wear the Grimmchild charm to gain access into facing Nightmare King Grimm.
Stagger Animation of the False Knight is faster.
The spore cloud released by a Fungified Husk is bigger.
Added dialogue to NPCs
Added and optimized sound effects in the game.
Changes made to some Charms:
The damage dealt by the Flukenest has been reduced and costs 3 notches.
Weaverlings from the Weaversong deals more damage, has a new animation and can inflict stagger on bosses.
Joni's Blessing has decreased its value of providing 50% +1 HP to 40% +1 HP.
Fury of the Fallen now has a red smoke when it is used instead of a red aura.
Other than the changes done and added, Lifeblood also introduces a boss and a new mapping tool listed below:

name: Holodrive
summary: Holodrive is a super fast-paced collectable 2D multiplayer shooter. Create your robot, customize it and jetpack your way to victory!

name: Hot Slide
summary:
Drift your way to the world league! Introducing new exciting racing game, where you can test your drifting skill against real people from around the world. Download for free and start drifting now!

Collect and upgrade cars, take on solo and team challenges, win in one-on-one duels and get to the top position of world wide league. Would you choose Muscle or Street cars, Super cars or Off-Road SUVs? Pick the best car for every race and leave your opponents in the smoke of your hot slide.

name: Hope Lost
summary: This playdate game features 6 different apocalypses to play through. Each have their own objective and unique spin to the game's common mechanics.

name: Horse-o-Chess
summary: An autobattle strategy game where the player manages resources and spends them to put together teams of units that fight automatically. The player must survive every wave in a mission to win.

name: Horror Family: Flight
summary: Horror Family - Flight is a time-loop horror game set on an airplane.

name: Hoa
summary: Hoa is a platform-adventure game featuring beautiful hand-painted art and a calm, relaxing atmosphere. The game follows the main character, Hoa, as she discovers her own story on a journey through a breathtaking and magical world back to her homeland.

name: Hoshi wo Sagashite...
summary: The game revolves around a dog and his family. Being one of the earliest adventure games for an 8-bit console system, the game tends to be simplistic compared to today's adventure games. As a Japan exclusive video game, literacy is required in the Japanese language in order to play the game. The character seems to have an anime-like influence as the people are watching out for the dog that is sitting on a log. Among the human beings, however, is an alien-like creature. While the literal translation would be Searching the Stars..., the actual alternative title is The Story of Mio.

name: Honorless!
summary: HONORLESS! is a 2D fighting game 1vs1 where trashtalking plays a key role. Insult your friends with custom phrases and then slice them to pieces.

name: Honey Kingdom
summary: When you receive a strange letter from your father, you learn about the inheritance he left for you before he passed away. The inheritance is nothing more than a brothel, with some "peculiarities". It is up to you to decide who you will be to your employees, another master who is only interested in money, or a savior who will arrange a much better life for them?

name: Horrortale
summary: A short point and click game based on the Undertale fan-comic Horrortale.

name: Hogi's Adventure
summary:
Join Hogi and embark on an endless journey full of adventure and different challenges. Your character plays the role of Hogi – A Scarecrow. Join him in his adventure, explore the world, jump through obstacles, avoid traps, collect coins and complete various challenges.

The game includes a fluid dynamic weather, lightning system, mountain views, ambient and classical style soothing music helps you relax and as you play it give you a sensational feel.

name: Hoshi no Furu Toki
summary: Hoshi no Furu Toki is an otome game that takes place in modern times and focuses on a second year female high school student, Akane Hasekura.

name: Horny Housewives 2
summary: Dive back into the tantalizing world of "Horny Housewives" with the highly anticipated sequel, "Horny Housewives 2." This immersive open world RPG builds upon the seductive allure of the original game while introducing groundbreaking features that will captivate both new and returning players.

name: HowLongToBeat: The Game
summary: A daily guessing game where players try to accurately guess the length of a game.

name: Hormone Wars
summary: Do you like Tower Defense games with Strategy elements? Well, look no further! We've got exactly what you're looking for! Get ready to defend your settlement from enemies using a huge arsenal of towers!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Arrow of Novae
summary:
Version 6.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Herrscher of Human: Ego
• New ELF: Elf Elysia
• New Story Chapter EX: Project Stigma
• New Featured Event: Summer Survival Rhapsody Side 13
• ...and more!

name: Hoshi Ori Yume Mirai
summary: Ryousuke moved back to his hometown of Shionagi, which he had been away from for seven years, and transferred into his new school in the middle of the summer. He reunited with his childhood friend Marika, met the sole astronomy club member Sora and made new friends among his classmates. He joined the event management committee to enjoy his school life even more. Along the way, he noticed the dreams of the girls around him, along with his own desires to be closer to them. On this particular summer day begins a love story that extends towards the future.

name: Holua's Arcades
summary: Get ready to dive back into the pure joy of gaming. Prepare yourself for four thrilling games inspired by the arcade genre's all-time favorites. From challenging platformers, to epic space battles and classic beat'em up action. It's like having four arcade machines at your fingertips!

name: Hollow Floor
summary: Hollow Floor is an exploration-based single-sitting Metroidvania inspired by VVVVVV and REDDER. Hollow Floor is a relaxed game that is full of secrets and hard challenges that can be tackled at any moment in the game or completely ignored.

name: House of Terror
summary: Do you have what it takes to survive the House of Terror? Step inside… if you dare.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn: Limited Edition
summary: The Limited Edition comes in a sturdy paper case with a nice artwork on the front showing the main character Aloy and one of the robotic beasts roaming the world.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn: The Frozen Wilds
summary: The Frozen Wilds contains additional content for Horizon Zero Dawn, including new storylines, characters and experiences in a beautiful but unforgiving new area.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn
summary: Welcome to a vibrant world rich with the beauty of nature – but inhabited by awe-inspiring, highly advanced machines. As a young machine hunter named Aloy, you must unravel the mysteries of this world and find your own destiny.

name: How Should I Keep a House Squeaky Clean, With a Filthy Little Neighbour Ghost?
summary: “How should I keep a house squeaky clean, with a filthy little neighbour ghost?” - is a short story about a robotic cat maid trying to clean an apartment where a dirty ghost has taken up vengeance.

name: Holobunnies: The Bittersweet Adventure
summary: Holobunnies is a challenging and rewarding side-scrolling adventure game that happens across every corner of the universe. You play as one of the Holobunnies, Danielle the witch, Leenox the hunter, Roméo the bard, Mephisto the ninja and Avril the catcher which are hologram brothers and sisters, living together aboard their very own starship. Explore planets, fight with vile and weird creatures, meet with special and peculiar people, collect treasures and collectibles and ultimately; find a new home for you and your hologram buddies. Share the fun of exploration and fighting with a friend (or foe?) in coop mode.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Day One Edition
summary:
Collect the best vehicles in the Hot Wheels universe, build spectacular tracks and dive into breathtaking races.

The Day One Edition includes:
2 extra in-game vehicles, called the Track Manga and the GT-Scorcher.

name: Home Sweet Home
summary: Picture this scene... You move into your new home, and every room is perfect. Every room, except one. Here is the blank canvas for your vision, but you lack the know-how. Who do you call? The Home Sweet Home team! Home Sweet Home will give you the chance to unleash your hidden talents as an interior designer. You choose the furniture, patterns and colors to create a masterpiece that will blow your client away. With simple controls, a fun graphical style and an easy-to-use interface, Home Sweet Home allows you to nurture your creative side. Remember, a house is not a home until it is a Home Sweet Home.

name: Hocus
summary: perspective illusion puzzle based on M.C. Escher drawings and impossible shapes

name: Hockey Legacy Manager 26
summary: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional hockey team!

name: HoverGrease
summary:
HoverGrease mixes the feeling of traditional first-person shooters with fast-paced arcade-like characters via top-down game mechanics. 
 
HoverGrease takes place in a biologically advanced dystopian cyberpunk future where humans altered with animal DNA are the new trend. 
 
At the end of the 22nd century, advancements in bioengineering allows to cure almost any terminal disease through mix-and-match of genes from any living creatures with human DNA. The procedure is mostly used as a last result, as most of the time it results in abnormalities and disfigurations. 
 
On a few rare occasions, the altering of DNA has yielded some highly desired results, where the balance of human DNA with genes from a single animal resulted in aesthetically pleasing specimens — some even attractive / good looking creatures. These lucky ones have become overnight sensations living a life of public attention — nicknamed Anthro Influencers. Little does the public know about the reality of their contracts with Big Corp Inc., the world’s leading company in DNA altering, who claims to have full control over the results. Big Corp Inc. is looking to change the public perceptions of DNA altering by sponsoring an Anthro-only tournament as a PR stunt, and you are invited to join! 
 
Play as Kimmy Frog, Johnny Cockhead, Foxy BonBon, Lab-Rat Perry or as Piggy Smith (the first 5 Anthro Influencers revealed out of the 12 character roster) and blast your way to freedom!

name: Honeypot Espionage
summary: Honeypot Espionage is an online VR multiplayer shooter, focused on stealth combat, in which you are put against other Spies in a combat arena. The last man standing wins. As a Spy, you are completely invisible, but you will begin to materialize if you move, fire a weapon or set a trap. If you don’t want killed, stay still. Think Predator meets SuperHot. The slower you move in real life the harder you are to see. You can set traps and decoys to trick other players into revealing their location to try to come out on top. Multiple game modes allow you to fight the way you want. Team up with others to break into the High Security Government buildings to steal classified documents. Guard the VIP and keep them hidden from potential assassins. Classic Death match where you use your abilities to search out others to get the first and last kills. Stay hidden, only move to Kill.

name: Hold.for.Humans
summary: Hold the line so that humanity may live another day. Defend the evacuation lanes from the relentless spawns of a rogue AI in this rhythm/roguelite-infused hack n’ slash/tower defense game. Upgrade the last friendly robot on Earth, armed with a unwavering program and purpose: HOLD.FOR.HUMANS.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Rosemary's Nocturne
summary:
Version 4.2 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the Here Lies Bellflower arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Fallen Rosemary (Rita)
• New Valkyrie Augment Core: Danzai Spectramancer (Raiden Mei)
• New Story Chapter XIX: Into Earth Does the Water Flow
• New Battlesuit Event: Rosemary's Floriograph
• ...and more!

name: Hong Kong
summary:
The first game to be produced as a coverdisk for Japanese Famicom magazine Famimaga, Hong Kong is a points-based variant of Mahjong Solitaire (a.k.a. Shanghai) that also plays a little bit like Jenga.

Hong Kong, or Famimaga Disk Vol. 1 Hong Kong, is a Shanghai variant in which players must remove specified tiles from a pattern. The player can select which pattern (from pyramids and hourglasses to more complex designs) from which to draw tiles as well as inputting a three letter code which offers several thousand possible combinations of the tiles within that pattern.

Rather than removing tiles in pairs on the edge of the pattern in order to access buried tiles, as is the norm in Shanghai, the player can select any tile on the board as long as it corresponds to the tile the game requests. However, points are scored based on how many other tiles surround the selected tile: A maximum of 320 points are awarded for tiles completely surrounded on all six sides by other tiles. Any tiles that aren't "standing" on at least one other tile will fall off the board causing a premature game over: players need to balance earning points by removing entrenched tiles while ensuring that no tile will fall off the table as a result of the removal.

Because the game is not a true version of Shanghai it is named after another Chinese city - Hong Kong - instead.

name: Honeypot
summary: A queer erotic scifi-fantasy game about being stranded on a perverse part of an alien planet with an alien companion.

name: House Party
summary: House Party, in its concept and sense of humor, is inspired by the adventure style games of the 80s and 90s like Leisure Suit Larry and Monkey Island, but it is rendered in a beautiful full-3D first-person context.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Night Burner
summary: Made to race in space, Night Burner doesn't hide its power, quite the opposite! The center of its body features a giant turbine, the origin of its explosive force. Are you ready to dominate the racing universe?

name: Horse Plinko
summary: Horse Plinko is a ridiculous physics-based game where strategy meets slapstick. Score points, unlock upgrades, and discover just how far one horse can fall.

name: Hollow Ascent
summary: Hollow Ascent is an action RPG set in a gothic city overrun by undead. Explore its urban environment, scavenge for weapons and fragments of truth. Face bloody combat with melee weapons, spells or stealth. Each time you fall, death pulls you back, grow stronger, and push deeper in search of escape.

name: Ho-Hop!
summary: HO-HOP! is a Christmas board game for 1-4 players. Roll the dice and move across a board full of surprises: bonuses, debuffs, skipped turns, and unexpected obstacles! The first to reach the finish line wins.

name: House of Golf 2
summary: House of Golf 2 delivers an engaging multiplayer golf experience with over 100 unique holes to conquer. Gather up to 4 players for lively couch play sessions, showcasing your skills with jaw-dropping shots. Compete in live tournaments for exciting rewards and leave your mark on the world of golf!

name: Holiday in Europe: Netherlands Dreams - Collector's Edition
summary: Start your journey to the land of tulips, windmills, and captivating traditions with the Collins family! Ready to explore the Netherlands?

name: Home Before Winter
summary: Single Player coming soon! -- Mobilize your troops and start your journey towards world domination. Get into the trenches and shoot incoming soldiers in this WW1 inspired shoot'em up, turn based, strategy game.

name: Horde: The Citadel
summary:
Horde: The Citadel is a sequel to the fantasy real-time strategy game, Horde: The Northern Wind. Continuing the story of the land of Semirechye, The Citadel further explores the conflict between the Semireks and the invading nomads lead by their khan Teimur. In The Northern Wind, Semirek leaders have been able to drive Teimur's forces out of Lower Urgal, however the khan had been able to ally with hermit wizards and fortify his lands. The only path to his main citadel, Vorezh, lies through the Land of Shadows no man dares to tread, and the Semireks will need to secure an alliance with the dreaded dragons to pass safely into Teimur's domain.

The Citadel essentially uses the same engine as its predecessor, retaining all of the original game mechanics but also adds new content in the form of units, structures, items and terrain types. The game runs in higher resolution as The Northern Wind, but the sprites are not scaled up so a larger portion of the battlefield is visible. Gameplay remains mostly the same, with the player having to explore each of the nine maps in order to solve the main quest, find necessary items, defeat or negotiate with opponents. The maps are also larger, and each usually has two neutral Semirek settlements for the player to interact with, while in the previous game, only one settlement was initially present on most maps.

name: Holiday in Europe: Czech Adventure - Collector's Edition
summary: Explore Prague and beyond with the Collins family! Solve hidden object challenges, brain teasers, and uncover secrets in stunning locations!

name: Hololive Treasure Mountain MegaPack
summary: Stack Up the Love of Captain Marine!

name: HorSteal
summary: The journey of a thief horse targeting the Louvre's Mona Lisa begins! Control 4 legs and neck individually in this physics action game. Steal masterpieces, sell loot, and upgrade your hideout. Ready? Take the first hoof towards the Mona Lisa!

name: Hot Worlds
summary: Fight. Learn. Team up. Win. Fighting her way through inter-dimensional arenas and escapades, Val the all-star fighter must defeat baddies and amass her crew along her way to win fame in not just one, but every world.

name: Hoversteppers: Zone 1
summary: Hoversteppers is a freestyle hoverboard skating game. Flip, spin, and test your boarding skills with timed challenges across multiple stages.

name: Home From Work 3
summary: You arrive home after a long day at work to your new modern day home. You spent a few days at the home and everything seemed to be normal; but, today, you begin to discover paranormal occurrences. Walking, talking, strange noises and even moving furniture begin to happen more frequently. It is now time to see what evil spirit lurks in the third home in Home from work 3.

name: Home Deco Builder
summary: Brings you the joy of building miniature interiors and create your own cosy home designs as you want. Simple, relaxing and fun!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Challenge Accepted Edition
summary:
Build your collection!
The very best of the Hot Wheels universe is here!

Get behind the wheel of the coolest, fastest, and most legendary vehicles, with their own personality, driving style, and levels of rarity. Discover all their unique attributes and how to use them to face every track and challenge. And with the Livery Editor make your ride a one-of-a-kind masterpiece of speed!

The Challenge Accepted Edition includes:

- Game: Hot Wheels Unleashed
- Hot Wheels Pass Vol. 1
- 2 Sided Poster
- Steelbook Case
- Bone Shaker Diecast

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Hacked
summary:
Version 4.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the Everlasting Flames arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Haxxor Bunny (Bronie)
• New Story Chapter XXIII: The Solo Stage
• New Featured Event: Arc: Light Bound
• ...and more!

name: Horror & Adventure Pinball
summary: Enjoy 6 games in one with the perfect reproduction of real pinball machines, with all kinds of graphic details and sounds. If you prefer, you can also purchase them separately in the Nintendo eShop.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Dreams of Gemina
summary:
Version 3.1 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Blueberry Blitz (Liliya), Molotov Cherry (Rozaliya) & Drive Kometa (Bronya)
• New Chronicles: Dreams of Gemina
• New Featured Event: Honkai Kingdoms
• ...and more!

name: Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II
summary: Hornet Virus: Steel Alcimus II is a sequel of Steel Alcimus inspired by various 1980-1990s' 3D computer games. Pilot the deadliest helicopter in this action-packed 3D game. Destroy the targets, rescue the hostages, and capture the enemy buildings to save the world!

name: Holy Intentions
summary: Holy Intentions is a fast-paced ultraviolent FPS set on a divine scale. You are the Crusader, chosen to punish the wicked. Armed with a Dragon and devastating holy powers, tear apart an evil cult that controls the entire world.

name: Holiday Jigsaw Christmas
summary: HO HO HO! Unforgettable adventure waits you in Holiday Jigsaw! Start your journey with a Merry Christmas!

name: Horror Adventure: Zombie Edition
summary: Horror Adventure : Zombie Edition is a zombie shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. There has been an outbreak of a mysterious virus killing people and transforming them into zombies.
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Holy Potatoes! Compendium
summary:
Welcome to the Holy Potatoes veggieverse! The home of wacky and wonderful spudtacular sim management games available in a box for the first time.

The bundle contains three games - ‘Holy Potatoes! A Weapon Shop?!’, ‘Holy Potatoes! We’re In Space?!’ & ‘Holy Potatoes! What the Hell?!’ - all mashed into one Nintendo Switch chip.

name: Hololive GoroGoro Mountain DX
summary:
Push your favourite to the very top!
A must for hololive fans!
A fun and easy 3D action game — just keep pushing!

name: Hostile Dreams 2
summary: An extremely challenging psycho-horror platformer with unique ragdoll controls – made of my dreams.

name: Hollow Cries
summary:
Play as a young child struggling with issues of being alone, and trying to find answers to why life ends. But sometimes a child can make mistakes and can have poor judgment at times, as you try to find peace you decide to use Ouija board to find the truth and stop the feeling of being alone. Yet the things that talk back in the dark aren’t always what they seem. The more you ask, the more you feed your curiosity and the more dangerous it becomes. 
 
FEATURES 
- Simple controls 
- Randomized AI 
- Free Roam 
- Unlockable modes

name: How Much Items: Food
summary: Game genre find hidden objects.

name: Horny Warp: Hentai Fantasy
summary: Horny Warp is an erotic game that blends visual novel and village-building elements. Embrace the role of the Savior with the help of six seductive girls. Play minigames, upgrade buildings, and build your relationships!

name: Homefront: The Revolution - Freedom Fighter Bundle
summary: The Homefront: The Revolution 'Freedom Fighter' Bundle includes the base game and Expansion Pass, entitling the holder to major single player expansions, and valuable bonuses for your Co-Op career!

name: Hot Air 2
summary: Sequel to our balloon blowing original. Bosses and surprises galore!

name: Hot Wheels: Tropical Wave Customization Pack
summary: Palm trees, waves, surfboards… enjoy a tropical paradise from the comfort of your couch! Customize your Basement and your Unleashed Profile with exclusive elements inspired by beach life… don't you feel like you're on vacation already?

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Jurassic World Racing Season
summary: Put yourself to the test with the breathtaking Jurassic World Racing Season! Oversized fun and new challenges to get vehicles and customizations inspired by Jurassic World!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Thanksgiving Pack
summary: It's time to say thank you, 3 times, with a triple gift for your collection: Hot Seat, a toilet-on-wheels, to flush the rivals away. Rigor Motor, a die-hard racing coffin for your Death matches and to end with a bang BMW 3.0 CSL Racing!

name: Horrors of the North
summary: A single player game in the 2D Survival Horror genre with puzzle elements. In the game, evil spirits will constantly pursue you, you can outwit him if you are careful. There are many puzzles to solve along the way. Hardcore mode features screamers. A game based on northern horror stories. You play as a hunter in search of a lost dog.

name: How I Flex With AI
summary: Guys, who gets it?! This is basically a mashup of The AI Show-Off Counterattack Guide for Socially Anxious Otakus and a Goofy Campus Sweet Romance Drama — I laughed so hard my abs cramped up!

name: Horrid Henry's Big Box of Pranks
summary:
TIME TO GET HORRID AND PLAY SOME PRANKS! 
 
Big Box of Pranks is a fast and funny, action-packed collection of mini-games based on Horrid Henry’s love of pranks and mischief. 
 
Featuring your favorite characters and all of Henry’s nemeses from the BAFTA nominated TV series; play through a wide range of fast moving mini-games. The difficulty level increases as you progress through all the pranks, becoming more and more frantic until you lose all your lives!

name: HoloReality
summary:
This mod started from a chat session about learning to map and ways of improving.

The idea is to allow maps that are not normally released to be part of something bigger and that keeps growing.

It was original conceived for Half-Life 2 / Orange Box but could easily be extended to other single player games.

In retrospect it is clear that HoloReality was influenced by a Half-Life mod called Project Quantum Leap and Portal, although at the time of concept it didn’t seem that way.

name: Hot Wife Tara: Nocturnal Desires
summary: HWT is a choose your own adventure story that puts you in the shoes of Harry, a married man who, along with his wife, Tara, want to embark on a sexual journey together. With multiple branching paths and eight unique endings, can you help Harry ensure that his wife has the best birthday of her life?

name: HoloParade: Deluxe Edition
summary: A lively parade with hololive VTubers and mascot characters!

name: Hogwarts Legacy: Collector's Edition
summary: This collector's edition comes with a floating wand and book case and the game in a steel case and collector's box.

name: Hogwarts Legacy: Onyx Hippogriff Mount
summary:
This includes: the Onyx Hippogriff Mount.

Hogwarts Legacy is an open-world action RPG set in the world first introduced in the Harry Potter books. Embark on a journey through familiar and new locations as you explore and discover magical beasts, customize your character and craft potions, master spell casting, upgrade talents and become the wizard you want to be.

Experience Hogwarts in the 1800s. Your character is a student who holds the key to an ancient secret that threatens to tear the wizarding world apart. Make allies, battle Dark wizards, and ultimately decide the fate of the wizarding world. Your legacy is what you make of it. Live the Unwritten.

name: Hoops Madness
summary: The intense physical basketball play, fast-paced action, and many thrilling and fun arcade game modes will leave you breathless as you take over the court in a larger than life arena surrounded by exhilarating sights and sounds that only the pros get to experience. With all sorts of thrilling and fun arcade game modes that you can’t do anywhere else but in Hoops Madness⏤you’ll never want to play in reality again!

name: Hot Shots Golf
summary: The first game in the Hot Shots Golf / Everybody's Golf series, now ported to PlayStation 4 and 5 with trophy support, rewind, and quick save and load features.

name: Hotel Tome ws
summary: Hotel Tome ws is a short Point-and-Click adventure set in a pop-up book. Puzzle your way out of the hotel room you’re trapped in by combining items cleverly and don’t mind the amnesiac protagonist breaking the 4th wall!

name: Hollywoodle
summary: Six Degrees of Kevin Bacon meets Wordle. Connect the two actors with movies they've starred in or costars they've shared in as few moves as possible!

name: Hoshizora Navi
summary: Japanese DS title, Hoshizora Navi (Star Sky Navigator) charts the night sky, helping you identify stars and planets and other heavenly beings. It contains a special cartridge with a sensor, that let's the game know where, in the night sky, you are aiming the DS.

name: Hop N' Swap
summary: 2D platformer where you swap between three characters with different movement.

name: Hocus Opus
summary:
Short visual novel created for the Spooktober 6th Annual Visual Novel Jam.

In this game you will be able to meet different creatures from the imagination world, as well as their struggles. The good news are that, since tonight is Halloween and you are the one deciding how the story goes, you might be able to help them.

name: Hololive CouncilRyS RPG
summary: Hololive CouncilRyS RPG is a fangame and love letter to Hololive CouncilRyS, built in RPG Maker MZ with custom art assets by me and original musical arrangements of Hololive songs by Jeremy Robson. Expect the game to be about 3 hours long.

name: Hotel for Dogs
summary:
So many strays, so little time.

The dogs have run amok and now it's up to you to keep them from the pesky dogcatcher. You must clean, feed, and play with them or else you'll all end up in the doghouse.

Search for parts and tools to build over a dozen amazing gadgets that help you take care of and protect your dogs
Feed, groom, and play with dozens of playful pups
10 levels of challenging game play

name: Hot Dish
summary:
Welcome to the world of HotDish, where knowing your way around the kitchen is a recipe for success.

Build your career one dish at a time as you start at the bottom of the culinary ladder as a line cook in a local Italian restaurant with dreams of one day becoming a world class 5 Star French chef. Master the timing and accuracy needed to bring simple dishes to the table by executing their various steps and combining ingredients at the right times to create a finished product your customers and the critics will love! Earn stars for each finished dish and use them to unlock more complicated recipes, kitchen power-ups, and mini-games. If you can't stand the heat - get out of the kitchen.

name: House Painting: Simulator
summary: Enjoy the most realistic and fun house painting simulator you’ve ever seen!

name: Horizon
summary:
Horizon is a turn-based space strategy game of galactic exploration and conquest in which you are in control of humanity’s destiny.

You will explore deep space, find new frontiers and discover alien artifacts hidden on long-abandoned planets. You will also learn more about the galaxy as you come into contact with ten other species, each with their own unique culture, history and schemes. 

A fully interactive galaxy allows you to navigate open space between stars and planets. Patrol your borders and, when the need arises, defend your territory by engaging in ship-to-ship tactical combat. Develop new colonies and then watch them become galactic centers for trade, industry and science - and of course military bases, outposts and shipyards to build your battle ships. Push your empire to its limits and go beyond the known horizon.

name: Hot Chase
summary:
Hot Chase is an arcade game released in 1988 by Konami.[1] In the game, players drive a white Porsche out of an enemy country to the Border crossing of a friendly one. The car has a bomb attached to it that explodes in a set time. If the bomb explodes, players must restart. There are many obstacles along the way, including railroad crossings, military checkpoints, helicopters that shoot at the car and other cars. The gameplay is said to be similar to Chase HQ.

Completing the game resulted in a scene where the hero exits the car, takes his machine gun, and fires at the car to add to the damage before the bomb explodes. Then the game played the following message: "Mission Complete. You have succeeded in stealing the enemy armored super car and have crossed the border to freedom. After a few days the enemy surrendered to our country. You will be remembered for your brave deeds. Thanks a million!"

name: Hoping This Finds You Well
summary: A visual novel with a cute mechanic: Slide the letters back and forth across the screen, to experience the time the letter is written, and when it is read. Follows the interactions between two people in a game intended to emulate Victorian and Edwardian letters.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Deep Enigma
summary:
Version 3.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the 'From the Deep Ocean' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Argent Knight: Artemis (Rita), Phantom Iron (Rita) & Striker Fulminata (Mei)
• New ELF System with 2 ELFs: Jingwei's Wings & Blood Embrace
• New Story Chapter IX-EX 2: Dark Serpent
• New Story Chapter X: Under the Deep
• New Team Raid: Eye of the Deep
• Level Cap Increase to 82
• ...and more!

name: Hot Dog Reporter
summary:
Hot Dog Reporter is a (very early access) game about a hot dog in a hurry.

It's a fast paced platformer with a speedrun mode that will eventually turn into a metroidvania with a mystery to solve and charmingly weird characters to meet (and a speedrun mode). Once the linear levels are iterated on enough to finalize Hot Dog Reporter's mechanics, gameplay will begin to spill onto the sprawling, interconnected city streets of New Yorkshire City.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Stars Derailed
summary:
Version 7.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter VI: Wails Stifled by the Silent Shadow
• New Part 2 Open World: Ruimu, The City of Eternal Night
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Thousand-Faced Maestro: Cameo (Sparkle)
• New Crossover Event: Honkai: A Fool's Hand
• New Event: Snazzy Cards Club
• ...and more!

name: Hold Your Breadth DX
summary: Play as a squishy slime trough this spooky, 80´s inspired, puzzle / adventure, and remember to Hold Your Breadth.

name: Horripilant
summary: Horripilant is a chilling incremental dungeon crawl through the horrors of a forgotten underworld. Combining idler, puzzle and autobattler elements, you'll fight, mine, and think your way through the depths of a forsaken dungeon.

name: Hotdog Hazards
summary: Hotdog Hazards puts you in Tony's shoes, a highly trained grill master and undercover agent for the Galactic Tasteforce. Save the world by serving hot dogs to alien tourists, or fight for survival one hot dog at a time in challenge mode. Wishlist now to prepare for the grill of a lifetime.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Unstoppables Pack
summary: Talk about the opposites attract. On the one hand, the elegant lines of a bullet made to hit the track like F1 Racer. On the other, a massive concentration of unstoppable power like Sand Burner. Having them in your collection will get you past any obstacles!

name: Hop on It
summary: Hop your way to the top with a pogo stick! Alone or with friends, take on a tough challenge in a harsh forest as you climb towards the finish.

name: House with Puzzles
summary: An unexpected inheritance has forced you to come to your grandfather's mansion. Grandfather was not an ordinary man, but a former NKVD officer. The house is filled with various puzzles. And to find the will you need to solve all of them.

name: Hot Slice: Lust Exposed
summary: Dive into Hot Slice: Lust Exposed, an exciting adult puzzle adventure! Use innovative cutting mechanics to solve engaging puzzles and unlock 14 steamy sex scene rewards featuring a variety of sex scenes. Dodge enemies and clear areas to reveal tantalizing content!

name: How to Raise a Wolf Girl
summary: Shuuji and Kana have their hands full teaching Iroha how to be human again, after she spends ten years in the mountains with a wolf god. But who's really raising who?

name: Hololive All-Stars Battle Tiles
summary: This game is a four-player battle game that combines the strategic aspects of mahjong with the health gauges of fighting games. A total of 25 Hololive talents are featured! Battle with your favorite talent! A total of 25 Hololive talents are featured! Battle with your favorite talent!

name: Hole Digging Simulator 2025
summary: Dig deeper for priceless secret discoveries.

name: Horizons Light
summary: A luxury deep-space vacation cruiser is mysteriously drawn off course and crash-lands on an uncharted multi-world orbiting within a strange gravitational anomaly. The vessel is shattered across floating islands suspended above a glowing abyss. Find the survivors and get out of this world.

name: Hot Roads
summary: "Hot Roads" is an arcade motorcycle racing game. You are driving a fast motorcycle on an endless highway with heavy traffic.

name: How to Be a Complete Bastard
summary:
This game is based around cult ‘alternative comedian’ Ade Edmondson’s book of the same name. Having gate-crashed a party full of sophisticated well-behaved types, you must do everything you can to be seen as hateful, yobbish and immature – a Complete Bastard.

The house has several rooms, each of which are filled with objects which are of use, as well as unlimited supplies of food, alcohol and coffee, which control how drunk you are at a time – some awful actions force you to be sober, others force you to be drunk. The game also displays whether you need the toilet (or, more accurately, any part of the house that would cause offence), whether you need to fart, and how strong-smelling these are.

The rooms can all be viewed from multiple angles, and 2 can be viewed at a time through a split-screen view.

To win, you need to prove to all 16 party guest that you are a complete bastard.

name: Hololive Dreams
summary: An upcoming rhythm game from QualiArts, based on the Virtual YouTuber agency, hololive.

name: Horizon Chase Turbo: Senna Forever
summary: A homage to the legendary driver Ayrton Senna, this Expansion Pack brings an entirely new set of cars, tracks, and features to the game, inspired by Senna's career.

name: Homam: An Inventor's Fist
summary: Experience a unique 2D pixel art platformer where satisfying pounding mechanics meet brain-teasing puzzles. Step into Homam’s shoes, a skilled hero with a powerful fist, and help the legendary inventor Al-Jazari on a time-traveling quest. Solve puzzles, and conquer challenges with agility and wit

name: HorD: High or Die
summary: HorD is an arcady highscore-driven Twin-Stick-Shooter set in a dystopian Drug Film universe. The player is orderd by the ominous "Chick" to collect samples of a new drug named FLOW, but instead ends up using it, creating a drug induced gorefest and fighting his own nightmares.

name: Hoi Hoi
summary: A turn-based strategy-puzzle game released by Koei for the FM-7 and PC-88 in 1983, later remade as Stop That Roach for the Game Boy in 1994. The gameplay is similar to later tower defense games, with the goal being to protect confectionaries from cockroaches.

name: Hot Shots Golf Fore!
summary: A PS2 classic, Hot Shots Golf Fore! is the fourth installment in the ClapHanz series of interactive golf titles. Boasting 24 playable characters and 15 courses, the game includes tournament play, VS mode, mini-golf, and 4-player local multiplayer mode.

name: Home is Where the Heart is
summary:
'Home is Where the Heart is' (HiWtHi) is a survival horror visual novel in which the choices you make determine the fates of the three love interests.

You play as Doe (name and pronouns customisable), a person who has been trapped in this house for longer than you can remember. It's only when three uninvited guests arrive do you see your first hope of escape. But, whoever trapped you here doesn't treat your newfound friends as kindly as they do you.

Will you do all you can to help any of the LIs survive until the end? Or will you be the one to sabotage them, taking the side of your mysterious captor... who may be closer than you think?

name: Horizon Chase
summary: A racing game for iOS and Android. Inspired by Outrun and Top Gear.

name: Horizon Chase Turbo: Rookie Series
summary: A new campaign tailored for new players. Bring your friends and family together into ROOKIE SERIES!

name: How to Get a Japanese Girlfriend (And Save the World)
summary: Immerse in a tale of love & peril in Japan, battling kaiju. Choose between three captivating women, each with unique skills, as you navigate romance & danger. Stunning visuals & mature themes await in this thrilling adult visual novel. Will you find love amidst chaos?

name: Honey Dress Up
summary: 'Honey Dress Up' is a simple dress up game, but with a cute boy!

name: Horrid Henry's Horrid Adventure
summary: Run, swim, climb, jump and ride as you travel through multiple sets of fantasy-themed levels, learning new abilities as you go. Encounter strange enemies as you travel across the Evil Empire, Lovely Land and Pirate Island, all based on the Horrid Henry brand. Select from three crazy weapons that will help Henry on his way. Trap enemies in bubbles and blow through the microphone to blow them off the screen. Features: Three fantastic worlds based on the Horrid Henry brand to explore. End of level bosses featuring characters from Horrid Henry’s world. Variety of often bizarre enemies & obstacles to overcome. Fantasy themed story allowing Henry to visit many different locations where Henry’s imagination becomes a reality! Three weapons to choose from - each proving a unique playing experience. Collect bonus items to unlock weapons & complete levels. Comic strip sequences to introduce & progress the story and move player from one world to another. Dual screen game play, jump from one screen to the other.

name: Hortal
summary: You need to escape from caves. Use holes to teleport and have fun!

name: How to Survive 2
summary: Dead or Alive? Make up your mind, stranger. We don’t like that undead business here in Louisiana… Survive solo or with friends as you look to fulfill your basic needs of food, water and shelter, crafting your own tools and weapons while you secure your camp and face flesh hungry zombies.

name: How Much Items: Weapon
summary: Game genre find hidden objects.

name: Hools: Football Club Territory
summary: All of us can see the power of football fans community in real-world. Every match, every championship, you can see crowds on stadium and millions in front of the TV. This phenomenon is not just about watching some guys playing, it's about people, about community around theirs club, theirs team. Why then do not move it into virtual world? To allow an ordinary football fan to be like characters in Green Street Hooligans, but without real violence and hooliganism? We didn't see any reason why not, and after few months of work, we can proudly present:

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: A Lightful Love
summary:
Version 8.5 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter X: Reunited Under the Light of Faith
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Hi♪ Love Elf♥ (Elysia)
• New Featured Event: With You! Youthful Dreams
• ...and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Into the Yawning Chasm
summary:
Version 2.1 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Acheron, Aventurine and Gallagher
• New Trailblaze Mission: The Devil in Velvet
• New areas: Clock Studios Theme Park and Dwlight Pavilion
• New event: Vignettes in a Cup
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!

name: Hover: Revolt of Gamers
summary: After their first game "The Secret of Space Octopuses", and after winning the first prize of the 32 hours during Retro Game Jam 2013 of Montpellier (France) with their "Super Commodore Holy Tank Soccer Deluxe", the 3 indies of Fusty Game are back with "Hover: Revolt of Gamers", a futuristic parkour game. Currently in development since november 2013 and based on new technologies like the "Oculus Rift", it takes place in a 3D futuristic open world. The new Mayor of Hover-City is prohibiting video games and all sorts of entertainment. Anyone catched in such a act would be send to hard labour. You play the "Gamers". They created the Resistance to help citizen to get back their consoles, create a diversion among the Cops while others are hacking the Mayor propaganda . In front of Non Playing Characters and other players in multiplayer you have to show your skills (speed race, triks, agility, speed hacking, diversions...). Other Gamers will join you during the adventure. Try to become the leader of the Resistance!

name: Hope & Elpis
summary: Hope & Elpis is a deck-builder roguelike where you play as a magical girl with two souls. Transform into the ancient mage Elpis, wielding Orbs to battle enemies. Learn diverse spells, unleash the Orbs' power, and seal calamities in Eden.

name: How We Know We're Alive
summary: A free hour long melancholy, point-and-click narrative mystery set in the bible belt of Sweden.

name: Holy Fire Meow Meow: Special Forces
summary: "Holy Fire Meow Meow: Special Forces" is a top-down shooting game featuring cats as the main characters. You will play as Elusa, a special forces soldier from the feline tribe, infiltrating enemy territory to defeat the forces and rescue your trapped comrades!

name: Holy Hoop
summary: Relax and shoot hoops on a heavenly basketball court. Perfect your aim and power to take full advantage of the point multiplier system. Basketball skins are rewarded every 3 hours. Buy, Sell or Trade all through Steam!

name: Home Survival
summary: Home Survival is an open-world game that is a unique combination of first and third person shooter, survival, crafting, and role-playing games. Experience your own path. Whether it's building the home of your dreams, tending to your crops and watching the sun go down.

name: Hop Rocket
summary: A minimalist one-tap arcade game where players slingshot a rocket between orbiting planets using precise timing. Each tap launches the rocket toward the next planet, while shrinking orbits and increasing speed raise the difficulty. Short sessions, instant restarts, and score-based progression encourage repeated attempts and mastery.

name: HoleHole
summary:
"HoleHole" is a relaxed adventure game where players freely explore a map, collect objects, and assist residents through conversations. The game features a visual novel-style storytelling experience and allows players to progress at their own pace.

One day, the player accidentally falls into a certain hole and freely explores the dungeon to find objects and search for residents. However, it is also a player's choice to not engage in exploration.

name: Home Malone
summary: This is Harold Malone. His Job was furloughed. Now he is... Home Malone.

name: Honor of Heirs
summary:
Assemble the mightiest medieval Order and dominate the land of Avalon!
Embark on an adventure to create the most epic hero tale!

name: Home Sweet Home: Survive
summary:
Home Sweet Home: Survive is an asymmetrical game that consists of 1 Specter hunting 4 survivors in an arena. There are two core gameplays depended on the role players take.

The Specter is to strategically hunt 4 Survivors letting no one escape, and not being killed by survivors. Each Specter will have different stats and special abilities offering various ways of hunting survivors.

The survivors have to cooperate to complete the objective. Each character will have different stats and unique abilities supporting each role of play - decoy, damage, or perform the rituals. Things will drastically change after the objective is completed. The game will test personal dilemma choosing either teaming up to eliminate the Specter or saving own self by leaving the arena.

name: Hot MILF VR
summary: HOT MILF VR is a VR game that lets you watch a bald dick fuck a juicy woman named Alice in a nightclub restroom! Alice loves to suck and fuck! She also loves to have her pussy licked. You can watch it all in this beautiful game!

name: Homeworld: Emergence
summary:
