Discover what a demonic presence is capable of doing in Home from work 2

name: House of Evil
summary: House of Evil - atmospheric survival horror with a first-person view, in which you can test your nerves for strength. The events take place in the mansion that exists in reality. The main character is an ordinary philistine, his wife is an exorcist, after an unusual telephone conversation, the protagonist can not call to the spouse, and decides to go in search of her, fate takes him to an old mansion where unimaginable things begin to happen. Four horsemen of the apocalypse moved into the owners of this mansion, if the riders get out on freedom - come the end of the world. The last hope of humanity is our main hero. You will have to solve interesting puzzles, mix herbs, create different potions, consecrate water, study spells in Latin, and use it all against evil spirits, demons and other evil spirits.

name: Hot Cam
summary: Nancy wants to share her naughty and cute pictures, but she is a shy girl. She needs your help!

name: Horse Evolutions
summary: You are a Horse. As a Horse with a freeform camera, it is you -vs- the world, surviving the elements & avoiding being captured. Increase your herd through your offspring, extending your lineage. Either play casually, exploring vast environments or go deep into the story & see how your Horse evolves.

name: Homehead
summary: Short story of home who lives in head

name: Hot Wheels: Race Off+
summary: Hot Wheels: Race Off+ is pure adrenaline sure to get your heart racing. Can you master the tracks and build the ultimate car collection?

name: HoneHone Zaurus X: Chou Gattai! Build & Battle
summary: "Honehone Saurus X Super Combination! "Build & Battle" is a "build" where you can fully enjoy the assembly and reassembly that is the biggest appeal of the long-selling toy confectionery 『Honehone Saurus』, and you can control the original Honehone Saurus created by that build You can enjoy two types of "battles" where you can enjoy action battles.

name: Hodgepodge Hunch
summary: Hodgepodge Hunch is a who-done-it game where everyone chips in to make a hotpot dish. Collaborate with your buddies to collect ingredients in the dungeons and whip up a delicious feast. There's just one problem... A backstabber may be lurking among you who'll throw your dinner plans awry...

name: Horrorillo Brainrotillo
summary: When Tralalero turns from Tralala to AAAAAAAA! Brave the haunted Sahur mansion, where shadows hide zombini memini lurking to hunt you. Solve puzzles, escape doom, and beware: they're not just rotting your brain—they're coming for what's left.

name: Hotline Miami: Collected Edition
summary: Japan gets the two Hotline Miami games bundled together, for digital on PS3/PS4/Vita and physical for PS4 and PS Vita.

name: Horgihugh and Friends
summary: Shoot down 16-bit bad guys in Horgihugh and Friends! At the end of a brutal war, countries decided to dismantle their weapons. When the Gozareans attack, two retired pilots realize their trusty vintage fighter planes are the only means of combating the a…

name: Horde Survival Bundle Xbox: Andromeda Survivors, Beyond Border, Farmer Survivors, Primal Survivors, Shield King
summary: Get ready for intense action and endless battles against swarms of enemies in this special Horde Survivor game bundle!

name: Horse Isle 3: Infinite Wilds
summary:
Welcome to the newest in our series of family friendly games made for horse fanatics! Clean, nonviolent fun, with some education tossed in! Grand adventure and real world horse genetics await you in this, our third installment.

HI3 is fully 3D, yet retains the unique charm of the previous games. Your horse's performance and actual look are based on its genetics, just like the real world. No two horses look or behave alike. Come discover your special horses!

Along the way, make friends with some of our great playerbase. HI3 players are helpful and fun folks! This is a special place :)

name: Hold the Mine
summary: Explore and defend your mine against waves of monsters in this innovative roguelike survival game! Collect and manage your resources, discover buildings with unique effects and unleash mighty heroes to hold monsters out of the mine until the sun rises.

name: Hold your houses
summary: Have you ever been in a robbery and didn't have weapons to defend yourself and your house? Well now you can, with hold your houses you have a variety of weapons to use to help you defend yourself, your house and take on those unwanted robbers. The robbers are highly skilled and know how to gain access, they carry weapons such as a pistol, assault rifles and shotguns. Buy your weapons out of cupboards and off walls using points earned. Barricade windows and doors to slow them down, giving you time to make a move.

name: HorrorDriven: A story for the road
summary: HorrorDriven: A story for the road takes survival horror into new territories. Explore, survive and solve mysteries in procedurally generated open world environments. Travel the road and scavenge for resources in abandoned locations while avoiding the dangers of an unforgiving and dynamic world.

name: Hoops: Shut Up and Jam 2
summary: A version of Barkley: Shut Up and Jam 2 without the player's license.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn Remastered
summary: Experience the critically acclaimed Horizon Zero Dawn with stunning new visuals and upgraded features. In a far future where colossal machines roam the Earth, pockets of humanity survive in unique tribes among the lush, overgrown ruins of our long-lost civilization.

name: How to Fish
summary: You and your friends are out drinking and boating. You crash into a small island where you have to fish using everything from fishing rods to assault rifles. Sell your catch, earn money, buy better fishing gear, and defeat boss fishes to unlock new islands and finally make it back home.

name: Hot Wheels Velocity X
summary:
When a criminal gang of street-racing villains overtakes futuristic Monument City, you must put their driving skills and mean street machines to the ultimate test.

Hot Wheels: Velocity X is a game based on Mattel's Hot Wheels line of miniature racing vehicles. In the game you have to drive one of over 30 Hot Wheels cars in race on the 3D curvilinear tracks, which include banded loops or crazy stunt launchers. During the race the weapon attacks and power-ups are available. The racing is mission-based with more than 37 missions across six levels to complete.

name: Hotdog Hustler
summary: Fry meat, stack buns, and serve sketchy customers fast.  Set prices, upsell extras, or pocket shady bribes. ️ Handle weirdos who want ketchup… or chaos.  A gritty, lo-fi PS2-style hotdog sim with janky charm.

name: House of 1,000 Doors - Family Secrets
summary: What secrets do these souls share with Kate Reed, a struggling writer hoping to recapture her past success? These lost souls cannot move on. To save them, you must guide Kate between these mind-bending worlds as you explore the House of 1000 Doors.

name: How Was Your Day?
summary:
Caught in a strange time loop and with her beloved dog, Beans, missing, 13-year-old Diya discovers that building meaningful connections is key to solving the sinister mystery in this beautifully illustrated 80s-themed narrative adventure. Can Diya break free from the endless cycle and find Beans?

Video game enthusiast and moody 13-year-old Diya’s day starts out rough. It’s the late 80s, and on top of the usual teenage angst—school, bullies, cliques, and annoying adults—Diya’s just moved to a new country, has no friends, and her once-close relationship with her brother is souring. Ugh! But when the only light in her life, her beloved dog Beans, vanishes without a trace, and she finds herself trapped in a mysterious time loop, Diya’s day goes from bad to worse.

Groundhog Day meets Stranger Things in this narrative-driven, point-and-click adventure that brings a supernatural twist to an ordinary teen’s life. Journey through Diya's repeating day, where every interaction could hold the key to breaking the loop and unlocking the truth about Beans' disappearance.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - For the Sun is Set to Die
summary:
Version 3.4 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Phainon, Saber, and Archer
• New Trailblaze Mission: "For the Sun is Set to Die"
• New areas: Aedes Elysiae
• New collaboration-themed event
• ...and more!

name: House Party: Business and Pleasure Style Pack
summary:
This DLC includes several new clothing and hairstyle customization options for the House Party characters.

All of these items can be customized like other House Party clothing items. Mix and match these new items and existing items to create incredible character designs! The transformation options are endless!

Select each item's primary and secondary colors and metallic properties. Then choose one of the over 100 patterns and customize the pattern's color, size, rotation, embossing, glow, and metallic properties. Add a decal to make it even more your own and then share it with the House Party community with our new design sharing feature!

name: How to Lose One's Virginity
summary: "How to Lose One's Virginity" is an adult visual novel that describes the process of self-discovery... and hot beauties. Playing the role of a loser, are you able to change your life and become someone women are very fond of and build your own harem?

name: Hollow Treats
summary:
You're out alone this Halloween, which would be fine under normal circumstances. But recently there has been increasing cases of people being infected by an unknown parasitic entity causing people to becoming increasingly more aggressive.

There are signs of course, but unfortunately for your, you're face blind. You can't rely on normal human body language to guess who's who. That's why you need to carefully peek into people's homes to find out the truth. Do you have what it takes to get the most candy this Halloween?

name: House of the Golden Mask
summary: Awaken your magic and break an ancient curse at a secret school of sorcery! What mysteries will you uncover at this crossroads between realms? A text-based fantasy novel, 280,000 words and hundreds of choices, without graphics or sound effects.

name: Home Again
summary: Home Again is an interactive story game about Jason, a man stuck in an endless loop of work who adopts a stray cat. Discover Jason's journey through the eyes of his little cat friend as they meet Melissa, a caring florist who will change the way Jason sees the life.

name: Hot Robot
summary: Strap yourself on for this First-Person Shooter with sex toy projectiles. Battle other dong-launching players in P2P multiplayer games like Capture the flag, Team Deathmatch, and Conquest.

name: Hold Me Still
summary: "Hold Me Still" is a point-and-click puzzle mystery game where you investigate your friend's disappearance by exploring their house, collecting clues, solving puzzles, and uncovering the truth.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn: Collector's Edition
summary: The plot revolves around Aloy, a hunter and archer living in a world overrun by robots. Having been cloistered her whole life, she sets out to discover the dangers that kept her sheltered. The character makes use of ranged, melee weapons and stealth tactics to combat the mechanised creatures, whose remains can also be looted for resources. A skill tree facilitates gameplay improvements. The game features an open world environment for Aloy to explore, divided into tribes that hold side quests to undertake, while the main story guides her throughout the whole world.

name: House of 1,000 Doors: Serpent Flame - Collector's Edition
summary: House of 1000 Doors - Serpent Flame Collector's Edition awaits! Ancient evil long lurked in the bowels of earth, now surfacing more destructive than ever. Monstrous snakes leave humanity amid a fiery abyss and only you carry the hope of salvation. In the safety of the house of 1000 doors you receive a mission. Change the past to safe the future in House of 1000 Doors - Serpent Flame Collector's Edition!

name: HopSquash!
summary: HopSquash! is a fast & simple local couch multiplayer game, easy to get into and great for parties. Jump on your friends and rack up points! Easy for non-gamers or kids to pick up & play! Up to 8 players on the same game, multiple levels, and a level editor, with full gamepad support!

name: House Sitter
summary: Explore the wacky world of House Sitter, and discover what secrets lie in wait. Meet new friends! Choose their fate!... Uncover who you truly are. But most importantly, get those chores done before Mom comes home.

name: Hot & Steamy Knights
summary: Our hero's quest to grow his harem appears to be thwarted after his ship is sunk and he washes up on a mysterious island with nothing but his "sword" to keep him safe. Luckily for him he soon encounters mature & beautiful knights who make perfect candidates to spend some hot and steamy nights...

name: Homefront: The Revolution - Beyond the Walls
summary:
The second American Revolution has been crushed by the KPA occupation forces, and Philadelphia - last stronghold of the Resistance - is about to fall.
In America’s darkest hour, a glimmer of hope appears when a NATO agent makes contact from beyond the city walls with a desperate call for help. They claim to have information that could finally end the occupation - but can the Resistance reach them before the KPA close in…?

name: How to shoot a criminal
summary: Plunge into the dark ambiance of the 30's through the memories of a journalist working under an out-of-control editor who has become dangerous. Find the videos, the records, the radio programs and the reporter's notebooks. Piece the story of a unique newspaper together. Unlock its secrets. Bring it down from the inside.

name: How 2 Escape Collection
summary: How to Escape Time is running out! Each wagon is timed in different ways that you’ll discover. Running out of time means defeat. The longer you wait, the more difficult it is to see clearly...

name: Horrid Henry's Krazy Karts
summary: Play as Horrid Henry or race head-to-head as Rude Ralph, Moody Margaret, Perfect Peter, Brainy Brian or Singing Soraya and win cups and upgrades to become the ultimate Horrid Hero! Customize your kart in the workshop for extra advantage. Win perfect power-up tokens to leave everyone else standing! Control your kart as you swoop over awesome jumps and dodge obstacles, gross goo and loads of smelly snot slime! Multiplayer Mode to play with friends and create your own levels to challenge and share as you race through forty challenging levels in four fantastic themed locations.

name: Hostages
summary: Due to the limitations of the hardware, this version of Hostages reduces the visual fidelity considerably, with some stages being in tinted monochrome.

name: Honest Rod's Rollback Rally
summary: Odometer fraud score chaser.

name: Hoomeez
summary:
Hoomeez is a Multiplayer Casual Arcade game that grants the player control of a Hoomie, a cartoonish avatar that the player will use in competitive play across many small levels and matches with dozens of other players participating in it.

The player will compete with the mass of other players across levels to be the last man standing, and scoring points for their overarching experience and unlocking prizes and new avatars to compete with. The players compete in different game modes in many different maps and environments, including Racing, Ball Games, Elimination Hazards, Coin Collection, etc.

name: Holy Paladin Cynthia
summary: A classic RPG about one girl's journey to save the world—and become a true Holy Paladin!

name: Hogwarts Legacy: Deluxe Edition
summary: This edition comes with the Dark Arts cosmetic set and Thestral mount, as well as the Dark Arts battle arena and 72 hour early access to the game.

name: Hot Wheels: Jetz
summary:
A miniature crisis is happening and only you can stop it. Who or what could be trying to take over your home? Jump into your tiny, toy-size plane and fly missions of bravery to solve the mystery and save the day. Perfect your piloting skills as you dodge enemy fire, or command your fighter's missile guidance system to lock-on and crush your opponent. Perform cool aerial stunts as you speed through Jetz's realistic 3-D house. Fly at supersonic speeds using the turbo boost, then stun the enemy by hitting the air brake and stopping on a flying dime.

Hot Wheels Jetz delivers big fun, colorful environments, and a hangar of zippy, toy-size planes. Choose from seven different aircraft, all based on original Hot Wheels Jetz designs. Buzz through eight challenging household environments from the living room to the bedroom and out into the garage. Monitor your hits, missiles, and more with onscreen displays. You'll be asked to accept 10 missions, along with one bonus mission that must be completed to spare your home from certain doom.

name: Holo's Hanafuda
summary: Holo's Hanafuda is a banter-filled card game battler fully voiced by and featuring hololive talent!

name: Hobo
summary: Hobo was developed and published by Emerson Radio Corp., which was released in 1983. This is essentially a Frogger clone, albeit the road is diagonal and you play a bum/hobo instead of a frog.

name: Hollow Home
summary: Hollow Home is an isometric narrative RPG about the russian invasion of Ukraine, told from the perspective of a teenager trapped inside an occupied city. Learn survival skills, build relationships and face tough choices as each passing day brings new tragedies and destruction to your childhood home.

name: Hotel Perkkow and the Two Vegetarian Werewolves
summary: Let's keep it simple. Detective arrives to Bucarest. Missing guest in a small hotel. And hawaian pizza. If you want to know how those things blend together... Just press the start button.

name: How to Take Off Your Mask: Remastered
summary:
A cute otome game about a human girl who suddenly turns into a catgirl.

The remastered version of "How To Take Off Your Mask" was remade in Unity, with a graphic overhaul for the UI, interfaces, character animations, CGs, and backgrounds. Linux support has also been added.

name: Holy Grain
summary: Holy Grain is an absurd and hilarious roguelike, packed with tons of events, crazy battles, and one simple goal: blindly follow the counselor's orders. Your army's gonna have your back as you smash through those objectives, and the entity will always be there to protect you.

name: Hoshizora he Kakaru Hashi
summary: Kazuma moved to Yamabiko-chou due to his younger brother Ayumu’s health and ended up staying at the Yorozuyo inn, owned by his father’s friend. On his first day at school, he got lost and asked for directions from a fellow student, Ui. She led him on an offbeat path and he accidentally fell and kissed her. Coincidentally, this was all seen by Ui’s friend, Ibuki, who thought he was a bad guy and declared him to be an enemy.

name: Honey Bunny
summary: Honey Bunny is a bartender at Lucky Rabbit's Foot Casino, the cutest casino in all of Starlight City! She's busy at work when the no-good gang, The Cool Cats, steals away the casino and the entire city's supply of cocktail cherries. Chase them down as Honey Bunny using your ears to headbutt enemies, grab items, and platform around the city as you recover as many cherries as possible!

name: Hot Wheels: Crash!
summary:
Hot Wheels: Crash! is a Hot Wheels game released for PC in 1999. It was the fifth Hot Wheels video game.

The object of the game, as the title states, is to crash cars into buildings and structures in each level in order to earn points, with 100 being the goal. The game includes a total of 12 different vehicles and 25 different levels. There are 3 difficulties, and on each difficulty, there are 6 levels. Once 100 points have been scored on each level on any given difficulty , a 7th level for that difficulty is unlocked, which in turn unlocks a special level afterwards. Once every special level for each difficulty has been fully completed, a final level is unlocked. There were also six downloadable levels available by entering the password "1234", though the downloadable levels are now lost due to the shutdown of the site.

name: HorrorBox
summary: HorrorBox is a Multiplayer Horror Game dripping with an eery cinematic experience set in the 80s. Utilize tools and work together to survive either PvE or PvP fright nights...

name: Hotel Infinity
summary:
At Hotel Infinity, every detail has been prepared for your arrival. Every corridor leads somewhere you’ve never been, and no room is ever quite the same. Explore at your leisure, but don’t wander too far. Designed entirely for roomscale VR, the hotel unfolds around you in impossible ways.

We hope your stay is eternal.

name: Hoppin: Into the Woods
summary: In Hoppin: Into the Woods, master precise dashes to navigate challenging puzzles and collect carrots. Place objects strategically, find creative routes, time your actions perfectly, and interact with curious forest creatures to solve each unique level.

name: Hoesa Kiugi
summary:
This is a company management simulation game that anyone can easily play.

In this game, you can decide the name of the company and raise the company.
Also, you can hire a company employee.

Raise your company and make it the best company. Good luck!

name: Hoops Ahead: Basketball Manager
summary: A new basketball league has been founded! Manage, trade, and sign players to help lead your team to a championship.

name: Hokuto no Ken 5: Tenma Ryuusei-den Ai Zesshou
summary: Hokuto no Ken 5: Tenma Ryuusei-den Ai Zesshou is a role-playing video game produced by Toei Animation released on July 10, 1992 for the Super Famicom in Japan. It is the third and final RPG produced by Toei based on the Hokuto no Ken franchise, following Hokuto no Ken 3 and Hokuto no Ken 4, both for the Family Computer. Hokuto no Ken 5 features an original storyline, written once again by Hiroshi Toda with plot supervision by Buronson, set in an alternate universe from the original work's canon where a new hero must unite the warriors of the Hokuto, Nanto, and Gento schools to defeat a common enemy.

name: Horny Kingdom: Cum Delivery
summary: Horny Kingdom is a visual novel with tower defense elements. Free your kingdom from goblin armies, save the most beautiful princesses and they won't remain in your debt, helping you not only in battle but also bringing the lewdest fantasies to life!

name: House of Rules
summary: Congratulations! You're hired as a new waterer in Black Kiwa. Water the plants, and we'll pay you 30 G per hour. You'll never find any other job this generous. No, we're not hiding anything from you. If you just follow the work rules and stay out of trouble, everything will be fine.

name: Housewarming Gift
summary: Remmie's bestie Nunu invited them both to her friend Mira's housewarming party. Not only is Remmie waking up hours late, completely forgotten all about the thing until just now. Nunu isn't responding to her messages, so maybe she's there already? With only one way to find out, Remmie ends up leaving and thinks to herself.

name: Hot Shots
summary: Freeze the arrow at the perfect moment to aim. Will you make the shot? Or will you choke and freeze under pressure?

name: Home Office Simulator
summary: Home Office Simulator is a relaxing and cute simulator game about the experience of a girl called Ayame, working remotely. Part of the game is to keep Ayame free from distractions and keep her focused.

name: Hockey Club
summary: An up to 6v6 online multiplayer hockey game. Customize your build for each position (goalie builds coming soon). Form a team with your friends, or search for a game as a solo. Choose a position at the start of the game and control your player with a controller. Trade positions at intermission.

name: Hoppup!
summary: Hoppup! is a difficult climbing-platformer where you attempt to hop your way to the top of the world! Make strange friends along the way and eat Pineapples whenever possible.

name: Hot Wheels Let's Race: Ultimate Speed - High Voltage Speed Pack
summary: Turn up the power with the High Voltage Speed Pack! Race the futuristic Power Surge and sleek Mach Speeder, build with electrified track parts, and customize with 6 exclusive high-tech decals. Get ready to light up the track!

name: Honogurashi no Niwa
summary: Hono Kurashi no Niwa is a life simulation game set in a quaint countryside village. While cultivating farmland and raising livestock, you can hunt, fish, and deepen your ties with your fellow villagers. A relaxing, heartwarming pastoral lifestyle awaits!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Part 2 - Extinguished Starlight and Rekindled Fire
summary: Follows the Dreamseeker, an engineering student from the cyberpunk-inspired metropolis of Oxia City, as they embark on a journey to explore the Sea of Data through the Anchor of the Apocalypse. Along the way, they will encounter new companions and friends, and uncover the ancient secrets of the Honkai war and the enigmatic Goddess who has long watched over the planet. Their adventures will lead them on a mission to save the Martian bubble universes from falling into the corrupting power of the Sea of Data, eventually leading to the meeting of the people of Earth and Mars.

name: Hope VR: Emotional Intelligence Assistant
summary: H.O.P.E is designed to be a calming experience in Virtual Reality that allows you to disconnect from the stress of the real world, and reconnect with your self in one of the many spectacular environments available, along with guided breathing exercises.

name: Howard Phillips Lovecar
summary: A top-down driving shooter. It's like Devil Daggers + GTA1 (Kill Frenzy!). You try to kill lovecraftian monstrosities with a shotgun (and more) while driving a car. Also, lots of evil cultists to mow down. It's a short, intense score-attack affair. Stop The Great Old Ones - or die trying!

name: Hourfall
summary: Hourfall is a fast-paced character-action RPG where you wield three unique clock hand blades, fight fantastic servants of Time, and race against a ticking timer while in combat.

name: How Your Package Gets Delivered
summary: Perfect For Fans Of: Endless runners Reflex-based games Arcade-style challenges Indie action-platformers

name: Hoppy Square DX
summary: It's hip to be square, and no square is hipper or hoppier than a Hoppy Square!

name: How to create a witch
summary: Claudia, a young girl who once saved the Demon Continent as a powerful mage, now sets out on a new journey. She infiltrates a mysterious cult in search of her long-lost younger sister, from whom she was separated in childhood. Will Claudia be able to find her sister safely?

name: Hotdog Man
summary: This is a recreational puzzle game.

name: Hoard Defender VR
summary: Hoard Defender VR is a casual arcade VR game about defeating enemies as they try to take your hoard! Buy upgrades and toss enemies to keep them from draining all your gold and stealing your most prized possessions, the dragon rubies you keep lying underneath your mound of gold.

name: Horizon Chase Turbo: Summer Vibes
summary: Summer Vibes is HORIZON CHASE TURBO first DLC. Featuring the most classic arcades roadster, you'll love to put your sunglasses and feel every mile of this warm coast to coast experience.

name: Horoboshi-hime
summary: This is a small and concentrated Roguelike RPG. It offers short but crunchy battles and powerful growth. It is a simple adventure that the protagonist alone takes on, but a series of profound choices are continuously pushed upon you.

name: Hope in the City
summary: 17-year-old Hope Song returns home from school to find her parents missing. Use Hope’s observant eye as an artist to investigate, piece together clues, and uncover a dark world beneath the surface of her peaceful life in this non-linear narrative mystery game.

name: Horizon Walker
summary:
Eat God, and you will have everything—the story of a human who devoured God.
Horizon Walker is a turn-based RPG with a unique storyline and captivating graphics. ​
Join forces with stunning characters from beyond the dimensions and fight against the gods.​

name: Hollowing
summary: Play as a student who is alone outside. He is constantly under academic and social pressure. As anxiety and loneliness accumulated, he began to notice something unusual. In this inescapable fear, he must find the answer... or be consumed by it.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Finest Duel Under the Pristine Blue
summary:
Version 2.4 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Yunli and Jiaoqiu
• New path for March 7th: The Hunt
• New Trailblaze Continuance: Finest Duel Under the Pristine Blue
• New area: The Shackling Prison
• …and more!

name: House of Usher
summary:
Nell'introduzione, con grafica relativamente elaborata, si vede il personaggio che, arrivato in carrozza, entra nella tetra casa. A questo punto il giocatore ne prende il controllo e affronta le varie stanze della casa, tutte con visuale fissa di profilo e ambiente composto da piattaforme e scale a pioli. Il protagonista può muoversi su piattaforme e scale e saltare, evitando di cadere da altezze elevate o da eventuali buchi sul fondo dello schermo. 
 
La prima stanza è una reception, dalla quale il giocatore può raggiungere tutte le altre attraverso le rispettive porte numerate. Ci sono 8 stanze che si possono affrontare in qualsiasi ordine, poi altre due che diventano accessibili solo dopo aver completato tutte le altre: una stanza del tesoro e una finale dove si deve comporre una parola segreta. In ciascuna stanza si incontrano differenti e strani pericoli tra cui cannoni, pavimenti che scompaiono, mostri, pistoni che schiacciano. L'obiettivo è sempre raggiungere la porta di uscita, da cui si ritorna alla reception, ma a seconda della stanza possono esserci altri compiti da svolgere prima, come raccogliere tutti i frutti.

name: Horse Runner DX
summary: Horse Runner DX is a wholesome, fast-paced platformer with a twist: You play a whole herd of horses! Combine different horses and power-ups, complete increasingly difficult challenges, chase new highscores and enjoy the ride from cute to chaotic fun.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed
summary: Collect the best vehicles in the Hot Wheels universe, build spectacular tracks and dive into breathtaking races. The most iconic and sought after Hot Wheels vehicles are waiting for you. Get ready to make them race at full speed!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Speed Kings Pack
summary: A statement of style and speed on the track. Supercharge your collection with the vehicles of the Speed Kings Pack! The fearless and stunning Impavido 1, and the technological Electro Silhouette, to make your victories even more electrifying!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Manga Free Pack
summary: Directly from the Japanese comics comes an exaggerated duo of vehicles all wings and spoilers! The overpowered speedster Mad Manga and the roadster version Track Manga are ready for crazy rides and oversized fun!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Fast & Furious Expansion Pack
summary: Step into Dom's Garage, where you can transform your cars into true four-wheeled powerhouses, and experience the thrills of Fast & Furious with the most adrenaline-pumping set of cars inspired by the films!

name: How to Survive: Heat Wave - Jack's pack
summary: This DLC contains a fireproof suit that prevents fire damage on Jack and grants the ability to craft incendiary ammunition.On a tropical island night, all you need is some fireworks to bring a smile to your face, right? Well, now you can light ‘em up all on your own.

name: Hollowforge
summary: Hollowforge is a fast-paced stealth/action FPS where you explore a decaying mining complex overrun by monstrous experiments. Sneak, shoot, and survive using an array of weapons while conserving resources. Uncover the dark secrets of a megacorporation in this atmospheric, immersive world.

name: Homesickness
summary: HOMESICKNESS is a point-&-click psychological horror indie game exploring the nuances of nostalgia.

name: Hooligan James
summary: Hooligan James is a gangster first-person open-world set in the fictional city of "Lost Jersey". Wanna shoot guns and drive like a maniac? Got the urge to punch people and get in trouble with the cops? Look no further, this is the game for you!

name: Hotel Renovator
summary: Build the hotel of your dreams! You’ll welcome guests from all over the world. Use your starting cash to rebuild and furnish as many rooms as possible. Create a place that smacks the golden age, a new exclusive hotel. Get that 5-star review!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Deora II
summary: Put yourself in the shoes (or more likely beach sandals) of Vert Wheeler and hop in this fabulous masterpiece from Highway 35 World Race. Ride the wave of success with the legendary Deora II with Wave Rippers livery.

name: Horde of Viscount
summary:
Step into a land infested by the massive Horde of Viscount

Traverse through both classic-vania stages and regions with exploration where you use subweapons for your advanced movement. Be wary, you only have a limited amount of these subweapons. Instead, you must plan your actions wisely. Use the Dash Knife to attack your enemies from far away? -or perhaps use it to flee?

name: Hostile Lands
summary: Hostile Lands is a 2D top-down, roguelite shooter where a crash landing is mistaken for an act of war. LOOT hundreds of unique guns. ENHANCE your skills. RESCUE surviving crew members and ESCAPE...if you can.

name: Homescapes
summary: Homescapes is a mobile game developed by Playrix that combines match-3 puzzle mechanics with home renovation simulation. In the game, players join the main character, Austin the butler, in his quest to help his parents restore their old family mansion to its former glory. The gameplay primarily revolves around completing match-3 puzzle levels to earn stars, which are then used to progress in the renovation process.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Legendary Edition
summary: Turbocharged - Legendary Edition and get the full game, Season Pass Vol. 1 and Vol. 2, and 8 vehicles.

name: HoGuru Presents: The House With Too Many Zombies In It
summary: HOGuru Presents: The House With Too Many Zombies In It is a new action game from the writer of hit horror film COME TRUE! Set during a zombie apocalypse, it tells the story of Crash Bromwell, who has been chosen by god to save the world - unfortunately, he was not also told HOW to do that.

name: Honey Trap Escape: Family of Villains and the Cage
summary: I found a book in my father's bookshelf......from this day, my life has changed. I was being chased by a bunch of maids and the four woman in charge of the mansion... Let's escape from the mansion!

name: Hotdog: The Videogame
summary: Solo or with friends, manage multiple hot dog stands in a dynamic and realistic business simulator. Sell fast food, customize it with unique toppings, upgrade your equipment and buy your dreamed restaurant. Serve demanding customers against the clock to achieve efficient greatness.

name: How I Met My Healthy Hentai Neighbors!
summary: The third installment of ClockUp's popular Healthy Hentai series (How to Live a Healthy Hentai Lifestyle! and How a Healthy Hentai Administers Public Service!): How I Met My Healthy Hentai Neighbors! Featuring art by Butcha-U and the cast of the previous two titles, and many new and exciting erotic situations!

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - The Foal Care Pack
summary:
In this pack, you will find:
The possibility of having foals in the game
2 new “Cow-boy” outfits

name: Holy Justice: Galaxy Outcast
summary: A cosmic bullet-hell roguelike. Holy Justice is an exhilarating arcade shooter where you upgrade your ship with Core Enhancers, create unexpected combinations, discover unique devices at critical moments, and unleash outrageously powerful builds.

name: House of 1000 Doors: Palm of Zoroaster
summary:
Return to a sinister, unsettled House ...very different than the one you remember. The power of a cursed gem has unleashed a murderous plague that extends far beyond the House s walls; and you must employ your psychic abilities to stop these evil spirit using your seek & find skills. 
 
Break the power of a cursed gem! 
 
Travel to exotic locations throughout the world in search of the artifacts that can destroy this wicked presence. Solve a massive array of cleverly designed puzzles and ingeniously hidden objects as you unravel in this story of supernatural intrigue, unbounded adventure and sweeping scope. 
 
The House needs you. 
 
Will you answer its call?

name: Howloween Hero
summary: A spooky trick-or-treat adventure about a mischievous puppy on a mission to score the evening's best candy. Create your costume, explore the neighborhood, and help your friends track down a menacing monster to save Halloween.

name: Houkagou Colorful Step: Undou-bu!
summary: Houkago Colorful * Step: Undoubu! is an otome game, developed and published by honeybee+, which was released in Japan in 2014.

name: House of Tarot
summary: House of Tarot is a tarot divination title for the Game Gear where the player gets a tarot reading in Japanese using the Rider–Waite tarot cards. The game was published by Sega for a Japan-exclusive release.

name: Homeplanet
summary:
Homeplanet is a computer game in the space simulator genre, developed by Revolt Games in 2003. Homeplanet became a prequel to the game Neuro due to the temporary suspension of its development. The game is currently only released on the PC platform.

The FLYM engine is also used for another series of games, Babylon 5: I've Found Her.

Homeplanet is notable for its implementation of a real Newtonian flight model, which allows the player to use the fighter's capabilities more widely. It is advisable to use a joystick, almost all keyboard keys and several combinations are used in the control.

In 2004, an official add-on to Homeplanet was released - Homeplanet: Playing with Fire.

name: Honey Peach
summary:
Honey Peach is an unlicensed strip rock-paper-scissors, or Ro-Sham-Bo, game for the NES/Famicom. Ports also exist for the publisher's own console, the Q-Boy, as well as for the Game Boy in the form of 4-packs.

The goal of the game is to win two out of three rounds of rock-paper-scissors with a girl to get her to take off an article of clothing. There are six girls, each with three stages of attire before getting fully nude. After winning against a girl, you are given a password to the next match. You can enter the password in the beginning of the game after the start screen to go straight to your favorite girl.

name: Hot Cross Buns
summary: Learn to cook some fresh Hot Cross Buns, the recipe is surprisingly easy to make.

name: Horde Together
summary: Strategize, scavenge, and survive as you battle through relentless hordes, upgrade your arsenal, and gear up for the ultimate fight for survival. How long can you last before the apocalypse claims you?

name: Homecoming
summary: It is an indie psychological horror game in which you must solve the mystery behind the Dewey family while various entities try to hunt you down and torment you. Will you be able to survive and escape this infinite loop?

name: Honey's Sweet Revenge
summary: Honey's Sweet Revenge is a metroidvania with mechanics inspired by platform fighters. Customize your item loadout and defeat enemies and bosses.

name: HotBunz
summary: Hot Bunz is a physics-based 2D Platformer Party Game with one goal - players must navigate their characters through an obstacle course with rotating rings to collect as many gold coins in a series of increasingly complex levels.

name: Hotel Magnate
summary: Have you ever wanted to design and manage your own hotel, motel, resort, or tent? With a ridiculous amount of customisation tools to wield, a host of facilities to build, and a wide variety of guests to impress, Hotel Magnate has it all. Let your inner hotel manager shine!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Back to Earth in Evernight
summary:
Version 3.6 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Evernight and Dan Heng • Permansor Terrae
• New Trailblaze Mission: "Back to Earth in Evernight"
• New areas: Grove of Epiphany and Universal Matrix
• New game mode: Anomaly Arbitration
• New events
• ...and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Before Their Deaths
summary:
Version 3.5 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Hysilens and Cerydra
• New Trailblaze Mission: "Before Their Deaths"
• New areas: Styxia
• New main event: Chrysos Maze Grand Restaurant
• ...and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - The Fall at Dawn’s Rise
summary:
Version 3.3 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Hyacine and Cypher
• New Trailblaze Mission: "The Fall at Dawn’s Rise"
• New areas: Fortress of Dome and Cloudedge Bastion Ruins
• …and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Even Immortality Ends
summary:
Version 1.2 of Honkai: Star Rail, which included:
• New characters: Blade, Kafka and Luka
• New main story quest: Topclouded Towerthrust
• New areas: Alchemy Commission and Scalegorge Waterscape
• New companion missions for Kafka and Yukong
• New events, including Tales of the Fantastic,Underground Treasure Hunt and Where Are You, Mystery Trotter?
• …and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Celestial Eyes Above Mortal Ruins
summary:
Version 1.3 of Honkai: Star Rail, which included:
• New characters: Dan Heng • Imbibitor Lunae, Fu Xuan and Lynx
• New main story quest: Obsequies Performed, A Long Road Ahead
• New area: Aurum Alley
• New companion missions for Dan Heng, Luka, March 7th and Lynx
• New main event: Aurum Alley's Hustle and Bustle
• New Simulated Universe mode: The Swarm Disaster
• New QoL changes: Trailblaze Power System Optimization and Phone Wallpaper
• …and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Then Wake to Weep
summary:
Version 2.2 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Robin and Boothill
• New Trailblaze mission: The Fool Always Rings Twice
• New areas: Dreamflux Reef, Soulglad Festivity Auditions and Penacony Grand Theater
• New quality of life updates
• New main event: Clockie Dreamjoy Memoir
• …and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Jolted Awake From a Winter Dream
summary:
Version 1.4 of Honkai: Star Rail, featuring:
• New characters: Jingliu, Topaz & Numby and Guinaifen
• New main story quest
• New areas: Old Weapon Testing Ground and Pillars of Creation
• New companion missions
• New main event: Aetherium Wars
• …and more!

name: Home: Postmortem Edition
summary: Play the complete indie horror classic, now with a brand-new Postmortem Mode — a guided tour by the developer that brings you behind the scenes as you play the game! Awakened by an oncoming storm, you open your eyes to discover yourself in a strange, dark room — tucked away in a house that’s not yours. Find your way back home — but be careful, because each choice you make can change your story in ways you might not expect. FEATURES: - The complete, original indie horror classic, rebuilt for Nintendo Switch - Multiple endings and story variations, depending on your choices and actions - Innovative new Postmortem Mode provides a guided tour of how the game was made, as you play it — straight from the developer - New behind-the-scenes Gallery complete with design documents, process images and other creepy, real-world artifacts

name: Hoplegs
summary: Hoplegs is a different kind of platformer with unconventional controls. Each of the four buttons on your gamepad where you usually jump, interact, crouch and change weapons are now your different legs.

name: Hot Wheels: Skaters Customization Pack
summary: Turn your Basement into a real Skaters' Paradise with the special Hot Wheels - Skaters Customization Pack: 8 super cool decorations and 3 items for your Unleashed Profile. Hit the track and challenge your opponents in your own temple of skate!

name: How to Train Your Dragon
summary: Challenge your friends to become the ultimate Viking hero. Create your dragon, with countless ways to customize their looks and abilities! Complete challenges to increase speed, power, fire, and more.

name: Horizons: The End Of Words
summary: Humanity has written all there is to write about anything and everything. Words will soon lose all meaning. Find fragments of lost words drifting in space and explore the universe through your prose.

name: Howl
summary: HOWL is 2D action-shooter with crowd simulation. In that game enemies will try to get you killing other monsters and building alive stairs on high obstacles. If you won't plan your actions and research the area in calm minutes of game process then a little crowd could get you to trap, where you will waste all patrons and will be torn apart. In the game word you always have to search the weapon and ammunition, and listen very carefully. Sounds can inform you about impending or be its cause. The shout that will be not in time could cause big troubles.

name: Horizon Forbidden West
summary: Horizon Forbidden West continues Aloy’s story as she moves west to a far-future America to brave a majestic, but dangerous frontier where she’ll face awe-inspiring machines and mysterious new threats.

name: Horror Cartridge Collection
summary: A collection of retro styled games bundled together, experience many forms of horror in a wide array of styles whilst uncovering the mysteries of the old mall that holds them all.

name: Hopetown
summary: Hopetown is a narrative-first isometric RPG with psychological complexity, resonant storytelling, and seismic conversations. Things will change under your nose and under your heel. Words will be your weapons, and you'll make your own truth.

name: House Flipper Remastered Collection
summary: House Flipper Remastered Collection lets you become a one-person renovation crew. Clean, build, decorate, and sell for profit! Now with better graphics, voice acting, all expansions in one toolbox, and some more heartfelt addition. It’s flipping time!

name: HonRang
summary: You wake up in a lecture room. The hallway loops endlessly, and there is no exit.

name: Hotelnomaly
summary: Hotelnomaly is an endless loop anomaly hunt game where you play as a mechanic hired to fix an elevator in a lonely 1930s hotel. Discover eerie anomalies, navigate haunted corridors, and uncover dark secrets.

name: Hotel Galactic
summary: Hotel Galactic is a cozy management game inspired by Studio Ghibli's classic pictures. Build the tourist destination of your dreams, oversee and unite your staff to forge a quirky family, and make new friends as you explore this wholesomely nostalgic world.

name: Hockey Legacy Manager 25
summary: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional hockey team!

name: House of Nowhere
summary: Survive a merciless hunt in the House of Nowhere. Alone in a haunting home that no longer feels like your own, you must solve puzzles to escape into a vast, silent forest. Scavenge for your life and uncover the truth before the ancient thing hunting you turns your story into a forgotten legend.

name: Hot Wax
summary: Hot Wax is a falling-block puzzle game where you place candles and then light them up to create slowly-unfolding chain reactions in a gloomy temple built to some unholy creature.

name: Hokkaido Rensa Satsujin: Okhotsk ni Kiyu
summary: A man's corpse is discovered near a sea wharf in Tokyo Bay. While the police investigates, a 2nd and 3rd murder occurs one after another. You begin your investigating with Shunsuke Saruwatari, a detective from the Kushiro station, and seek the truth to discover the criminal's motivation. An examination of the relation between the victims exposes a important details from the past.

name: Home Alone
summary: Harry and Marv, the bumbling "Wet Bandits," have paid their debt to society and are now ready to get revenge on the youngster that caused them their humiliating defeat Kevin McCallister. They have arranged for Kevin's family to be out of the house when they come calling again, leaving him home alone for their rematch. This time, the sneaky thieves have beefed up their gang with robbers and crooks that are more than eager to help themselves to the McCallister valuables. Only the resourceful Kevin stands between the new Wet Bandit gang and his family's fortune.

name: Holder of Place
summary: Holder of Place is a Roguelike Auto-Battler Card game. Recruit different follower cards, arrange them, watch them fight ever-stronger enemies. Along the way, unfold a dark science-fantasy tale of a ruined kingdom, meet strange characters, and visit exotic locations.

name: How the Leopard Got His Spots
summary:
Bring Rudyard Kipling's classic tale to life with animation, sounds, videos, games, and the music of South Africa.

More than a story, it's a engaging learning experience that lets you explore the people, animals, music, and art of Africa --or explore Kipling's life and writings.

Surprises appear just by clicking your mouse. Click the animals and watch them play a game of ring toss! Keep clicking to bring 15 beautifully illustrated pages to life.

Children at all reading levels can build their skills by listening to the story, reading along as Danny Glover narrates, or clicking on any word to hear it pronounced or defined through sound, video, photos, and animation.

Discover more just by clicking words in the story. You'll never know what you'll find!

Play four enriching, challenging games for hours of fun. You can play alone or with P.J. Rabbit. Choose the Traditional African stone game called Mancala, put together a puzzle, paint the animals with crazy camouflage, or match music.

From "Just So Stories" by Rudyard Kipling, author of "The Jungle Book" and winner of the Nobel Prize for Literature.

name: Home Sweet Home
summary: Home Sweet Home is a first-person horror adventure game based on Thai myths and beliefs. The core gameplay focuses on storytelling and stealth to avoid perilous spirits hunting you. Moreover, few puzzles are added into the game, making gameplay more various. While playing this game, you will be thrilled by a horror Thai atmosphere, unpredictable scary moments and challenging gameplay!

name: Hoser Hockey
summary: Retro arcade hockey! Create your own teams and challenge your friends or the AI in fast paced shinny action. Play Hoser Hockey with up to eight players both locally and online.

name: Homunculus Meat
summary: Horror games have a creepy atmosphere and sudden scares, so many people don't like them. Have you ever wanted to try a horror game but couldn't because you were too scared? This game is designed with maximum consideration for people who don't like horror games.

name: Hot Wheels: Retro Game Customization Pack
summary: For all of us who spent hours at the Arcades, this pack will take you back in time to the glorious 8-bit years! Pixelated style for Basement and Unleashed Profile with a retro touch everyone will love, even those born in this millennium.

name: Hotel Sowls
summary: Hotel Sowls is a mysterious adventure game with unique and appealing 2D graphics. As an pharmacologist, you managed to get a valuable and mysterious stone after a hard journey and you decided to take a break at the Hotel Sowls. But the next morning, someone in the hotel stole the stone!

name: Hook
summary: Hook is a minimal, relaxing, puzzle game.

name: House Flipper 2
summary: It's time to dust off your hammer - House Flipper is back in a brand-new fashion! Buy and renovate run-down houses! Or maybe you want to build new ones? Now you can! Start as a rookie Flipper and make a fortune by helping out the community of the charming town of Pinnacove.

name: House of Caravan
summary: Taking place in a single mansion in Candlewood, northeast USA, in the early 20th Century, House of Caravan is a sinister adventure filled with dark secrets and vexing puzzles.

name: Hollow 2
summary: Once again, you are on board Shakhter-One. Traverse the deck of a well-known mining ship and depths of Mark's twisted mind blended together. What really happened to this place? How your past is connected to the present events? Run, fight, hide, explore – do your best to destroy Shakhter-One.

name: Hololive Gorogoro Mountain
summary: Push your favorite to the top! A simple and fun 3D action game—just keep pushing!

name: How Many Dudes
summary: How many dudes does it take to beat up 1000 toddlers? A gorilla? Twelve bears and a horse-sized duck? A GOD? Enter the Dude Ranch and find out.

name: Holes
summary: In this horror game, mysterious hands drag the hero underground, and the player's task is to get out to the surface to return to your usual work. All the action of the game takes place in dark and stuffy tunnels, in the absence of light.

name: Holidays
summary: Help a dog find their way home in this fantastical magical furry RPG!

name: Hot Sento Girls and love
summary: Hey, wanna warm up with me?

name: Hoo-Boy
summary:
HOO-BOY! 
This is a very interesting and exciting game! Don't trust?

name: Hollow Bequest
summary: As a legendary detective, the disappearance of a former mentor provokes a return to your humble beginnings. Every clue reveals the dark secrets that haunt the town. What should have been a quick investigation gradually became a struggle for your life and freedom. Who or what is responsible?

name: Houkago Cinderella
summary: A school romance visual novel with the theme of exciting after school confessions and romance with the heroines, through various romantic situations and events on the way home from school.

name: Homeshift
summary: Guide a young boy through fears and dark caverns, in hopes of reaching a happy home. Homeshift sees you platforming in diverse environments, utilising your wits and tools to overcome challenges in creative ways.

name: Horizons of Achaea
summary: A story-driven turn-based JRPG where you explore floating islands, chart forgotten skies, and command your airship with both ground battles and tactical aerial combat.

name: Hole Dweller
summary: Hole dweller is a sandbox incremental furry porn game! You are the captain of a caravan, with spare rooms, not to worry there are plenty of cute and hot characters to fill them with.

name: Hocus Focus
summary: A cozy gamified focus tool to help you work, study, or relax to soothing tunes. Customize your space and summon your focus with productivity tools. You’re a student in a magic university - control time and weather, unlock new locations, collect cute Mitzkins, and level up in-game and in real life!

name: Hocus Focus
summary: A cozy gamified focus tool to help you work, study, or relax to soothing tunes. Customize your space and summon your focus with productivity tools. You’re a student in a magic university - control time and weather, unlock new locations, collect cute Mitzkins, and level up in-game and in real life!

name: Honest Helper
summary: Honest Helper is a top-down strategy game where you use time manipulation to defeat all enemies without any casualties. This cute and charming game will challenge your tactical and decision making skills for hours on end.

name: Hollowbody
summary:
A tech-noir survival horror short story, set in the urban decay of a long abandoned British city.

It's a Shipper's biggest fear. You're grounded in the exclusion zone, twenty miles of death and decay sealed off by the towering, suffocating walls erected after the collapse.

Play as Mica, an unlicensed black market shipper who will stop at nothing to find her missing partner.

Alone, stranded, and with limited resources at your disposal you'll have to push your way through the zone, solve environmental puzzles, manage resources and fight for your life as you try to find a way to escape beyond the wall.

name: Hoshi Ori Yume Mirai: Perfect Edition
summary: Hoshi Ori Yume Mirai: Perfect Edition is a remastered version of the Hoshi Ori Yume Mirai, with upscaled CGs with new scenes from the console versions.

name: Horrific Xanatorium
summary: A world where Spilia, a virus that causes delusions and hallucinations, has become epidemic. A horror visual novel game set in a hospital where patients are isolated.

name: House
summary: House is a survival-horror game where you play as a young girl exploring an ever-changing House.

name: Hotel Architect
summary:
Step into the chaotic 24/7 lifestyle of a hotel owner as you design and build grand hotels across the globe. Juggle the increasingly elaborate demands of disorderly guests, logistical nightmares and unexpected obstacles in Hotel Architect, the ultimate hotel construction and tycoon management game.

Advance in a career campaign mode, with a variety of objectives to complete, in order to unlock the sandbox mode across each location.

Create your own hotel from scratch or transform a dilapidated plot into a thriving business. Design the layout and hire construction workers to lay the foundations and build different facilities across multiple floors. Building requires careful planning, as it plays out in real-time, so be careful annoy, disturb or remove items your guests are using – or else they might leave a bad review!

name: Home Sheep Home: Farmageddon Party Edition
summary: Join Shaun the Sheep and his friends Timmy and Shirley on this epic adventure journeying through underground caverns, negotiating the busy streets of London and teleporting through outer space all in search of the green, green grass of home. Let's Ewe This! Overcome the fiendishly challenging puzzles by working as a flock with new multiplayer features, using each sheep’s unique abilities to solve challenges and shove, leap, squeeze and swim through underground tunnels, abandoned mineshafts - and even evade the guards at Buckingham Palace. All new multiplayer Baaa-tle A brand new suite of action-packed, Shaun the Sheep movie themed party games bring some extra-terrestrial chaos to the farm with a visit to the Farmageddon theme park where you can compete with family and friends in a series of madcap fairground games hosted by Shaun’s new alien pal Lu-La, who has crash-landed near Mossy Bottom Farm. Lovingly Lamb-made animation "Brought to you by award winning animation studio Aardman the game features a beautiful hand-painted and traditionally animated art style, spectacular environments and endearing character animation. Reviews for Home Sheep Home 2... “It's like some sort of adorable vortex you never want to leave...there's something to be said for a game that goes out of its way to excel at style and quality, and Home Sheep Home 2 definitely has both by the bushel.” 4.7/5 – Jay Is Games “What’s more impressive about this game is how little is reused. Basic puzzle mechanics stay throughout (only by stepping on the button can you open the door) but the…

name: Horror Tale 2: Samantha
summary:
Start a scary adventure and be the first to solve all the mysteries of this horror game!
You'll have to immerse yourself in a thrilling and exciting adventure together with the main characters! Children have been missing for a long time in Lakewitch, and you are destined to solve this creepy mystery. Who is the kidnapper, and why is he doing it? Where are the children disappearing to, and how to save them? You can solve all the puzzles and find out the answers...if you don't get scared!

In this part of our horror, you will meet Samantha and try to get out of prison with her. You will get to know new secrets of the terrible kidnapper, which will lead you to new frightening discoveries. On the way to your goal, puzzles, icy moments of fear, unexpected twists and turns, and lots of fun await you!

The story will develop rapidly and very unpredictably. This horror game is an exciting, fun, and scary adventure to America of the '90s!

name: HoloBall
summary: HoloBall plunges players into an action-sports arcade arena inspired by one of the most iconic games of all time. Use your paddles to hit, smash and bash the HoloBall past your opponent to score. Learn and master skillshots to outmatch your increasingly difficult opponents.

name: Hotel Dash Suite Success
summary: When Quinn's new travel business hits a snag, she needs Flo's patented elbow grease to help renovate and run hotels all over DinerTown! As Flo, you will deliver guest's luggage, drop off room service and provide extra towels, blankets and anything else they may need to stay happy and leave big tips! Along the way you will use your tips to decorate and restore each hotel back to its original charm. Watch out for the mysterious mishaps and accidents that threaten your progress! Do you have what it takes to keep everyone happy, or will the mysterious troublemaker halt your success?

name: Hot and Lovely 2
summary: This is an interesting casual origami game that can exercise your hands-on ability. And when you pass all the levels, you can start the hot sex journey between you and the beautiful girl.

name: Horizon Forbidden West: Complete Edition
summary:
In this complete collection with Horizon Forbidden West and Horizon Forbidden West: Burning Shores DLC, take on more awe-inspiring machines, meet new tribes, and travel to the treacherous archipelago of Los Angeles!

Horizon Forbidden West: Complete Edition will be available for $69.99 USD / €59.99 / ¥7,980 and includes:

Horizon Forbidden West for PS5
Burning Shores DLC for PS5
Digital soundtrack
Digital art book
Horizon Zero Dawn Vol. 1: The Sunhawk digital comic book*
In-game items:
Extras in Photo Mode (special pose and face paint)
In-game items unlocked via story progression:
Carja Behemoth Elite outfit ·Carja Behemoth Short Bow
Nora Thunder Elite outfit
Nora Thunder Sling
Apex Clawstrider Machine Strike piece
Resources pack

name: Hospital 666
summary:
A Single and Multi-player Horror Game.

You wake up in an endless hospital.
You can only use the front or rear elevator.

If you see something strange, turn back.
If you see something strange, turn back.
If you see something strange, turn back.

What will you find on floor 666?

name: Holomento
summary:
Holomento is an indie permadeath RPG focusing on the dangerous quest of passing through the mysterious Eventide Hollow – and rebuilding it step by step.

Explore a hand-crafted open world featuring procedurally generated dungeons!
Fight your way through Eventide Hollow – again and again!
Rebuild the Hollow and release it from its ruinous curse!

name: Home Sheep Home 2
summary: Join Shaun, Timmy and Shirley as they journey through over 60 levels of underground caverns, negotiate the busy streets of London and teleport through outer space all in search of the green, green grass of home. Use each sheep’s unique abilities to shove, leap, squeeze and swim your way through underground tunnels, abandoned mineshafts - and even evade the guards at Buckingham Palace!

name: Horror Tale 3: The Witch
summary:
In this episode you will come face to face with Wanda the Witch, and also meet new friends. You will open many completely new locations, and learn more about the past of the terrible child kidnapper, which will lead you to new frightening discoveries. On the way to the goal, puzzles, moments of horror, unexpected turns and a lot of fun await you!

The story will develop rapidly and very unpredictably. This horror game is an exciting, fun, and scary adventure to the neighborhood of America of the '90s.

name: Honor of Kings: World
summary:
Honor of Kings: World is a new Action RPG open world game based on the popular Honor of Kings MOBA.

Master a host of mighty skills as you roam this continent of vastness and possibilities. Embark on a journey that will captivate your eyes and heart. Experience new wonders, encounter a colorful cast of characters and leave your mark on long-lost ruins.

“Only the relic can grant me the answer.”

Get ready to embark on a fantasy journey in a world of discovery, wonder and adventure.

name: Horizon Steel Frontiers
summary: The first MMORPG in the Horizon universe. A desperate adventure for survival in a world full of numerous threats.

name: Holy Shoot
summary: In Holy Shoot, the player embarks on a journey as a member of The Sanctum. The ultimate goal is to defeat the powerful demons that represent the Seven Deadly Sins. Each character, is granted unique abilities and traits that make them valuable assets in the fight against demonic forces.

name: Hotel Paradise
summary: Weary and out of fuel, you stumble upon a curious hotel. Rooms are cheap and look luxurious, but finding your way might be a challenge in and of itself...

name: House of Ghosts
summary: House of ghosts is a single-player horror survival game. Stop the demon and find out the name of his victim before he drags you to hell. Run and hide. Just don't get caught.

name: Home Cooked Spaghetti Western
summary: Duel a gallery of nefarious rogues using pasta ingredients in this tongue-in-cheek western turn-based battler.

name: Horror of Victim
summary: Psychological horror about a girl captured by an insane family.

name: Hop n' Hook
summary: Hop N Hook is a platforming-fishing game set across three distinct zones, built around movement, exploration, and collection. Swing with your rod, explore open-ended zones, and catch over 50 unique fish—some of which fight back in reactive boss encounters.

name: Hobby Horse: First Ride
summary: Time to RIDE! Create your first Hobby Horse and overcome basic obstacle courses! Win trophies, develop skills and discover the world of hobby horsing - jump on a hobby horse and conquer the horse world!

name: Home
summary: A game about the short journey of a boy who left home. Experience a dense story within 2 hours, along with rhythm gameplay and music puzzles. Enjoy live acoustic sounds and a story that feels like a musical film!

name: Home Cleaning
summary: Home Cleaning is a cozy, family-friendly game where you tidy up a baby’s messes in a playful environment. Use various cleaning utensils to clean rooms, and enjoy the satisfaction of a sparkling home!

name: Honey Select 2: Libido DX
summary: The ultimate sex simulator is here! Honey Select 2: Libido Deluxe is a love letter to making love. Engage with high-quality, fully-customizable characters in every imaginable situation. From romantic candlelight sex to the most specific kinks, Honey Select is sure to satisfy you!

name: Hot Wheels Stunt Track Driver
summary: The little die-cast cars from Matchbox make their way to the Game Boy Color with HOT WHEELS STUNT TRACK DRIVER. You can choose from five different Hot Wheels cars, including Way 2 Fast, Tow Jam, Shadow Jet, Saltflat Racer and the Twin Mill each with unique strengths and weaknesses. After picking the right car, take it for a test drive on one of the six tracks in the Single Race mode. When you want some stiff competition, try to win successive races in the Tournament mode. And if your friends think they can drive better than you, make them prove it with the two-player link cable option. In all of the modes, the key to winning is to maximize your speed by pulling off big stunts. Find out if you have what it takes to become a Hot Wheels Driver in HOT WHEELS STUNT TRACK DRIVER.

name: Hot Wheels Let’s Race: Ultimate Speed
summary: Buckle up and race in Hot Wheels Let’s Race: Ultimate Speed! It's the new high-speed racing video game inspired by the hit Netflix animated series! Join Coop and his friends as you race iconic Hot Wheels cars on over-the-top fast-paced tracks. Customize your vehicles with decals and create your own custom tracks. Take down epic bosses and speed toward the finish line!

name: Holopoint
summary: Holopoint is pure archery madness. Fight your way through waves of responsive targets, samurai, and highly dangerous ninjas - all while drawing, nocking, and shooting your arrows as quickly as possible.

name: Horizon Forbidden West: Launch Edition
summary:
Horizon Forbidden West continues Aloy’s story as she moves west to a far-future America to brave a majestic, but dangerous frontier where she’ll face awe-inspiring machines and mysterious new threats.

Horizon Forbidden West Launch Edition includes a voucher code to redeem all Horizon Forbidden West pre-order digital bonuses.

name: Horse Store Simulator
summary:
Horse Store Simulator – Build Your Equestrian Empire!
Step into the world of horses and business! In Horse Store Simulator, you’ll manage a thriving equestrian shop, care for majestic horses, and expand your dream ranch.

name: Hot and Lovely: Suger
summary: Hot and Lovely: Suger is a classic puzzle match-3 game. Players need to eliminate three or more tiles of the same type to complete the specified goal, and within the specified number of steps. Every time you complete the goal, you pass the level and you can unlock the photo album.

name: Hong Kong 2097
summary: Hong Kong 2097 is the official sequel to Hong Kong 97, codeveloped by Kanipro and Happy Soft. Throw morality out the window and decimate an entire country in this twin stick shooter from hell.

name: Hope
summary: Mistakes are not an impediment, but an opportunity to grow. Play and learn from your mistakes. Come and recharge your hopes.

name: Hop Drop
summary: Hop Drop is a fast paced arcade game in 3rd Person. You're playing a Birdman on jumping stilts, delivering Organs in a futuristic city. Within a time-limit of 5 minutes you have to do as many deliveries as possible jumping from rooftop to rooftop or flying cars and any other object available.

name: Hoover Heroes
summary: Hoover Heroes is a physics-based multiplayer party game for up to 8 players to play online, featuring cute and silly cleaners. Funny animations, colorful graphics, and fun mechanics will keep you laughing every moment.

name: Hook Line and Sniper
summary: You are a fish. Armed with your grappling hook-equipped sniper rifle, go on the ultimate krilling spree in Hook Line & Sniper! In this fast-paced arcade shooter, rack up points by mastering your arsenal and maximizing your style.

name: Hope Lake
summary: The Hope Lake Boarding School was abandoned long ago, when one of its teachers drowned by accident. Many years later, all of the female students began to disappear, one by one. Visit the place where it all began. Try to pick up the maniac's trail and put a stop to his crime spree.

name: Horizon Odyssey
summary: Born into a world of stone and stifling rules, Mathias must search out a better future for himself and others. But what reason could there be to limit the exploration to the world above? And are these rules out of love or fear? Join Mathias on a classic JRPG journey to better himself and the world.

name: Hover Junkers
summary: Hover Junkers is a VR + MOTION CONTROL ONLY multiplayer flying fort game designed from the ground up exclusively for VR. Enter the virtual world of the drought stricken future where junk hunters scavenge for scrap left behind. Players choose their ship based on their RoomScale play area and enter into multiplayer combat areas to claim scrap/loot and defend against enemy player junkers. Using scrap as actual defenses against incoming fire, players can physically dodge, hide, and shoot from behind the cover of their ships defenses.

name: How to Take Off Your Mask
summary: A cute fantasy romance visual novel. One day you discover the other side of your partner you had never known. What is the truth beneath the masks?

name: House of Lost Souls
summary: A long-standing pain has driven Jack back to the old family home in search of answers. Discover the terrible truth this house held and how it relates to what happened to his parents in the distant past.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Speed and Style Pack
summary: The recipe for success? A mix of speed and style. Exactly what you will find in the amazing Speed and Style Pack: 2016 Ford GT Race, Audi R8 LMS, Corvette C8.R and Nissan GT-R R35 Liberty Walk Silhouette Works 35GT-RR are the 4 extraordinary cars waiting for you!

name: HopDodge
summary: HopDodge is bringing back classic grid based platforming, with a new twist! Hop around on the back plane, and dodge spikes, wolves, and cannons in the foreground. Every level is built using an in-game editor, so players can create their own limitless content.

name: Honki de Manabu LEC de Goukakuru: Takuchi Tatemono Torihiki Shuninsha Portable
How long can human beings exist
summary: How long can human beings live on Earth? Will the human being be destroyed when disaster strikes? A game from the future. Challenge more than 50 kinds of disasters that will destroy humanity in the future. Victims or survivors, destroy the world or save humanity? Human civilization is about to usher in the end, you are entrusted with a heavy responsibility, to the future, to lead all humanity to fight against disasters, to strive to survive for a long time before the end of the day, to continue the civilization of human prosperity!

name: Hozy
summary: Transform abandoned spaces into cozy havens in Hozy!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Memories are the Prelude to Dreams
summary:
Version 3.8 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New character: The Dahlia
• New Trailblaze Mission: "Memories are the Prelude to Dreams"
• New areas: Great Tomb of the Nameless Titan and Ruins of Time
• New area: Dream of Gnawing Oak
• New events
• ...and more!

name: Homerun: Spin-Off Forever
summary: In this meta-narrative Baseball game your character falls in love with a game and is waiting for it's sequel, but they may wait for the rest of their life. You can collect money and buy cartridges to try different spin-offs of the main game.

name: House of 1000 Doors: Family Secrets
summary: Guide Kate Reed as she solves four mind-bending mysteries that take her to worlds she's never imagined in House of 1000 Doors: Family Secrets! When the dead cannot find release, the House of 1000 Doors serves as a portal that allows the living to help them.

name: Hollow
summary:
“I didn't care about this ship… facility… whatever… Had to… Something, deep in my brain, deep in my flesh, boiled inside to remember…” 
 
"In “Hollow,” you are one of the pilots that transports precious resource cargo from the mining ship Shakhter-One down to Earth. One day you wake up in an emergency capsule drifting near the facility. You don’t remember who you are, or how you got out there… All you can remember is an autopilot docking code for capsule dock NR 6. 
 
When you dock with Shakhter-One, it is clear that something has gone horribly wrong. The crew is missing and the entire facility is dealing with catastrophic power issues. As you start to uncover the ship’s terrifying secrets, Shakhter-One threatens to take your identity, your sanity, and – ultimately – your life. 
 
The worst evil is the one that knows us better than we know ourselves. 
The worst nightmare is the one borne in our past, emotions, fears, and pain."

name: How 2 Escape
summary: How 2 Escape is an escape-simulation game where two players will need to cooperate on asymmetrical gameplay and devices. "Talk together. Help each other." will be your new motto to survive in How 2 Escape.

name: How Much Items: Plants
summary: Game genre find hidden objects.

name: Homicipher
summary: Homicipher is an adventure horror game where you’ll decipher a language, fall in love and escape. Players will face various horrifying men in this strange world. Your aim is to decipher their language and eventually find a way to escape. Meanwhile, a peculiar feeling also starts to bloom.

name: Horse Racing 2016
summary:
Being re-released on Steam July 7

Horse Racing 2016 is most Fabulous and Entertaining Game for Everyone. If you want to feel real horse racing championship, show your desire and courage to play this game. This Game Uniqueness makes you play this game for hours, you will love to play this game again and again.
developers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd
publishers: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Holiday Simulator : Wacky Sleigh Ride
summary: Holiday Simulator – Wacky Sleigh Ride tests your skills to see if you have what it takes to deliver all the presents before the sun comes up.  Choose between tossing presents or lumps of coal in this comedic journey in the north pole.

name: Hot Springs Story 2
summary: A "hot" new hot springs resort sim with a ton of new exclusive features! What lies beyond the bath curtain? A "hot" new entry into the hotel sim genre!

name: Hot Sauna
summary: Hot Sauna is a visual novel exclusively for adults! In this game you will find an exciting adventure of Jack's boyfriend in the sauna. He comes there to have fun with his girlfriends. The game is filled with scenes of sex, humor and romance.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Bye Focal II
summary: You don't see many cars like this around! Especially when they whiz past you at full speed! Bye Focal II will take you to victory in the blink of an eye! So get ready to say “Bye Bye” to your opponents and “Hello” to the finish line!

name: Hotline Miami
summary: A top-down slasher/shooter with unlockable gameplay-altering masks and weapons, featuring a neon-flavoured electronic aesthetic, in which a hitman receives anonymous calls ordering him to travel to certain residences and crime dens and massacre those within, as he stumbles through unreal visions and inconsistencies without any answers to how, why or who.

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch
summary: Set off on a captivating horseback adventure and discover the mysteries of Emerald Valley!

name: Hot Pig Jump!
summary: A 3D action game in which you control the main character, a pig, and aim to reach the top while avoiding flamethrowers, which will result in game over if you get completely burned.

name: Hornets
summary: A short horror story about insects, endings, gods, and the destructive capacity of hieroglyphs.

name: Hollow Cocoon
summary: "Trapped in a cocoon, the silkworm weaves her final dream." Hollow Cocoon is a first-person horror adventure game set in 1980s Japan. Immerse yourself in meticulously recreated environments as you venture into the depths of unspeakable horrors that await you.

name: How 2 Escape: Lost Submarine
summary: Team up with a friend to reach a lost submarine and prevent the outbreak of war. Work together on two devices to solve increasingly challenging puzzles, where each of you has your own unique role to play.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Part 1 - The Moon's Origin and Finality
summary:
The Moon's Origin and Finality is part 1 of HoYoverse's Honkai Impact 3rd. It tells the stories of Kiana Kaslana, Raiden Mei, Bronya Zaychik, students at St. Freya High and normal Schicksal Valkyries, who through numerous trials, and with the help of their loved ones, protected the world from both the threat of the Honkai and those who sought to purge it no matter the cost.

The Moon's Origin and Finality spans 35 Main Story Chapters along with several bonus EX Chapters and the Elysian Realm Gamemode.

name: Horror Gallery
summary: Immerse yourself in a sinister narrative as you piece together the story through hints in this eerie place. Every step you take inches you closer to the truth.Will you uncover the chilling truth?

name: HoloLab Champions
summary: HoloLab Champions is a virtual reality chemistry game show, where you complete lab experiments to become a Champion of lab practice. Interact with equipment and materials that you'd find in an actual lab. You must finish your experiments safely and accurately to earn points for entrance into the Hall of Brains. Scoop, pour, and burn your way to mastery in the HoloLAB. Your holographic host Earl and his sidekick Meyer guide you through a series of mini-labs that lead up to an ultimate lab challenge.
