Score achievements and do your best to earn an elemental trophy in this amazing Labstravaganza.

name: Hover X Souls
summary: Hover X Souls is a refresh of the infinite runner genre. You are X-17 a hover shield combat class robot. You have been tasked with going through training on this planet to become stronger, while helping develop outposts. Master the Hover Shield Combat system, and use it to travel the dark highway while providing protection to Outposts. See how far you can go, and how many loops through the planets you can go through in an ultimate test of skill.

name: Hockey VR
summary: Test your skills in the most realistic, physics-based hockey simulation available! Play against an AI goalie in three different environments. Choose between Timed or Shot Count game modes. Upgrade your experience and bring your real hockey stick into the game with our 3D printed controller mount.

name: Hocus 2
summary: Hocus continues; this time everything is dynamic. Hocus 2 has new mechanics and illusion combinations with so many creative solving possibilities. Featuring 85 hand-crafted creative levels so far and 9 different mechanics.

name: Hotel Tutwin
summary: Hotel Tutwin is an interactive visual novel of the horror/romance genre, for casual gamers who appreciate female leads and supernatural characters.

name: Horos: Web of Shadows
summary: Embark on an epic adventure game fused with a visual novel and a dash of RPG elements. Immerse yourself in a captivating storyline featuring intriguing characters, engaging gameplay, and unique erotic encounters that will leave you breathless.

name: Hoglands
summary: Hoglands is a dynamic strategy game with RPG elements and beautiful hand-drawn graphics set in a gloomy medieval setting. You will plunge into the adventure of a noble boar trying to protect his kingdom from the hordes of the undead and find the cause of the spreading plague. You have to build defenses to repel night attacks and collect resources during the day. Also don't forget about sorties to destroy the sources of the plague that turns your subjects into flesh-hungry monsters. Do you have the skill and courage to face Count Porkula himself?

name: Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number
summary: Hotline Miami 2: Wrong Number is the brutal conclusion to the Hotline Miami saga, set against a backdrop of escalating violence and retribution over spilled blood in the original game. Follow the paths of several distinct factions – each with their own questionable methods and uncertain motivations – as unforeseen consequences intersect and reality once again slips back into a brilliant haze of neon and bloodshed.

name: Homestead Online
summary: Homestead Online is an open world sandbox MMORPG. Establish your house, claim your land, and develop your legacy.

name: How to Melt a Maiden's Heart
summary: A cute, sweet boys love / yaoi visual novel about a high school student who discovers the formidable student council president is crossdressing on the sly and working at a maid café.

name: Horizon Zero Dawn: Complete Edition
summary:
In an era where machines roam the land and mankind is no longer the dominant species, a young hunter named Aloy embarks on a journey to discover her destiny. Explore a vibrant and lush world inhabited by mysterious mechanized creatures. Embark on a compelling, emotional journey and unravel mysteries of tribal societies, ancient artefacts and enhanced technologies that will determine the fate of this planet and of life itself.

Horizon: Zero Dawn Complete Edition includes Horizon Zero Dawn and the frozen wilds expansion.

name: Homeless Story 2: Police Mayhem
summary: Homeless Story 2: Police Mayhem is a third person adventure. This is a sequel to the legendary game Story of a Homeless. Find out how the story of our beloved homeless Artyom ended. Feel all the hardships of a homeless person's life.

name: Hookah Simulator
summary: Start with a small cozy hookah lounge and turn it into the most popular spot in the city! Your goal is to craft perfect hookahs, satisfying even the most demanding customers.

name: Hollow Survivors
summary: Slash through never-ending hordes of possessed creatures and try to survive! Choose from a variety of upgrades to create overpowered builds. Unlock unique characters and discover powerful synergies to aid in your quest to become the ultimate demon hunter and purify the kingdom.

name: Horizon Call of the Mountain
summary: Horizon Call of the Mountain, created for PlayStation’s Next-Gen VR hardware, is an upcoming brand-new adventure in the world of Horizon. Embrace a new level of immersion in a unique experience, designed to push hardware technology, innovation, and gameplay.

name: How Do You Know Mr. Blue?
summary:
You are a private investigator. You have been hired by the enigmatic mega-corporation C-Corp to track down the whereabouts of a "Mr. Blue", an employee of theirs who has gone missing. The instructions were simple but clear: find him by any means necessary. 
 
Your first assignment is to interview Mr. Blue's immediate co-workers about his disappearance. They're all claiming ignorance, but someone is lying. Find out who. 
 
Best of luck, detective.

name: Howling Dogs
summary: Howling Dogs is an interactive fiction made in TWINE by Porpentine. Trapped in a small area with limited supplies, the player can temporarily visit other worlds through some sort of virtual reality visor.

name: House Builder
summary: They say a man must do three things in his life: plant a tree, beget a son and build a house. We can’t help you out with the tree neither with the son, but you can build as many houses as you like while playing House Builder.

name: Hopeless Sea
summary: Hopeless Sea is a vertical arcade shooter roguelike where you pilot a ship to escape hordes of random frenzied sea monsters. Arm yourself with a variety of gears and traits as you navigate through the madness and uncover the mysteries lurking beneath the waves.

name: Horse Club Adventures
summary:
The wonderful characters from the HORSE CLUB created by Schleich come to life!

Visit the famous Lakeside Riding Stable and experience thrilling vacations full of adventure together with Hannah, Sarah, Lisa, Sofia and their horses!

Horse Club Adventures carries you off to the wonderful world that revolves around the Lakeside Riding Stable. Together with Hannah, Sarah, Lisa, Sofia and their horses, you experience lots of thrilling adventures! There is an amazing amount to discover in this open world game. The popular Horse Club game characters and the lovingly designed locations at Lakeside, such as the café, the caravan and the riding stable, are brought to life here.

Horse Club Adventures is an excitement-packed action adventure with numerous quests, popular mini-games, intriguing secrets to be revealed and loads of unlockable items, as well as collectibles and customisation options.

Lively, colourful and detailed world including many familiar and new characters along with the settings from the Horse Club world!
Over 40 different main quests with a gripping story revolving around Lakeside!
30 optional sidequests, including a thrilling tale about the mysterious Edith Jacobs that involves her, too!
Numerous optional mini-games, such as horse grooming and cleaning hooves!
All sorts of unlockable new outfits and embellishments for the game character. For example, new hairstyles, breeches, blouses, boots
Fabulous collectibles, such as stickers and photos that are unlocked one after the other.
Marvellous soundtrack with numerous electrifying pieces of music

name: Holy Potatoes! We're in Space?!
summary: Welcome cosmonauts, to the perilous and patulous potato universe of Holy Potatoes! We’re in Space?! - A game where you manage your own spaceship while hurtling through a spud filled universe!

name: House Party: Valentine's Day Holiday Pack
summary: Happy Valentine's Day, Partiers! In this Valentine's Day DLC you'll be able to enjoy various Valentine's Day accessories.

name: Hoppy Hop
summary: Join Hoppy in this classic action platformer as you collect candies, dodge enemies and jump. After all, you are a rabbit!

name: Hookah Haze
summary: Hookah Haze is a visual novel developed by Acquire and published by Aniplex. The player takes the role of a terminally ill protagonist, whose final wish is to manage a hookah lounge. Through this new job, they meet various patrons and bond with them through hookah. The game has been compared to VA-11 Hall-A and Coffee Talk by critics.

name: Hollow Island
summary: You play as an adventurer arriving to Hollow Island, but what you do next is up to you: Grow crops, harvest, cook food, brew and sell potions, expand your property, explore the island, fight monsters, dig for riches underground, build camps and hoard your treasures!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: Mattel Dream Mobile
summary: Its futuristic design is a piece of history: Mattel Dream Mobile was the first toy car created by Mattel. This stunning bubble-topped convertible looks ready to take off and fill the future of your opponents with broken dreams!

name: Hornet the Vanguard
summary: "Reveal all, deceive all." Hornet the Vanguard, a mystery-solving adventure game. Solve mysteries and gather information in the exploration part, and uncover the truth in the deduction part! …The key to the case is always with buddy.

name: House of 1000 Doors: Evil Inside
summary:
Use the power of light to defeat a devastating darkness before it destroys mankind!
Locate cleverly hidden objects, solve cunning puzzles, and complete challenging mini-games as you cleanse everything the infection has touched.

name: Home Safety Hotline
summary: Home Safety Hotline is an analog horror inspired telephone operator simulator where you answer incoming callers' questions about what's inside their home. Read through a vast catalog of common pests and household hazards, and do your best to become an expert in home safety. You will be held responsible for what happens.

name: Hot & Lewd: Miami
summary: Get ready for an exciting world of vibrant colors, high speeds in Hot & Lewd: Miami. In this dynamic visual novel, you will meet the main character, a young guy who just graduated from the police academy but chose a life of wild parties and extreme street races over serving as an officer.

name: Hotel Simulator 2026
summary: Hotel Simulator 2026: Clean up the Past, Build Your Future.

name: Home
summary: Home is a unique horror adventure set in a beautifully-realized pixel world. It’s a murder mystery with a twist—because you decide what ultimately happens.

name: Horse Reality
summary:
Horse Reality is a free-to-play horse sim with exquisite images, set in the real world with a realistic breeding and colour genetic system. Build your own estate and breed horses to perfect the bloodlines or colours. Travel around the world to gather feral horses and bargain with other players.

Participate in national and international competitions to win medals. Perform in horse shows to collect rosettes for your horses. Start a club with friends or go to the university to earn a degree and start your own company.

name: Hoverkitty In The Hoververse: Chapter Three
summary: In this 3D game, you can play as either Hoverkitty or Hoverflea, which means you have multiple ways of completing a level. This has aspects of an adventure, first-person shooter. You will meet enemies, such as the Hoverkitty Hunters, and also new allies.

name: Holodama: Content Clash
summary: How close to the edge must one go for the best content? Now is the time to hone your Holodama and capture the audience's attention!

name: Hopalong: The Badlands
summary: Ride a stick horse and battle comical villains in the western-themed game Hopalong: The Badlands for a VR experience like no other. While galloping on your stick steed you will fight the Dynamite Gang and the pig-riding Boss Boomity.

name: Hot Beaver Camp
summary: Enter a world of horror and suspense, in this RPG action game, fight to survive, rescue and escape alive from a camp in the middle of the forest.

name: How Much Items: Fishes
summary: Game genre find hidden objects.

name: Hot 21
summary: This is a classic beauty Blackjack game, which ensures that you can easily start. You can choose different beauties as your opponents according to your own preferences. As long as you succeed in the challenge, you can let the girls dance a hot dance for you.

name: Horror Tales: The Wine
summary: Immerse yourself in a post-pandemic island and confront your worst fears! Explore a vast, vertical and mysterious world apparently abandoned and find the precious wine bottle to cure the illness that killed everyone. But be aware; someone is lurking in the dark.

name: Hop: The Movie
summary: A game about Hop (the movie) for DS.

name: Home Design 3D
summary:
Home Design 3D is an interior design and home decor application that allows you to draw, create and visualize your floor plans and home ideas.
Easy-to-use, design in 2D and/or 3D. Get a good idea of your future projects or just have fun!

name: Horror Tale 1: Kidnapper
summary: Start a scary adventure and be the first to solve all the mysteries of this horror game!

name: Hordes of Hunger
summary: Hordes of Hunger is a fast-paced action arena slasher with rogue-lite elements set in the dark fantasy setting of Ismer. A land engulfed by the living hunger, the cosmic horror known only as the Beast. You are the unlucky one still living inside the nightmare and the only way out is through it.

name: Horror Tales: The Beggar
summary: Control space-time to fight an evil monster in this terror and science fiction journey set in a shattered but beautiful world. Bend physics, the sky and the earth itself in engaging boss-fight encounters with the full power of Unreal Engine 5 and Nvidia DLSS.

name: Holbrook Hotel
summary: Holbrook Hotel is an atmospheric horror game about the killer in Holbrook Oaks. After hearing a noise in the neighboring hotel room, you start a short adventure around the town. Escape the man, and get to safety, if there is any.

name: Horror Tycoon
summary: Scare, terrify and thrill guests as you build the Haunted House empire of your nightmares. Design and customize your creations with incredible detail to scare your guests, or risk losing it all in this tycoon/tower defense hybrid!

name: Holobunnies: Pause Café
summary: Holobunnies: Pause Café is the Holobunnies appetizer you didn't know you wanted: three little games in one adorable and quirky package! Fight your friends in a high-adrenaline two-player brawler, test your mettle against the classic q-bit bosses in Boss Rush, and navigate through Kitcat's Adventure to help Kitcat find its way to the Holobunnies to help start their Bittersweet Adventure!

name: Horse Racing Simulator
summary:
Atari ST horse racing management/simulator game made by Budgie UK aka (Budgie Quality Software) and released back in 1990.

Up to 5 players manage a stable full of horses, putting them into races and trying to figure out where they run best. Prize money is awarded for the top three horses, with a horse's form also contributing to their value.

The game is a precursor to Mark Loveday's Starters Orders series.

name: Horror Tale: Remaster
summary: Start a scary adventure and be the first to solve all the mysteries of this horror game!

name: Hookshot Runner
summary: Fast-paced time-freezing bullet-hell-in-space score-chaser built for the Playdate

name: Howlbreath
summary: Free to play desktop (64-bit Windows) fantasy MMORPG featuring medieval combat and lots of spells, weapons, armor, and items to find and help grow your character. Party with fellow players to hunt stronger monsters or the enemy town.

name: Horse Master
summary: Horse Master: The Game of Horse Mastery is a horse management sim, crossed with Cronenbergian body horror.

name: House of Torment
summary:
Experience the chilling terror of "House of Torment," a gripping horror game where you, Andrew Carter, wake up lost in a dark forest with no memory of how you arrived and only a flashlight to guide you. Desperate for shelter, you stumble upon a mysterious house. Inside, you must uncover the dark secrets of its infamous owner, the renowned streamer Asmongold.

Navigate eerie rooms, solve intricate puzzles, and avoid terrifying encounters, as you are not a fighter. Survival depends on your wits and stealth. With stunning graphics and immersive sound design, your journey through the House of Torment will be a spine-chilling experience.

Can you unravel the mysteries and escape the house? Download now and face your fears.

name: Horn of the Warlord
summary: A turn-based grand strategy game focused on ruthless conquest and clever planning. Command armies, conquer procedurally generated regions, manage resources, and outthink rival warlords through smart timing, army composition, and siege tactics.

name: Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem Deluxe Edition is the definitive arcade Monster Trucks experience, combining the full game with the exclusive Treasure Hunt Pack digital content. The Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem Deluxe Edition includes:

- The full Hot Wheels Monster Trucks: Stunt Mayhem game that let's you GO BIG and perform insane stunts while smashing and bashing through fantastical arenas in your favorite monster trucks!
- Treasure Hunt Shuttle Monster Truck, and Glow Party Skin
- Treasure Hunt Rodger Dodger Skin
- Treasure Hunt Twin Mill Skin
- Exclusive Menu Soundtrack

name: Hopping Out
summary: Hopping Out is a tile-based puzzle game where you hop 2 tiles at a time. Play as Frog and use your tongue to move boxes, press buttons to create lily pads, all to catch many flies!

name: House Flipper: Garden DLC
summary: When the Garden Flipper DLC launches on May 16, 2019, we'll be able to dig, plant, and mow our way to better curb appeal. Along with flowers, trees, and bushes, the developers are also adding "hundreds" of new outdoor items to House Flipper ranging from patio furniture to pools to play sets.

name: House Fighters: Total Mess
summary: House Fighters: Total Mess is a PvE aerial arcade shooter where toy planes battle in everyday spaces. Engage in fast-paced dogfights in this nostalgia-filled world, take on clever foes, and fight to save your fellow toy friends!

name: Hole Digging Master
summary:
The rules are as simple as possible - dig the hole. Dig deep. Deeper than you can even imagine.

Don't be afraid to get your hands dirty, because there's real treasure waiting for you in the ground. Start digging and miracles will happen. You have no idea what could be under your lawn.

Everything you find can be sold and used to upgrade your tools or buy new equipment to help you dig faster and find more.

Can you reach the true depths?

name: Hot Shot Burn
summary: Hot Shot Burn is the hilariously violent arena party brawler that lets you compete in the universe's ultimate televised blood sport. It's fast-paced, competitive local or online slaughter for 2-4 players.

name: Hotel Transylvania Popstic
summary: Sony Pictures Virtual Reality has partnered with Specular Theory’s ‘Popstic’ VR game to create Hotel Transylvania Popstic, an exciting new VR music game designed exclusively for VR arcades that’s fun for the whole family!

name: HorrorVale
summary: Welcome to HorrorVale, a world full of monsters, ghouls, and all sorts of fiendish undead. Help Alice on her quest to save her dog from strange and unusual monsters who suddenly showed up in HorrorVale!

name: Hopping Up for It
summary: A magician has stored a rabbit in his enchanted top hat. Inside the hat is a pocket dimension he uses for storage. But the rabbit can smell a bag of carrots outside... help the rabbit hop out, for freedom and carrots! As you hop ever-upwards in this challenging game, you can save any time.

name: How to Make a Killing
summary: An indie action RPG about assassins, necromancers, and mysterious rabbits. In an open world where your choices have permanent consequences, do you do the job or do you forge your own path as you meet new characters, battle a slew of enemies, and explore expansive dungeons and locations?

name: Horror Simulator: Co-Op
summary: Horror Simulator VR is a horror adventure for both singleplayer and 3 player co-op. Demons lurk within the mansion, terrorizing countless victims. Form a team of exorcists, delve deep into the mansion to uncover the demon's name, capture and vanquish it.

name: Hogwarts Legacy
summary: Hogwarts Legacy is an immersive, open-world action RPG set in the world first introduced in the Harry Potter books. Now you can take control of the action and be at the center of your own adventure in the wizarding world. Embark on a journey through familiar and new locations as you explore and discover fantastic beasts, customize your character and craft potions, master spell casting, upgrade talents, and become the wizard you want to be. Discover the feeling of living at Hogwarts as you make allies, battle Dark wizards, and ultimately decide the fate of the wizarding world. Your legacy is what you make of it.

name: Hotel Life: A Resort Simulator
summary: You are the manager of a hotel in an idyllic location. Build, design and develop your hotel, while creating unforgettable memories for your guests through expert management and by offering exceptional entertainment.

name: Homefront: The Revolution
summary: Homefront: The Revolution is an open-world first person shooter where you must lead the Resistance movement in guerrilla warfare against a superior military force.A living, breathing, open world responds to your actions - you and your Resistance Cell can inspire a rebellion on the streets and turn Occupation into Revolution, as oppressed civilians take up the fight.

name: Hollow Memories
summary: You recently moved back to your hometown to find a job and move into a suspiciously cheap apartment, you find out that it's haunted by a pair of sexy ghosts, and you're stuck until the curse is broken. Discover a way to break the curse, and help the ghosts move on by filling their hollow memories.

name: Hope's Farm 2
summary: Build your dream farm in this unique blend of farming and puzzle adventure! Grow crops, raise adorable animals, and solve delightful puzzles to unlock new items and expand your farmland.

name: Homefront
summary: Featuring a compelling single player story crafted by John Milius (Apocalypse Now, Red Dawn), Homefront immerses gamers in an interactive and cinematic FPS experience where they will assume an infantry role or take command of a wide variety of aerial and ground vehicles. In addition to the single-player experience, Homefront will deliver a robust multiplayer experience. In a land stripped of freedom, the brave will fight for their home.

name: HoloCure: Save the Fans!
summary: Welcome to HOLOCURE! This is a free, unofficial fangame featuring the vtuber talents of Hololive and its surrounding community, with gameplay heavily inspired by Vampire Survivors and Magic Survival. Collect powerful weapons and items and experiment with all kinds of character builds to create the ultimate character! Will you be able to save the endless waves of fans, and reach the top rankings?

name: HoneyLand
summary: Help Mr.Fluff to drink all the honey, and of course, reach the fabulous honey volcano! Your cards will direct Mr. Fluff in the right direction. Run! Jump! Fall on your stomach!

name: Horizon To Crinoa: Have Faith in Radiance - Prototype
summary: Horizon To Crinoa: Have Faith in Radiance -Prototype- is a small scale prototype anime style, action RPG with high speed, stylish action game combat mixed with in depth RPG stats, abilities and systems inspired by classic JRPGs! Show us just how much flair you can bring forth!

name: Hope: Winter Tale
summary: Every New Year is similar to the previous one. No friends, no family, no magic. But what if a fairy tale exists? And everything can change? HOPE: Winter Tale is a story about a man who has lost his all taste for life. But one winter night, everything changed.

name: Hostages
summary: Terrorists have taken an embassy hostage and you have to bring in a 3 men strike team to rescue the civilians inside.

name: Home Run High
summary: Can you lead your high school baseball team to ultimate victory? It might be a small after-school club now, but with the right training, even the sky isn't the limit for this team! Train players by assigning them practice drills. You choose what they need to focus on, such as batting or pitching. Install batting cages, showers, or other facilities to make life better for the team. A good environment makes for more effective training! School life is not all about sports, though. Studying is just as important, so make sure to construct educational facilities to upgrade the school. House students in a dorm and they'll have more time for both studying and baseball practice! Pick your best players for the team and test their skill at tournaments. Try searching for "Kairosoft" to see all of our games!!

name: Hourglass
summary:
In Hourglass you can create a time-clone of yourself to solve challenging puzzles. You will play as Aywa, a young adventurer who is traveling to Egypt to find her missing father - an archeologist, who never returned from his latest expedition.

Pyramids are the tombs of the pharaohs. This is what most people believe. But more and more studies raise doubts about this thesis. Scientists found indications for ancient egypt being far more technologized than we can imagine. Hourglass is set in a scenario in which those assumptions are actually true..

Besides offering an ancient world to explore, Hourglass is mostly about solving various puzzles with a unique core-mechanic. Your ability allows you to record your actings for a certain amount of time. After that, time winds back to the beginning of the recording and a time-clone of yourself appears, repeating the actions.

name: Howl
summary: Howl is a turn-based tactical folktale set in a world of living ink, where the sound of a ‘howling plague’ turns people into feral beasts. Rid the lands of the plague using your crossbow, magic skills and your wits, planning every move up to six steps in advance. Some think prophecy is carved in stone – write your own in ink and blood.

name: Hot Lava
summary: Hot Lava transports you back to your childhood imagination. Relive those moments of excitement, joy and chaos. Traverse distinct worlds, from school hallways to the memories of your darkest fears. You will have to use all your skills to complete the treacherous obstacles that await.

name: Hopward
summary:
Hopward is a precision platformer where you play as a determined little frog climbing toward the sky. Charge your jumps, dive through the air, and test your patience as every leap brings you closer to the top or all the way back to the bottom. Explore vibrant worlds from rainy ponds to wizard towers, floating gardens, and mystical skies.
No checkpoints. No shortcuts. Just you, your timing, and the fall.

name: Horror Story: Hallowseed
summary: Horror Story: Hallowseed is a story-driven psychological horror game. An obscure event causes two of your friends to disappear while you were camping in the woods. Left alone and stranded in an unknown place, you need to seek the answers about what happened, face the horror and find your friends

name: Hokko Life
summary: Hop off the train and into your new life in the village of Hokko! Take over the old workshop and get creative; use crafted materials and design everything in town! With complete creative freedom, what type of town will you build?

name: Hokuto no Ken: Shinpan no Sousousei Kengo Retsuden
summary:
Hokuto no Ken: Shinpan no Sousousei Kengo Retsuden is a 2D competitive fighting video game published by Arc System Works released on March 27, 2007 for the Sony PlayStation 2.

Based on the manga series of the same name, it was originally released in 2005 as a coin-operated arcade game for the Atomiswave hardware. A PlayStation 2 port, retitled Hokuto no Ken: Shinpan no Sōsōsei Kengō Retsuden, roughly translated as Fist of the North Star: The Twin Blue Stars of Judgment - History of the Fist Masters, was released exclusively in Japan in March 2007. This version features a bonus DVD including an exclusive training mode ("Starter's Guide") and a documentary covering history of previous Hokuto no Ken titles for home consoles. The arcade version was officially distributed by Sega in North America, while the PS2 port was released only in Japan. In 2020, a homebrew conversion was released for the Dreamcast.

name: Hollowbrook: Apartments
summary: Hollowbrook is a stylized horror experience told through multiple episodes. Each chapter immerses you in the life of a new character, blending personal backstories with chilling encounters that react to your decisions.

name: Hotshot Racing
summary: Hotshot Racing is a blisteringly fast arcade-style racing game fusing drift handling, razor-sharp retro visuals and an incredible sense of speed to create an exhilarating driving experience.

name: Hob
summary:
Hob is set on a beautiful and dangerous unknown world, with buzzing life above and the whirrs of mysterious machinery below. The more players delve into the world’s design, the more they uncover a planet in peril. Players must learn to survive, understand their true purpose through acquiring skills, and ultimately transform the nature of the world itself.

Hob is presented without text or dialogue. Narrative is revealed as players explore and interact with their mysterious planet, and the strange life forms that inhabit it. Hob features smooth controller gameplay, multi-layered puzzles, and striking visuals.

name: Hoard
summary: Hoard is an action game about dragons and their treasure, coming to PlayStation 3, PSP (PlayStation Portable), PC, and Mac in September 2010! HOARD is a trademark of Big Sandwich Games, Inc.

name: Holy Potatoes! A Weapon Shop?!
summary:
Holy Potatoes! A Weapon Shop?! is a wacky simulation game where you manage your very own weapon shop and expand its business across an incredible potato world.

Use your potato smiths to forge weapons and sell them to questing heroes. You will meet more than 70 potato heroes, forge more than 200 weapons, expand your business into 20 wacky areas, manage 30 zany potato smiths, discover 10 legendary pop culture heroes . . . and even adopt a potato dog!

Inspired by games such as Game Dev Story, Weapon Shop De Omasse and Recettear: An Item Shop's Tale, Holy Potatoes! A Weapon Shop?! is designed to provide an exciting new gameplay experience to fans of this emerging game genre.

The game score is composed by the legendary Kimura Masahiko​, who worked on the original score for the Genso Suikoden Series and the Castlevania Series.

name: House Party: Nocturnal Temptations Expansion Pack
summary:
Get ready for a full-blown trip to the 1950s! This time-travelling expansion takes players to a brand new location: A cursed film set in the middle of a massive forest. This ain't just some tromp through the woods -- it's all happening over 70 years ago.

Your mission: rewrite Hollywood history alongside the long-lost, drop-dead gorgeous starlet, Gisella Gagliano. You'll need to handle crazy cults and moonshining hillbillies to help a silver-screen legend get her second shot at fame in this hot and wild new DLC!

name: Hot Tin Roof: The Cat That Wore a Fedora
summary: Emma Jones is an ex-firefighter who has become a private detective; her partner is Franky, a cat. Together, they must explore the city and solve a murder mystery.

name: Hospital Giant
summary: Whether you're a fan of hospital TV shows or have had a great time on Bullfrog's old-fashioned Theme Hospital, you'll be sure to take a good look at Hospital Giant, which should be on supermarket shelves. approaching the Christmas holidays. A word of advice: quickly close this curious eye and continue on your way.

name: Hop Hero: A Leap of Faith
summary:
Tap to jump your way up to the top. Easy, right?
Avoid spinning saws, precisely land on platforms and slowly reach the top.
Be careful though! One wrong jump will land you all the way back at the beginning.

name: Hollywood Escape
summary: A new entry in the popular MobiGrow's Escape series

name: Homefront: The Revolution - Day One Edition
Hopmon
summary: Hopmon is a 3D arcade action game. There are 45 levels in total and to complete each level, Hopmon will have to collect all the crystals and place them on the warp zone where the star symbol is printed.

name: Hook
summary: Based on the Hook movie.

name: How to Weigh an Elephant
summary: How to Weigh an Elephant is a DOS educational game for young children.

name: Hot Wheels Stunt Track Driver 2: Get 'N Dirty
Hopscotch: Are You Ready for Hardcore?
summary: A simple tap-based version of hopscotch. Tap the squares before they reach the bottom of the screen to see the highest number you can reach.

name: Horse Mansion
summary: Horse Mansion is an atmospheric horror game where the player must find items and solve puzzles in order to explore more of the mansion. However, the player quickly finds they are not alone...

name: How to Play Craps - Tips and Strategies
Hole io: Ancient DLC
summary: Wear godlike skins and visit the new Ancient map with your friends!

name: Hokuto no Ken: Senretsu! Hokuto Shingeki
Hotel Clover
summary: Here, there exists a secretive guest only known to me. A fusion of romance and management simulation, 'Hotel Clover'.

name: Hot Trigger
summary: A first person shooter where players control time.

name: Hour of the Witch
summary: Waking up alone in a decrepit library with no memory of who you are or what you are doing here you must escape this place before the hour grows too late. Solve puzzles and uncover hidden secrets as you solve the mystery of who you are and why you are here in this top-down survival horror game.

name: HoloGrid: Monster Battle
summary: HoloGrid: Monster Battle

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Bassline
summary: Make some noise for Bassline! Its huge rear speakers and subwoofers will spread the perfect soundtrack… for your tracks! And whoever tries to stop you, will have to face the music!

name: How to Die in a Morgue
summary: An Episodic 2D-Adventure for Windows and Mac

name: Houmatsu Tunnel
summary:
There's a tunnel that is rumored to allow you to meet a dead person if you pass through it at 2am.
After hearing this, Kyoka, decides to go to the tunnel with his boyfriend Yukio, but...

A short BL visual novel.

name: Hope for City
summary: Hope For City is an Old-School RPG game. We designed this game for mini rpg & survival fans. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing, mini games and more, just explore it! Monsters, wild animals, orcs... Who do you think will win?

name: Hole in Clone
summary: Shot clones to reach the goal!

name: Hoarding Simulator
summary: sleep, train, ride a bike, everything is almost possible in this game, all you need to do is collect!

name: HostageHub
summary: Team up with friends in HostageHub, the ultimate wave-based hostage rescue experience. Fight, earn, spend, and repeat. Can you master the art of hostage rescue and financial balance?

name: House Designer: Fix & Flip
summary: House Designer: Fix and Flip is a fun simulator game of house renovation where you can realize all your home design fantasies into reality. Buy a house, renovate and work on it and see how much you can flip it for!

name: Hook-a-Duck VR
summary: Exactly what it says on the tin; Hook-a-duck, in VR! ...except some of the ducks have outboard motors, and can actually "fly".

name: Hotel Renovation 2
summary: This Hotel remembers better times. But thanks to you, they can come back. Renew the rooms. Plan the furniture. Upgrade rooms. Now is the time to reopen and count your profits.

name: Hollow Minds
summary: Hollow Minds is a single-level PWAD for Doom II using the ZDoom source port. It was designed by Kristian Aro and is named after his own music track "Hollow Minds".

name: Honor: Episode 1 - The Invsation
summary: DO YOU HAVE HONOR? PROVE IT! PLAYING THE MOST HARD WAR GAME!

name: Honey Guardian
summary:
Strong computing power and fast reflection speed!

As the guardian of the hive, gather bees to drive away other creatures you meet!

Control your path, get more companions, stay away from dangerous fires, and rush towards your enemies!

Don't fear of sacrifice! Defeat them! And guard your hive!

name: Horny Girl Hentai Puzzle
summary: Horny Girl-Hentai Puzzle is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Hoard It!
summary: Loot randomly generated dungeons for collectible weapons

name: How to Train Your Dragon: Flight of the Night Fury
summary: How to Train Your Dragon: Flight of the Night Fury is an action/flight game for the iPhone based on the movie How to Train Your Dragon.

name: Hollow Park
summary: A short first-person horror-action game/aesthetic experience.

name: Hot Sprint Trip With A Married Woman
HorseHotel
summary: Take care of different horses and be the manager of the horse hotel!

name: Holiday Lemmings
summary: Not to be confused with the 1993 release of the same name, this 1994 release comes with 32 new levels and updated music.

name: House of Jigsaw: The Art of Still Life
summary: Unleash your inner art connoisseur and embark on a journey through the captivating world of House of Jigsaw: The Art of Still Life DLC.

name: Horizon Springs
summary: Live your dreams in Horizon Springs – an open world of limitless possibilities. Build, explore, and shape your destiny in alternate paradise. Make a name for yourself in Horizon Springs.

name: Hostile Makeover
summary: Solve a fashion murder mystery in this unique Hidden Object game! The world famous supermodel Amanda Manville has been murdered! Help smart and sassy Lacey Smithsonian investigate nine quirky suspects to find the killer in Hostile Makeover. Explore Washington DC, searching for clues and interviewing suspects. Along the way, collect and wear new fashions that grant special sleuthing abilities to crack the case!

name: Hommage 25
summary: Originally this was part of NaNoWADMo 2018 but has been released as 6 maps inspired by doom 2 on it's 25th birthday.

name: Hoping Forest
summary: Help the little frog to safely reach the other side avoiding the hazards and dangers within the forest. Move the tiles around you to find one of the hidden paths that will lead you to your goal.

name: Horrid Henry
summary: Horrid Henry plays horrible games and gets chased. Play a Home alone but worse

name: HopHop Fox
summary: Hop Hop Fox is a fun puzzle game for adults and kids! Enjoy fun and stimulating puzzle gameplay, play through the offline puzzle sets, and create your own to share online!

name: Hot Chix 'n' Gear Stix
summary: A free PC title where players can control one of six women in muscle car races across a number of locations.

name: Hobo 5: Space Brawls - Attack of the Hobo Clones
summary: Hobo has been abducted by aliens and finds himself on a UFO in deep space. Aliens have used his DNA to clone him and are in the process of making a hobo army. They also drained Hobo of all of his combo moves, so he has to fight aliens and hobo clones to get them back!

name: Honoo no Takuhaibin
summary: Hono no Takuhaibin ("Blazing Express Delivery") is an action delivery game where the player, as experimental enhanced humanoid Jiro, must deliver packages within a time limit, while at the same time defeating or avoiding various enemies. Jiro has access to both a hand cart and a van, which he can switch between at will, though the van cannot enter certain areas. Defeating enemies and completing deliveries will earn Delivery Spirit, which can be used to launch special attacks and boost Jiro's speed.

name: Horny Clinic
summary: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Houma Hunter Lime with Paint Maker
House M.D.: Episode 2 - Blue Meanie
summary: Join Dr. House and his diagnostic team and race against the clock to solve an all-new medical mystery.

name: Hollow Mind: The Lost Puppy
summary: A small puppy will have to fight with their fears and find all the positive memories, personified by soft toys, in completely different locations. Beautiful graphics, pleasant sounds, and interesting performance. Just relax and feel the atmosphere of adventure.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Monster Trucks Pack
summary: Experience oversized emotions with the immense BIGFOOT Monster Truck, the unstoppable Gunkster, the ferocious Mega-Wrex and the mighty Rhinomite. Get ready for crushing victories with the Monster Trucks Pack!

name: Hokuto no Ken 6: Gekitou Denshouken - Haou he no Michi
summary:
Near the end of the 20th century, the world returned to a dark age ruled by power after the nuclear war. The masters of the Hokuto, Nanto, and Gento Kō Ken martial arts have staked their own pride as they wage wars against each other. The stage has been set for an epic battle between these mighty men.

The battle for supremacy has begun!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Hollowback
summary: Metal Maniacs rejoice! Here is the legendary car of Tork Maddox, a muscle car super modified to resist everything! Hollowback is made of pure solidity and will leave a void behind! A must-have for all fans!

name: Hobnobbers
summary: Pillage the mall with your friends, fight murderous Pixys, and worship a divorcée Lady Goddess.

name: HoD: On open seas
summary: A short pirate story with multiple characters in an unknown world.

name: How to Make Slime Maker Play Fun
summary: Make and play with squishy glitter slime in diy jelly, fun kids learning game

name: Hole Switch
summary: Eat the World!

name: Hoover Dam
summary: The monsters have taken over one of our most prized national landmarks. The Hoover Dam has been infested with hell-spawn and it's your job to clean house! Battle your way up and down canyon ledges and caves in this very large, very detailed level. You'll want to stop and enjoy the view as you look up at the majestic Hoover Dam. Just don't stand still too long or you'll be toast! Your final objective is to get to the top of the dam and stop the baddies before they blow it up. Are you up to the task?

name: Hoi
summary: Hoi is a side-scrolling platformer featuring a small, dinosaur-like protagonist. Players navigate through vibrant, hazard-filled levels while avoiding enemies.

name: How to Win: Season One
summary: How to Win is an anarchic adventure/gaming experiment where players decide the rules. Whatever you decide, that’s what happens next in our story. No matter what chaos it creates. Play through all 5 chapters of Season 1, then send us your ideas for Season 2!

name: Honki de Manabu LEC de Goukakuru: Hishou Boki 3-Kyuu Portable
Hopper Copper
summary:
The once quiet town of Grove Town now has a crime problem with four dangerous criminals running around the town committing crimes. This is a job for yourself as the local policeman but you have a problem, all the vehicles have been hidden by the criminals and all that is left is a Space Hopper to bounce around town and catch them all within a time limit.

The game is viewed from the side as you move either left or right along the streets with the screen scrolling as you move. There are various street openings shown by a map of the street above the playing area. You are also able to see any criminals on the same street. At the bottom of the screen is a location of a crime and you can also see your location and a clock ticking down. You move about the streets in search of the criminals and if you find one then you bounce on top of him. Three of the four criminals are armed which are a club, tacks and a gun. Get hit by the gun and the tacks and you lose one of three lives. The club will just stun you and lose you valuable time.

name: Hook Champ
summary: Put on your adventuring hat and swing your grappling hook and fly all over the place in this iPhone-based platform game.

name: Hopper Cat
summary: Join the addiction with the amazing hopper cat!

name: Hotlap Heroes
summary: Fasten your seatbelt, start your engines and invite your friends over for some seriously chaotic single-screen multiplayer racing for up to 8 players in HOTLAP HEROES.

name: Howzat
summary: Howzat is a cricket videogame published in Electron User magazine, volume 3, issue 11.

name: Homecoming

name: Hoggy
summary:
Hoggy is a fun puzzle platformer that combines the best elements of classic side-scrolling video games with a unique puzzle flavor!

You control Hoggy. Your girlfriend has been kidnapped by the moon men, and the only way to get her back is to eat all the fruit out of 45 crazy jar-worlds!

The game has simple controls. Tip your iPhone to move Hoggy left or right, and touch the screen to reverse his gravity.

Use your reflexes to grab all the fruit in each level, and use your mind to force your enemies to grab the fruit you can't reach!

It's a great retro-arcade experience! If you love side scrollers and arcade action, you'll love Hoggy!

name: Holy Avatar Vs Maidens of the Dead
summary:
Demi-god Holy Avatar and his Guild of Maidens are taking a trip to his recently bought holiday island “Holy Island“. Here he can finally relax after countless battles, but this doesn't suit him at all, for he constantly thirsts for new adventures. After a rather rushed arrival on the beach the group make a gruesome discovery: numerous dead maidens, horribly mutilated, are scattered all over the path to the inside of the island. The Guild of Maidens is afraid that something horrible happened in the maidens’ camp on the island. Holy Avatar – secretly happy as an adventure lies ahead – is going to explore with a part of his group what exactly happened. Not knowing what kind of scale this disaster has already taken and what hazards are waiting for him and his companions inside the dense woods and caves…

The brand new spin-off of the successful Grotesque Tactics – universe lets you control several party members with different tactics and skills at the same time. Every member of your group possesses his own skill tree where – after a level up – you can set skills as you like. Take over exciting and humorous tasks to enhance your reputation in the maidens’ camp and to acquire better equipment. Level up and equip your character in order to defeat the enemies that are getting stronger and stronger on your journey into the unknown – defeat the cute but deadly Pookies, legions of bloodthirsty zombies, giant skeleton warriors and even more powerful enemies.

A sequel, titled Honō no Tōkyūjo: Dodge Danko, began serialization on the Weekly CoroCoro Comic website on November 28, 2022. It has been nominated for the Next Manga Award in the web manga category in 2023.

name: Horror Room:Mystery mind story
summary:
Sanzu no Kawa 
 
It is the dividing line between life and death. Dead people passing through the Sanzu no Kawa will dream about what happened in the past and in the future. This dream will show your inner feelings of expectation, anger, helplessness and despair. So this dream also determines the cause and result of what you do in your life. 
 
The Lost 
 
They are neither living nor dead. Their souls left their bodies. But they could not cross Sanzu no Kawa and enter the reincarnation. So they only wander by the Sanzu no Kawa. 
 
The Gallery 
 
There's a gallery on the shore. No one knows when it was built. No one knows how much space it has. The Lost will be attracted to it. 
 
Painting 
 
Blank scrolls.It is the memory of the disappearance of the soul. The owner of the gallery often says, "If you remember anything, there may be a chance to survive." 
 
WuBai 
 
He is an ordinary employee. Like most people, in order to live a better life, busy between work and family. Until one day, some strange dreams began to appear. Familiar surroundings seem strange，Over time, the situation did not improve, the dream became more terrible and began to affect his consciousness.

Vehicles will gather real-time damage while in competition, and can use more than 20 offensive and defensive power-ups to restore their condition. As players advance through the Bash Arena championship, they work their way toward the ultimate goal of induction into the Hot Wheels Bash Arena Hall of Fame.

The only way to survive is by shooting the monsters using blobby deadly traps.

The cave is divided into 4 underground world zones, from dark ice and deep lava to the glow mushroom prison!
Unlock and collect an array of carts, cars, and tanks, and arm yourself with powerful guns to defeat the evil monsters!

You can hear someone's voice through that static noise... Or is it just your imagination..?

name: Hoop Route
summary: A VR game where you use motion controllers to guide a hoop along wire pathways. Maneuver the hoop to the end of each course while avoiding obstacles along the way. Use steady hands and precise timing to avoid letting the hoop touch any surfaces.

name: Hordes of Enemies Bundle
summary: Hordes of Enemies bundle features dynamic action games where you engage in combat against hordes of enemies.

name: Hoops Puzzler
summary:
Shoot this mechanism hoop game! Help our guy by shooting basketball into the hoop. Each level is challenging and with amazing physics-based puzzle. With real physic machanisms, you have to figure out a way to the hoop in each level through intricate
and challenging puzzles. With lay ups, bounce passing, and another smart shots to score a goal. Drag and adjust direction and power, release your finger to make a shot.

name: Holding Keys
summary: Step into the shoes of a food enthusiast and embark on a gastronomic adventure like no other. Unlock hidden taste profiles by holding the keys while preparing a wide range of dishes from various cuisines. Engage in fun time mechanics, experiment with ingredients, and challenge yourself with time management.

name: House of 1000 Doors: The Palm of Zoroaster - Collector's Edition
summary: Return to a sinister unsettled House....very different from the one you remember!

name: Hockey Agent
summary: “Show me the money!” In this innovative hockey management sim, you are an up and coming agent. Can you negotiate with GMs to get good contracts for your players? Do you have what it takes to handle a stable of ego-driven young hockey players and shape their careers? Can you get them drafted and playing in the NHL? If you think you can make money in the murky world of modern sports, leave your morals at the door and step this way…

name: Horror Game Collection
summary:
Triality Games just finished their first 3 Games 3 Weeks 3 Dudes Gamemaking Challenge.
The games vary widely from a gravity-defying experience all the way to an exploration and riddle game.

Including:
- Maybe another Life
- PSYCHOPATH
- Veinless Property

name: Hong Kong Mahjong Pro
summary: Suffer the Ultimate Penalty for your Chicken Hands as you square off against Uncle Chen, Auntie Loo and Dennis Yung in the centuries-old tile game of Mahjong!

name: Honoo no Toukyuuji: Dodge Danpei
summary: Danpei Ichihgeki is the son of Daijurou Ichigeki, a great dodgeball player. As his father, Danpei gives all he has for this game and so it shows in every match.

name: House Builder: Medieval
summary:
"House Builder: Medieval" DLC for the game House Builder on Steam allows you to explore medieval construction. Here are the details of the three new houses you can create:

1. Water Mill House: The first mills were built around 1 B.C. They were equipped with a water wheel used to grind cereals and produce flour and grains. At this DLC level, you can move into a medieval mill and become a miller!

2. Blacksmith's House: Blacksmiths were important professionals in the Middle Ages. They made horseshoes for horses and also produced barrels, nails, and other useful tools. With the DLC, you can feel like a medieval blacksmith and build your own house, including a workshop.

3. Windmill House: Windmills, powered by wind, were used to grind grains. They were invented in the ninth century in Eastern Persia and spread to England and the Netherlands. At the DLC level, you'll construct a wooden windmill, which will also serve as your home!

name: Host no Abunai Sekai
summary:
"Host no Abunai Sekai" is a management simulation where you become the owner of a host club run by handsome guys in a night town.
However, it is not normal. A parade of ultra-black scams!
You can sell cheap sweets and drinks that you can buy at 100 yen at a high price & charge infinitely more than the regular price!

name: Homework Salesman
summary: an rpg maker game

name: Holdfast: Nations At War - Napoleon's Rise
summary: Explore Napoleon's rise to power in Holdfast through this cosmetic content dedicated to the Emperor himself.

name: Horizon Chase Turbo: Ayrton Senna Edition
summary:
This bundle includes the Horizon Chase Turbo base game and its biggest expansion yet, Senna Forever.

Check out the individual store pages for the base game or the DLC if you want to know exactly what’s in each of them.

Full throttle and have fun!

name: Hololive Isekai
summary: Hololivers has been transported to another world!

name: Honoo no Toukyuuji: Dodge Danpei
summary: Hono no Toukyuji: Dodge Danpei is a Sports game, developed and published by SunSoft, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Honshougi: Naitou 9 Dan Shougi Hiden
summary: This game lets players play the Japanese board game Shōgi. Shōgi is a game that is played in a similar way as chess. Players take turns moving their pieces in a strategic manner with the main goal of capturing their opponents pieces and putting their opponents king piece into checkmate. The game features several different game modes. These different game modes offer different opponent difficultly levels, timed games, and also some which let the computer player make the first move instead of the player.

name: Houkago Cinderella: Complete Limited Edition
summary:
A school romance visual novel with the theme of exciting after school confessions and romance with the heroines, through various romantic situations and events on the way home from school.

This edition comes with:

- The Game
- Acrylic Panel
- Micro Fiber Cloth
- Key Chain

summary: A creepy, free-form murder investigation

name: How to Be a Tree
summary: How to Be a Tree is a game about the many ways to be a tree!

name: Horde
summary: See yourself stuck in the middle of an ever growing virus epidemic. Find or craft weapons and tools to fight against the living and the dead. Build a safe place to survive in this cruel, apocalyptic world.

name: Honey, I Joined a Cult
summary: It's time to start working towards that ultimate goal of enlightenment, faith and money…lots and lots of money. Create, customise, expand and manage your own cult whilst listening to funky music in Honey, I Joined a Cult!

name: HopSlide
summary: HopSlide consists of two games, not connected in any way.

name: Home on Prom Night

name: House M.D.: Episode 4 - Crashed
summary: Dr. Gregory House and his elite diagnostic team race against the clock to unravel an all-new medical mystery.

name: HotWire VR
summary: Complete every wire as fast as you can without touching them!

name: Hollenburg: Hell Castle
summary: You are Father Karras, the only one who can enter the hell castle and defeat the dark army and its demonic creations. Explore every corner of the castle and get all kinds of items

name: Hotel Renovator: Palace Furniture Set
summary: This content requires the base game Hotel Renovator on Steam in order to play.Your guests deserve more than just a superb night’s sleep. Elevate the rooms of your Hotel with a 32-item set of prestigious furniture made of sumptuous fabrics and rich colors. Create a heavenly sense of luxury from a unique blend of classic and glamour.

name: Horse & Pony: My Riding Stables
summary: The riding stable at the old mill is going to shine with a new gleam: the condition of the riding hall is alarming, there's a draught in the stall and no one wants to live in the guest house. But that's all in the past, because now you've arrived and are bringing your worst rivals to the edge of despair. Stall, riding hall and guest house will be renovated and soon you'll have enthusiastic guests who are happy to pay for their stay. With the proceeds build a new breeding stall, and soon the first foals will be frolicking with their mothers on the heath. Later you train the foals with the longe and can sell them to interested parties whom you trust. Horse owners will also be happy to call on your services for massages for their four-legged friends. Your own horse is also in the stall and loves to go on exciting rides through the woods, on the beach and in the mountains. Once you've trained enough, you can participate in numerous cross-country races, and each Sunday you can win a cup! Show your rivals that by living with horses a dream can come true!

name: How to Survive: El Diablo Islands
summary: Venture onto a new set of volcanic Islands: discover new fauna and characters, learn to craft fantastic tools and weapons taking advantage of the different weather effects to face the most surprising enemies.

name: Hollow Bliss
summary: Curiosity is a deadly sin, to gain something you must lose something. Is catharsis nothing more than a Hollow Bliss?

name: HotFloor
summary: Run, Jump, Glide, Bounce and maneuver your way through unique and challenging levels. Lack of elegance, however, will get your *** in lava, and nobody wants any of that.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Highway 35 World Race Pack
summary: Straight from the movie Highway 35 World Race, 4 spectacular racing cars that will make the competition tremble even before starting their engines. 24/Seven, Power Pistons, Sling Shot and Vulture: add these extraordinary 4-wheeled masterpieces to your collection!

name: How to Bathe Your Cat
summary: It is well known that cats aren' t really fond of water, but, as pet owners, we know that sometimes a good bath is welcome. Use bombs and blocks to channel the water and clean your cat!

name: Horse Illustrated Championship Season
summary: A horse training, racing, and showing simulation.

name: Home Free
summary: Barking mad open world dog game.

name: Holy Purge
summary: Holy Purge is a co-op horror survival game for up to 3 players. Unite holy forces to stop an evil plague from consuming a medieval village. Unravel Witchcraft, fight off werewolves, and escape the reaper of souls.

name: House of Fear: Cursed Souls
summary:
A house with a suffocating atmosphere… rapidly flickering lights and intimidating noises emanating from the walls, though no one is inside. Eerie whispers. Sudden angry shouts. Shadows moving in the darkness. A total darkness of the unknown. The deeper you dig into the story of The House, the more The House enters your soul. The dead need the living. They need you.

A mysterious and brutal murder in a small town shocked the locals. Rumor has it that one night occultists killed the entire family and cursed their souls, imprisoning them forever in the walls. Can you solve this intricate mystery? Are you truly ready to explore every corner of this dark and gloomy place to free the poor unfortunate souls of the family? Think long and hard. Should you fail, The House will devour your soul forever.

name: Hockey Rage 2005
summary: An ice hockey game for the Gizmondo. Features a 2-player mode via Bluetooth.

name: HopHeaders
summary: We present you a miniature arcade clicker game about people with square heads jumping on platforms and avoiding obstacles.

summary: Saddle up and jump into horse & pony filled action

name: Hop Mania

summary: 'Hoyeonjigi' is a point-and-click adventure game with a beautiful pixel art. Play as the water strider Hoyeon, the guardian of the pond, who takes a journey to meet the Buddha with a small lotus flower.

summary: Welcome to Hotel Boom! A game about hotel management, where you have to make sure that your guests are happy and well fed. Manage your hotel, prepare delicious meals and provide top-notch guest service.

name: Homaysa
summary: One VR app to play, sing, chat, relax, teach or even preach. A world of fantasy and real life simulations all to be experienced in VR.

name: Hop Man
summary: Are you sick of walking? Do better and just jump. Go on a Castle adventure in Hop Man with your pals! You must overcome the traps by yourself to see what lies behind them, but keep in mind that there are no shortcuts to the castle.

name: Hot Vacation
summary: Hot Vacation is a puzzle game in which you need to collect a picture to advance further! You will find 9 colorful art, each of which will delight you with beautiful drawing and excellent detail! Take it while it's hot!

name: HorseGame
summary: HorseGame is an upcoming action/adventure style game, based on small horses. Use its unique magical combat system to fight your way through hordes of enemies while exploring the exotic levels!

name: House of Portals VR
summary: Do you want to escape reality? Stick your head through one of the various paintings in the "House of Portals" & experience the whole atmosphere behind it. Walk, run, interact or just look around! Be part of something extraordinary!

name: Horny Mage Chronicles
summary: A succubus has attacked your home, leaving you the only one to have escaped. A mysterious witch has rescued you, and proposes that you defeat the succubus... with your body?

name: Horny Alice: Gothic Run
summary: Horny Alice: Gothic Run is a colorful runner set in a Gothic setting in which you play as the cursed prince. Your main task is to free a princess named Alice. Collect magic crystals to restore pleasant memories of the events associated with Alice.

name: Home Sweet RoN
summary: A Point And Click Adventure Game created by DarkWater as part of the Reality-On-The-Norm project.

name: Horror em Amityville
summary: Horror em Amityville is a horror text adventure for the MSX.

name: HordeZ
summary: If you are looking for a on-rails arcade experience that blends between classics like Doom, Left 4 dead and House of the Dead then we got you covered! Fast and simple gameplay that will bring you into a creepy world of zombies and demons. Show your skills to the world through our global leadboard system! Bring a friend in multiplayer Co-Op game and send those zombies flying back to hell!

name: Hollow Mission
summary: A game that follows a soldier in his mission to find out what has happened to a lab out in the woods.

name: Hold Out
summary: Hold out and survive in this 1-4 player co-op shooter in a dark, zombie infested world. Prepare defenses and board up windows to survive against the oncoming hordes of zombies.

name: Hotel: Collector's Edition

name: Home Sweet Home: Online
summary: Welcome to Niwarn in its fullest form, from the creators of the Home Sweet Home series, ready for you to feel what it's like to be a thrilling visitor. Experience the clash between the two great forces in Niwarn as both the prey and predator simultaneously.

name: Houdini's Castle
summary: Save your sister from Bluebeard's Castle in this incredible hidden object puzzle adventure! After the nefarious Count Bluebeard decides to marry your sister Clarice, you discover that all of his previous wives have turned up dead. Solve perplexing puzzles, scour gorgeous locations, and find useful items to save Clarice from an untimely death at the hands of a madman. Can you escape from Bluebeard's Castle?

name: Horror Stories: Please Comply
summary: In this game it's in your best interest to comply.

name: Hole Theory
summary: Eat everything

name: Hockey! / Soccer!
summary:
Two titles are available in this cart: 
 
Hockey!: five field players and one goalkeeper are displayed at each side of the field. The player closest to the puck will be displayed holding the hockey stick and will be controlled by using the joystick. The goalkeeper will follow his movements. Making body contact will immobilize the players, and they can be separated by using the directional stick. To shoot the puck, the action button must be pressed. The game lasts three periods of five minutes each. 
 
Soccer!: five field players and one goalkeeper are displayed at each side of the field. The player closest to the ball will be displayed flashing and will be controlled by using the joystick. The goalkeeper will follow his movements. Making body contact will immobilize the players, and they can be separated by using the directional stick. If too many players get in touch, the game will be stopped. The propelled when a player hits it with head or legs. Pressing the action button when touching the ball will propel it farther. The game lasts two periods of five minutes each.

name: Hollow Longing
summary:
When I woke up, I found myself in a supreme paradise called Shangri-la.
A world full of happiness where you just have to live as a life.
Shiva, a girl who only knew the outside world from fairy tales, is thrilled by the paradise.
How is this paradise a paradise?
Harboring mysteries and repeating numerous encounters, the paradise gradually changes its appearance.

name: Hoops
summary: Gym rats, beware! HOOPS takes you out to the asphault, where basketball is a half-court game of fast hands, faster moves and slam-jam-thank-you-Sam dunks! The legends of the Playground are all here: Mr. Doc, Jammer, Legs, Bomber, Wiz, eight players in all. You can pit them one-on-one or two-on-two. You pick the court - Eastern or Western - and you pick the rules, too. You can play against the computer or one other player. Or you can even team up with another player against the computer. You can block shots, make steals, pass off or go strong to the hoop - in fact, you control just about everything in this ultra-realistic rendition of the playground game. Except, of course, the final score. But win or lose, you know you've been in a game after you've played a game of HOOPS!

name: Hoboman
summary: Hoboman is a 2d sci-fi platformer with retro graphics and a wacky story. Play as Pluto the Voltran as you travel across the galaxy and thwart the evil Syndicat organization!

name: Horror Maze: Sci-Fi Edition
summary:
Arcade gameplay with modern sci-fi design.
This sci-fi horror game is an homage one of our favorite arcade games.
Collect all the dots without getting caught by the 4 horrifying space monsters to beat the high score.

name: Home Run Boy
summary: Home Run Boy is a baseball reflex game. Prove your skills by hitting incoming balls quickly.

name: Hookah Cafe Simulator

name: Hollowmoor

name: Homebrew32

name: Home Maid: Owari no Tachi
summary: Japanese adventure game for PS2.

name: Hometown Poker Hero: Platinum Edition
summary: Play Hometown Poker Hero and enjoy an amazing poker game! Jimmy's old neighbourhood has fallen on hard times after the Grimaldi Syndicate took control in town. There's only one way to save the city; by beating the Grimaldis in many challenging poker matches. Are you up for an incredible adventure?

Houkago in Beppin Jogakuin is a Strategy game, developed by Access and published by Imagineer, which was released in Japan in 1995.
The purpose of this game is to choose one of the three high school girls to become a top-notch special spy. Let's manage the schedule, paying attention to the suspension of school.

Holotyping is a Hololive fan-made typing game.

summary:
Fast button-based low rule local multiplayer hockey game.
I think it's fun with friends, but most things are.

name: Hover Biker
summary: The ultimate hover simulation game for iOS. Hover Biker employs a state of the art hover simulation to immerse the player in engaging game play. The game is set in a rich city environment that is completely open for the player to explore. You are free to roam wherever the bike can take you. The game will come with a diverse set of challenges. You can use either touch controls or tilt controls to pull off some fantastic manoeuvres.

name: Horsez
summary: In Horsez, you join a new academy where you need to train your horse to make him into a champion. You get to take care of an adorable foal.

name: Home's Embrace
summary: Home is where you should be safe, right?

name: Hold Controller
summary: Hold Controller is a VR game similar to electric shock maze. Players can use one or two controllers to cross the designed level. Carefully observe, smoothly control both hands to complete the level, and charge the core.

name: How Long Can You Survive
summary: How long can you survive is a survival game that the more time you spend in the same game, the harder it will be to kill the enemies.Try to reach the top of the leaderboards by getting the longest time possible in infinite mode.

name: Home Alone 2: Lost in New York
Horror Bundle: 3 in 1
summary: Horror Bundle 3 in 1: Paratopic + Fatum Betula + Blood Breed

name: House Flipper: Apocalypse
summary: Expand your House Flipper nuclear safety options with the Apocalypse Flipper DLC Pack!

name: Hollywhoot
summary: Follow the journey of being the best director in the world. Simulate your own directing style in movie making using variety of diverse talents. Let the movie production progress on its own while you are doing your work or tap your screen like crazy, to fasten the progress. Be a part of exciting and thrilling path to discover all kinds of talents and create the best movie of all time.

name: Hope is in 23
summary: Hope is in 23 is a supernatural First person shooter set on an island where humans are hunted and killed for sport. A rift opened from another dimension bringing forth monsters that almost wiped out humanity.Find your friends and keep the enemy from learning your secret.

name: House Call
summary:
House Call is a short stealth-exploration game where you play as an elderly woman's pet cat desperately trying to get out of a visit from her grandchildren unbothered.

Run.

Hide.

Knock things over like some kind of animal.

Explore your home and neighborhood as the seasons change, and try to relax a little in this small approximation of a cat's life.

name: Holiday Jigsaw: Thanksgiving Day 2

summary: Your own horse - groom, pet, ride!

name: Hotel in the Dark
summary: That's the day it all started on Sept. 13. 2020. In the early morning of the same day, I was already standing at the bus station, waiting for my bus. I had to travel a couple of three hundred kilometers to a small town. I found a hotel quickly. It was quite a modern building at first glance.

name: Houserot
summary: i don't leave the house much

name: House of Asterion
summary:
"The House is the same size as the world; or rather it is the world"

Asterion (noun)
I. (Mythology) The Minotaur of the Cretan labyrinth.
II. (Anatomy) A point on the exterior of the skull.
III. (Astronomy) A star in the Canes Venatici.

name: Hot and Lovely: Charm
summary: You can check the numbers by clicking on the cards in the game. When two cards with the same number are opened at the same time, the cards will disappear, and when all the cards are eliminated, the level is successfully passed.

name: Honkaku Taisen Shogi Ayumu
summary: This is the first shogi game supervised by Taku Morishita, who has always participated in A-class title battles, afflicted A-class players, and was nicknamed the "runner-up man." There are 3 COM levels according to the player's level. Even the beginner level did not suddenly make an unthinkable foolish move, and made everything from "a little weakness" to "demon strength". You can play against your friends using the communication cable. In addition, there are shogi classes and the next move. In the shogi class, there are more than 100 questions about tsume shogi, which is enough to enjoy for a long time.

name: Hoples
summary: Hoples - 2D hardcore precision platformer with time limits.

name: Hour of Survival: Zombie Craft
summary: Navigate a post-apocalyptic world, where every decision can mean life or death. Scavenge for food, water, and supplies to keep your character alive in the face of constant danger.

name: Horde of Directors
summary: The game puts the player in the role of an activist trying to advance a social agenda in the complex world of interrelated corporate and government interests. By creating simplified experience of corporate interconnectedness, the game embodies the challenges of overcoming corporate and government nepotism in the name of social causes.

name: Hot Wheels: King of the Road
summary:
Get behind the wheel of six iconic Hot Wheels cars. Each machine has two cameras that take player snapshots.
Drive through three exciting racetracks and be the king of the road! Each player is identified to their racing car. Players always know where their cars are in the race, further increasing the sense of competition.

name: House of Mouse
summary:
Get ready to challenge your friends in exciting, action packed mini games in House of Mouse by GameiMax.
House of Mouse, a world of delight right at the tip of your fingers With just one simple touch in this itsy bitsy world of fun, you'll be running, flying, and bumping around to gather stars and power-ups.

name: Horatio: Connector 13
summary: Akio's accidental encounter with "Horatio’s Life" leads to a mysterious journey intertwining his past with a parallel world. Unravel secrets, confront otherworldly threats, and uncover the truth in this atmospheric adventure.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Light Slips the Gate, Shadow Greets the Throne
summary:

name: Hollywood Squares
summary:
Hollywood Squares is a quiz game based on the television game show Hollywood Squares. Versions were released for the Nintendo Entertainment System, MS-DOS, Commodore 64, and Apple II. The game is based on the 1986-1989 version hosted by John Davidson. The photo of the set is from the 1985 series pilot (the actual show had no gold stars on the studio floor and more elaborate risers for the cars).

Players have to either agree or disagree with fictitious celebrities to earn squares and make tic-tac-toe. Much like the TV series, winning one of the first two games is worth $500, the third game is worth $1,000 and the second game is always the "Secret Square" game. The winner then goes on to the bonus round, where they have to choose one of five keys and insert it into the proper car among the five offered.

But of course the player has to work for it - in this case the task is to win six illegal street races in Aachen, Paris, Lyon, Marseilles, Monaco and Nice. There are five humorous exaggerated persons to choose, e.g. a hippie or a stressed family father.

The races are heavily action oriented and include power-ups which either increase the top speed, freeze other cars or repair the own vehicle. Between the races the player can invest earned points in better tires, engines or gearboxes; he also can gamble for other equipment. The available vehicles are no regular cars but jet ski trailers or jeeps. When beating the game with all vehicle types the player unlocks a special car.

So, make the trip to Hotel Hideaway and establish YOUR tribe; there’s oodles of fun to be had and a mountain of games waiting to be played!

Please note that Hotel Hideaway is for Ages 17+.  It requires minimum of iPad 2, iPhone 4s or iPod Touch 5th generation and an active Internet connection.

This game requires the use of the Kid's Controller, although the keyboard and touch pad controllers work fine with it also.
A version of Holey Moley complete with a cartridge, manual, box and Kid's Controller overlay was sold at the 2002 Classic Gaming Expo. You can purchase a copy of Holey Moley by visiting Atari2600.com.
