summary: Homeworld 3 Deluxe Edition includes Base Game and Year One Pass. The Year One Pass includes three DLC drops that expand the co-op War Games mode with new playable factions and artifacts.

name: Holy Stone Mage
summary: This is a mixed type game that can cultivate characters, and battles can be divided into tower defense and duel modes. Players can also enter random maps for exploration, challenge difficult bosses, or discover treasures

name: Honour & Freedom II Power Enhanced Edition
Hold 'Em
summary: Hold 'Em (formerly Windows Poker as in build 5284) is a poker card game released on January 29, 2007 that is fundamentally similar to Texas hold 'em. Hold 'Em allows users to play against up to five computer players and up to three levels of difficulty, and also allows users to customize aspects of the game's appearance; the game relies on DirectX to produce hardware-accelerated 3D animations and effects.

name: Hotel Hysteria!
summary: The evil Dr. Von Gordo has kidnapped Madame Moon! you, Vince Vinchi and your...sidekick Kaizo have to find clues to her location by searching through Dr. Von Gordo's Kooky Hotels!

name: Hop! Step! Dance!
summary:
A spin-off of the Fitness Boxing series, Hop! Step! Dance! is a dancing lessons game teaching players different movement and choreography with a 30-step course covering 84 lessons created by a professional dancing instructor.

The game has 2 new instructors for the main lessons with 2 additional instructions, Rin and Hiro from Fitness Boxing 2, as part of the practical "free" and "stretch" modes. The free mode has 6 original dances with speed settings and practice options for the different parts.

name: Home Sweet Home
summary: A sweet game about wandering around a neighborhood and making friends

name: Horse Club Adventures 2: Gold Edition
summary: Horse Club Adventures 2: Gold Edition includes the game Horse Club Adventures 2 Hazelwood Stories incl. the additional content "Secrets of Skeifa".

name: Honor of Kings
summary: Honor of Kings (also translated as King of Glory) is a multiplayer online battle arena (MOBA) game published by Tencent for iOS and Android. It features adventure mode, random matches and ladder mode, also an e-sport league called KPL.

name: Hotel Giant DS
summary: In Hotel Giant DS you play as an ambitious hotel director, who dreams of turning a simple motel into a luxurious hotel. But beware of competition and VIPs; they can push you to bankruptcy!

name: Hollywood Tycoon
summary: Hollywood Tycoon by Astragon

name: Hooligan Vasja 2: Journey through time
summary: Help Vasja break the spell of evil witch Morgana. She has broken an ancient amulet and sent its shards to different time periods. Retrieve all the shards to complete the amulet and return Vasja back to present.

name: Homeworld 3: Fleet Command Edition
summary: Homeworld 3: Fleet Command edition includes the base game, the Year One Pass, Multiplayer Customization Set, Digital Soundtrack & unlocks access to play 72 hours early.

name: Horse Life 4
summary:
Gallop towards brand new adventures in a beautiful vast open world that's begging to be discovered! Compete in tournaments and various activities to show off what a dream team you are!

Create your own character and choose a loyal companion from 12 different breeds of horse. You can customise their look with a variety of new outfits and accessories. Clean, feed and care for your steed by playing a variety of fun mini-games. Unlock special content using Play Coins that youve earned and interact with your horse in real world surroundings in Augmented Reality mode.

With Local Play, you can saddle up and compete against up to three friends.

name: Horror haze
summary: Explore the world, learn magic spells, defeat enemies and solve tricky puzzles. All this awaits you in "Horror haze".

name: Homura
summary: In Homura, you take control of a samurai in a fantasy take on Japan's Edo period, as the samurai flies through vertically scrolling shooting stages. You can make your samurai shoot, use a screen-clearing bomb and perform a slash with his sword. The slash move forms the core of Homura's gameplay, as by slashing enemy bullets, you can send them back at the enemy. Homura features multi-form bosses and four stages of play, with stages one through three branching off into multiple paths. The game is based on an arcade title.

name: Horny Hotel Maids
summary: Horny Hotel Maids is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Horizon of History
summary:
Horizon of History is an educational VR experience that will take you on a journey through the ages.

It's a virtual time machine that will teleport you between key periods of the history of Poland's capital city - Warsaw.

name: Hotel Transylvania Adventures: Run, Jump, Build!
summary: Mavis let the adorable but troublemaking Wolf Pups go, and now they’re roaming free around the monster-filled Hotel Transylvania, wreaking havoc. Aunt Lydia is NOT happy and has grounded poor Mavis. The only way her punishment will be dropped is if she rights her wrongs. Help her run, jump and find the Wolf Pups to stop them from causing more damage, and get the hotel back into tip-top shape.

name: Holiday Tapp Gingerbread Chase
summary:
Ho, ho, ho..! It seems Santa hasn't noticed he is loosing gifts!
Help him and catch as many gifts as you can. Some gifts contain gingerbread stickers, which you can use when sending iMessages to your family and friends.
What's more, if you catch 12 different gingerbread cookies in a single game you will unlock over 40 stickers including 19 animated ones!
If you have no patience you may also purchase all stickers via in app purchase.
If you are logged to Game Center you can also see leaderboard with results of other players and you will also get awards for achievements in saving gifts for Santa (and eating the candy). You can also challenge your friends.
Get ready for Christmas and start counting those gifts and collect stickers while you wait for real Santa!

name: Horror Tomb
summary: Horror Tomb is a first person Chinese horror adventure puzzle game set in an Oriental context.

name: Hop Step Sing! Happy People
summary: Have you ever imagined supporting your idols in an intimate way like changing their hairstyles, photo shooting for them, or lighting up their stage in VR space? 《Happy People》 is the ultimate interactive entertainment that can fulfill your dream!

name: Hoyle Casino Empire
summary: The goal of Hoyle Casino Empire is to create a thriving casino. There are two modes in the game; Empire Mode and Sandbox Mode. Empire Mode sends the player to one of eight casinos starting with a small one and working up to the biggest casino. In each casino the player will have specific objectives to meet in a limited time in order turn the casino into a successful place. Not meeting the objectives in time will end the game. Sandbox mode allows the player to build whatever casino desired without any objectives to follow or limited time. In this mode, the player is limited to one kind of casino, but can unlock more upon winning them from the Empire Mode.

name: Home: Mother
summary: The "HOME" series is a miniature word game based on different native family backgrounds. Explore each room, collect information clues through solving puzzles and finding objects, and infer and restore the protagonist's secrets and life story.

name: Hoshi Saga
summary: Hoshi Saga is a simple game of discovery. One part point-and-click and one part puzzle game, the objective in each of the game's 36 stages is to find the star. How you go about doing that is different for every stage. The task is up to you to figure out how.

name: Hoyle Casino 2006
summary: Different casino games.

name: Hovertank 3D
summary: One of the first games of iD Software. Sometimes it's claimed to be the first FPS or even first 3D game for DOS. The game used the same combination of scaled sprites and drawn walls that would later show up in Catacomb 3D and Wolfenstein 3D, but the walls in it are solid colors with no textures.

name: House of Legacy
summary: Early autumn, as rebel forces breached the city walls, you found yourself at the helm of your surviving kin, embarking on an arduous journey. Seeking refuge in the last bastion of unyielding hope, a county seat untarnished by the chaos, you ignited the flames of a nascent dynasty.

name: Hot Brain
summary: Fire up your mind with Hot Brain, a game that engages the mind through a series of puzzles and challenges designed to raise the activity and temperature of your brain. Hot Brain presents challenging and fun mental activities that help ignite your mind in areas like logic, memory, math, language and concentration. Exclusive to the PSP system, the game allows you to test your skills in several single player modes or you can play with up to three people via ad-hoc connection. Fire up your mind with four main game modes including two multiplayer modes (Brain Race and Think Tank) and two single player modes (Test Mode and Practice). Whether you're an expert or a beginner, a robust tutorial mode makes the game accessible and enjoyable to people of all ages.

name: Horse Club Adventures: Lakeside Collection
summary: Saddled, up and away! Ride together with the girls from Horse Club and discover a colorful world full of adventure and experience in the Horse Club Adventures : Lakeside Collection

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Sheila's Modern Kitchen
summary: Step into the culinary world of Michelin Star pastry chef, Sheila, in this DLC. Help redesign her kitchen into a glamorous baking haven, making every creation a delightful experience.

name: Honey Pot
summary: Dive into the immersive world of 'Honey Pot,' a cooperative action-strategy VR game where you and your friends become bees defending the hive from bears on the hunt. Fly, gather honey, construct turrets, deploy stingers, and use bow and arrow attacks in a frantic battle to protect Queen Bee Melli's domain. Team up, strategize, and save the hive in this thrilling VR experience!

name: Hourglass of Summer
summary: Hourglass of Summer is a visual novel wherein a boy begins inexplicably traveling through random intervals of his summer vacation. Discovering that the girl he likes will die before the summer's end, he must do everything in his power to prevent this future from coming to be.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - If One Dreams At Midnight
summary:
Version 2.0 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Black Swan, Sparkle and Misha
• New Trailblaze Mission: Long Day's Journey Into Night
• New planet: Penacony, the Planet of Festivities
• New enemies: Dreamjolt Troupe, Memory Zone Memes and more
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Galactic Roaming
summary:
Version 1.1 of Honkai: Star Rail, which included:
• New characters: Luocha, Silver Wolf and Yukong
• New area: Belobog - History and Culture Museum
• New companion missions for Silver Wolf, Luocha, Yanqing and Bailu
• New main event: Starhunt Game
• …and more!

name: Honk III
summary: QUACK AND HONK UNTIL IT'S DONE!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Crown of the Mundane and Divine
summary:
Version 1.6 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Ruan Mei, Dr. Ratio and Xueyi
• New area: Herta Space Station - Seclusion Zone
• New Forgotten Hall stages
• Simulated Universe update
• New event: Pure Fiction
• …and more!

name: Holomancer
summary: Embark on an epic journey in OBU, a top-down shooter blending intense combat with strategic crafting and exploration. Navigate diverse levels, battle formidable foes, and harness your creativity to craft and upgrade gear. Dive into a world where skill and strategy shape your adventure.

name: Hole io: Warzone
summary: Wear army skins and visit the new Military map with your friends!

name: Hordiaz
summary:
Hordiaz is a combination of survival, simulator and role-playing. Explore the magical lands of Solinia, surrounded
by dangers, adventures, secrets and deities.

name: How to Build a Magnificent Kingdom
summary: The once prosperous kingdom of Avon now lies in tatters with nothing left in its coffers and a pitiful four citizens to its name. Yet even at its darkest hour, Princess Ariadne is still determined to restore it back to its former glory. Will her perseverance carry her through?

name: House Chores
summary:
House Chores is a visual novel where you experience the story of a young man on his summer vacation. Problems arise when he begins to see someone close to him in a much different manner. To make matters worse, two unexpected guests barge in and complicate this messy summer even further!

Can you score it big during your summer vacation? Or will you start the school year empty handed?

name: Hot Shocker
summary: Dudley must change the color of the web by walking on it while being chased.

name: Hot Girls VR
summary: Welcome to the world full of beautiful, hot girls, meet them all, play with them at the party and... Do what you want. Everything depends on your imagination.

name: Hop Spring Girl
summary: "Hop Spring Girl" is a 2D platform action game where you aim to reach the top by controlling hopping.

name: How to Tame a Succubus
summary: After a tragedy in your past, you move to the Cursed Forest to live with monsters. It is there that you are attacked by a succubus. In order to survive her attack, you are able to attain a ring that binds you to her. You must now tame her so that she doesn't drain your life force and kill you.

name: Homebrew: Patent Unknown
summary: Homebrew is a physics based vehicle sandbox where creativity is key, by providing you with the right building tools it ensures that your imagination is the limit!

name: Hollywood Files: Deadly Intrigues
summary: Help Zoey, a private detective, find out who killed a famous star in Hollywood Files: Deadly Intrigues, a fun Hidden Object game! After a man is murdered, it's up to Zoey to get to the bottom of the case and bring the killer to justice! Explore locations throughout Hollywood and use your keen detective skills to close another case before the trail turns cold in Hollywood Files: Deadly Intrigues!

name: Hordelicious
summary: Get ready to rock! Hordelicious is a semi-hardcore wave based arena shooter. Survive against endless hordes of enemies with over 45 randomly looted weapons and a plethora of items and upgrades to choose from!

name: Homeland
summary: Homeland is a Japanese-exclusive game for the Nintendo GameCube. Its main claim to fame is that it is the only non-Phantasy Star Online title in the system's library to officially support online multiplayer, although the implementation of it is different compared to most other games.

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - Deluxe
Hover Skate VR
summary: Hover Skate is a physics based hoverboard simulator for VR with over 250 skateboard tricks to learn and master.

name: Hong Kong Mahjong
summary: Hong Kong Mahjong is a classic Chinese game of skill. Your goal is to try to get the highest point value combination by following the Hong Kong scoring system.

name: Homo Ludus
summary: Translated from rapid sub-supersonic squeaks clicks and whistles

name: Hover Cubes: Arena
summary: Hover Cubes: Arena is a competitive first-person action jump 'n' run, combining a fast dynamic gameplay (air jumps, wall jumps, dash and slides) and shooter mechanics to reach a whole new level. Be part of a great tournament! Play with or against your friends or challenge other players worldwide.

name: Hobo Cat Adventures
summary: Join a homeless cat in this 3d platformer with souls-lite combat and dark humor. Explore the Squirrel Kingdom - a place full of secrets, collectibles and new weapons to find. Complete jobs for weird characters. Fight, dodge or parry challenging enemies and bosses with a lock-on combat system.

name: Hordes.io
summary:
Find your clan, survive large scale open world PVP and arenas, hunt down bosses and fight your way to the top in this group oriented MMORPG.
Hordes.io is a free to play 3D Multiplayer Browsergame in Open Beta.

name: Holoception
summary: HOLOCEPTION is a new type of VR game allowing you to incarnate a character in 3rd person view. Everything is fully physics-based and gives you a lot of control and freedom to move and fight!

name: Hookscrap
summary: Fight as the owner of Hookscrap in a thrilling 2D rogue-like. Unleash the power of your Harpoon, by launching ships & asteroids at enemies. Upgrade your ship with loot from your foes, and become even stronger. Explore 5 unique levels in a randomly generated map & take down the fearsome SC Judgement!

name: Horror Bundle: Paratopic + Fatum Betula
summary: Looking for a thrilling experience? This bundle is perfect for you!

name: Honoo no Toukyuuji: Dodge Danpei 2
summary: A Famicom exclusive sequel to a multiplatform dodgeball game.

name: Holos lisu
summary: Holos lisu is an exciting story based on Ukrainian folklore. Enter the role of an agent of the Police Bureau of Investigation and find out what secrets the forest hides. Meet local residents and immerse yourself in their stories. Put the puzzle pieces together to see the full picture and reveal Yvette's story. Hear the voice of the forest!

name: Hot Racing
summary: A top-down racing game with shooting mechanics, similar to Spy Hunter.

name: House Builder VR
summary: Travel around the world and through the ages to build iconic designs! Beware unpleasant temperatures and dangerous fauna! Now in VR to fully immerse in the adventure...

name: Honke Hanafuda
summary: Honke Hanafuda is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Aisystem Tokyo and published by Imagineer, which was released in Japan in 1994. It was later released as a downloadable game for the Satellaview.

name: Hologram Time Traveler
summary: Time Traveler is a laserdisc FMV arcade game where the player controls Marshal Gram as he travels through time warps in order to save a damsel in distress. The most notable aspect of the game is its graphics, which appeared to look like holographs.

name: Holy Stick!
summary: Holy Stick! is a 2D multiplayer fighting game, which lets you cut your friends’ legs with a machete or blow their brains out using powerful guns. Experience unique playthroughs every time you play, thanks to multiple gamemodes and crazy modifiers!

name: Honeymancer
summary: Honeymancer is a cute RPG and Farm Simulator with wave-based combat.Play as a secluded Bear Witch. She's a beekeeper and a user of honey magic.Help your bee friends make honey by planting flowers, use your honey to cast spells and protect the forest from evil robots.

name: Hostile Terrain
summary: This map is based on a Quake map all the way from 1997 called F**ing hostile.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Stygian Nymph
summary:
Version 3.5 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the beginning of the 'A Shooting Star Streaking Across the Night' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Hawk of the Fog (Fu Hua) & Stygian Nymph (Seele)
• New Story Chapter XIII: ARC Nocturne
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Cyberangel
summary:
Version 3.3 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyries: Herrscher of Reason (Bronya) & Void Drifter (Kiana)
• New Story Chapter XI-EX: Void Heavens & Diane's Sojourn
• New Featured Event: Odd Drifter
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Edict of Twilight
summary:
Version 3.4 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the 'From the Deep Ocean' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Twilight Paladin (Theresa)
• New Story Chapter XII: Plain of Vigrid
• New Animated Short: Seele
• Level Cap Increase to 85
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Sublime Spring
summary:
Version 3.7 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Azure Empyrea (Fu Hua)
• New ELF: Book of Fuxi
• New Featured Event: Empyrean Legends
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Ninja's Noir
summary:
Version 3.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, marking the conclusion of the 'A Shooting Star Streaking Across the Night' arc, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Darkbolt Jonin (Yae Sakura)
• New Story Chapter XIV: Dispel the Darkness
• New Animated Short: Meteoric Salvation
• New Featured Event: Sanka Saga
• ...and more!

name: House Designer 2
summary: House Designer 2 is the perfect choice for those who want to test their design skills and create their dream home. With great graphics and ray tracing, tons of mechanics and challenges, and the ability to work on different styles of houses, the game is sure to keep you busy for hours.

name: How
summary: A psychological horror game where you play as a prisoner exploring the depths of a large and horrific medical facility. You must survive the many creatures and abominations inside and find all the secrets hidden within the strange new labyrinth.

name: Holo Dungeon
summary: Play as Hololive's ace detective Amelia WATson as she investigates the kingdom of Chicago in search of mythical creatures.

name: Hot Glue
summary: Create "Figures" and then do erotic things with them!

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Farewell, Penacony
summary:
Version 2.3 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Firefly and Jade
• New Trailblaze mission: Farewell, Penacony
• New area: The Radiant Feldspar
• New gameplay modes: Divergent Universe and Apocalyptic Shadow
• New quality of life updates
• New main event: Origami Bird Clash
• …and more!

name: Horror Break: Head to Head
summary: Horror Break Head to Head is a retro arcade game that lets 1 and 2 players play head to head in a competitive arcade environment. Unique animated fantasy items tumble down toward the users paddle along with Mini-Bosses and Powerups. Collect powerups as you progress through the levels and defeat your opponent. Thirty Levels to compete in and battle mini bosses on your way to victory in single player and two player modes.

name: Holy Undead
summary: An undead-loving necromancer is reincarnated as a saint!? By chance, the necromancer Frankel is reborn as Yurishia, a girl with the incredible qualities of a saint. Today, too, she ignores the expectations of those around her and forges ahead on her path to collecting undead.

name: Holiday Rush
summary: Holiday Rush it's a time management game set in a travel agency. The player must carry out the travel packets that the different clients make to him to earn money that can be used to reform and expand the establishment.

name: Houma Hunter Lime Dai 03 Wa
summary:
A magical world populated by supernatural creatures exists alongside ours. Once in a while a portal between the two opens. Demons known as BEMs ("big-eyed monsters") have stolen precious jewels and escaped to Earth through that portal. It is up to two demon hunters, Lime and Bass, to assume the likeness of a teenage girl and boy and restore peace and order.

The third episode of the series is, like its predecessors, an interactive cartoon with visual novel elements. The interaction is sparse, consisting of repeatedly selecting simple verb commands from a menu and triggering animated cutscenes.

In this episode a fit of jealousy on Lime's side sends Bass to the hospital. Upon arrival, however, the two discover a very strange hospital manager and begin to suspect yet another BEM infiltration.

name: How to Survive: Kovac's Way
summary: Just when you thought you knew How to Survive….things get a whole load tougher! Really use your survival instinct or you will become extinct! This additional game mode introduces a new difficulty level to the game available for Story mode and is playable online, local, solo and multiplayer.

name: How to Survive 2: Kovac's Ultimate Edition
summary: How to Survive 2 - Kovac's Ultimate Edition" contains the base game "How to Survive 2" plus finely crafted DLC by master survivalist Kovac himself.

name: Hole in One Special
summary: Sequel to "Hole in One", and "Hole in One Professional". This one is for the MSX2 and makes good use of its graphics capabilities.

name: Horse Racing Manager
summary: Become a stable owner, a jockey and bet on horse races.

name: Hoky
summary:
Hoky is a minimalist local multiplayer game from the abstract minds of Kitty Calis and Jan Willem Nijman, with audio by Eirik Suhrke.
A non-traditional take on the classic sport of hockey, HOKY bends the rules and intentionally avoids deep knowledge of the source material.
Ignorance or a fresh perspective? There's only one way to find out!
Up to 4 players grab their sticks and slide onto the ice, cheered on by dynamic audience AI and their personal lust for sports.

name: Horn of Balance
summary: Come explore this world of secrets and adventure. Featuring solid 2D Zelda-like gameplay, vast non-linear dungeons and a wholesome story about a young golem protagonist called Linden.

name: Hoodgang Simulator
summary: An open world game crafted in an artistic voxel style. Riveting in a resplendent American metropolis, players can take on a wide array of tasks, trigger random events, or relish the thrill of blazing races and intriguing shootouts.

name: HoneyCome Come Come Party
summary: Discover the ultimate in character customization. Mold your perfect partner to your exacting specifications, then fall in love—or descend into the deepest depths of carnal desire...

name: Hoshi no Oka Gakuen Monogatari: Gakuensai
summary: Kazuya Murata, the main character, is transferred to a new school, in which he has to help organize the school festival that is one month away. In the meantime, he will also get along with the other students, as they all make sure to make the school festival a fun experience.

name: Hoard: Flame-Broiled Sandwich
summary: Hoard: Flame-Broiled SANDwich takes the treasure gathering action to the mystical sands of the desert continent! Buildings, units, and terrain have been painstakingly remodeled to spotlight the colorful garb and inspired architecture of the desert kingdoms.

name: Horse Tales: Emerald Valley Ranch - The Arabian Horse Pack
summary: Continue your experience by bringing a brand new horse breed into your stable: The legendary Arabian thoroughbred!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged - Fast X Pack
summary: The HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED 2 - Fast X Pack is made for those who live for speed. Featuring unstoppable cars like the El Camino, Alfa Romeo Giulia Sprint GTA, BMW M5 and the Datsun 240Z, you'll go from 0 to 60 in an instant.

name: Host Master and the Conquest of Humor
summary: Players control Tim Schafer, president and CEO of Double Fine, as he leaves his jokes for hosting the GDC awards to the last minute and has to scramble to find them all in a SCUMM-style adventure game.

name: Home VR
summary: Home is a thrilling VR stealth game following the story of a little girl trying to escape monsters in her boarding school. Think Alien: Isolation but it's VR, you're a little girl with no weapons and you can hide within walls and objects.

name: Hoard: Dynamite Roll!
summary: Hoard: Dynamite Roll! DLC pack is full of new and exciting content including new maps, new units, new powerups, and more achievements!

name: Home Creator
summary: Home Creator provides you with a set of tools to create your dream home! Choose the size of the room, change the walls and flooring, fill your home with furniture and appliances, cut through windows and doors. Home Creator will make you feel like a real interior designer!

name: Holy Road
summary: Protect your domain, develop and grow it, all while gaining wealth and power! Economically destroy everyone that stands in your way! Regain what was once yours and get your revenge in Holy Road!

name: Holdfast: Frontlines WW1
summary: Holdfast: Frontlines is an online multiplayer first and third-person shooter set during WW1. Engage in large-scale and destructive battles of The Great War with over 150 players per server, featuring rifles, machine guns, artillery, grenades, and other iconic weaponry and mechanics from the time.

name: Home Designer Makeover Blast: Steve's Sky Loft
summary: Step into Steve's high-flying life in this DLC. Transform his sky-high residence to reflect his success. Design an abode that screams power, glory, and Steve's unmatched heights.

name: Hot Swap: Cyberlust
summary: Time for the Hot Swap series - back with one of the sexiest themes ever to satisfy all your cyber needs! Swap and rotate square blocks in the correct order to solve the puzzle and reveal high quality, realistic, naughty & sexy girls!

name: Hold Your Own
summary: An open world sandbox, crafting and survival FPS game set on islands with varying topography. Build bases, craft items to defend yourself from aggressive Wildlife and Human AI. Do you have what it takes to Hold Your Own?

name: Hockey Super Squad
summary: Hockey Super Squad is a thrilling free to play 3v3 multiplayer online hockey game featuring character creation and lite-RPG mechanics. Jump in alone or with friends!

name: Honey Dance
summary: This is a new virtual reality music rhythm game. Players can not only experience the thrill of beat saber but also enjoy the hot dance!

name: How We Got Here
summary: You wake up on a floating island with no idea how you got there. Find ways to reach new and strange islands and meet other survivors all while uncovering the story of how you all got there.

name: Horror Maze: Dungeon Edition
summary:
Arcade gameplay with modern design.
This horror-themed maze game is an homage of one our favorite arcade games.
Collect all the pills without getting caught by the 4 horrifying ghosts to beat the highscore.

name: Horny Holiday
summary: Dive into a festive romance in Horny Holiday! Play as Jack in a holiday encounter with the enchanting Joy at a Christmas party. Engage in a unique water, fire, wood challenge to win her heart, all wrapped up with captivating animations and a sound. Charm your way to a date before the lights dim!

name: Hookbots
summary: Multiplayer robot madness party game to battle & challenge your human friends.

name: How to Survive: El Diablo Islands - Host
summary: Download this DLC and venture onto a new set of volcanic Islands: discover new fauna and characters, learn to craft fantastic tools and weapons taking advantage of the different weather effects to face the most surprising enemies.

name: Hovercraft: Takedown
summary:
Hovercraft: Takedown is the #1 combat racing, custom vehicle building, totally addicting, physics based, action game of the year!
Thugs have taken over the the Hovercraft highways! Build your custom Hovercraft. Arm it to the teeth with machine guns, lasers, and rockets. Then take to the streets and rack up those Takedowns!

name: HoloFunk: Hololive Funkin'
summary: Hololive Funkin', or HoloFunk for short, is an overhaul mod for Friday Night Funkin' built by a small team of people on a version of Kade Engine heavily modified to the point of being nearly-unrecognizable, dubbed Myth Engine. It features brand new songs, new opponents, and whimsical new settings based on the world and characters of hololive.

name: Hometown War
summary:
Hometown War is a unique World War II first person shooter.
HOMETOWN WAR History
The Battle for Sihang Warehouse took place from October 26 to November 1, 1937.
The Battle for Sihang Warehouse held out against numerous waves of Imperial Japanese Army and covered National Revolutionary Army retreating west during the Battle of Shanghai.

name: Hop 'N' Stack
summary: Hop and stack up on incoming blocks of varying speeds and sizes.

name: Hostile Waters
summary: Once more duke finds himself in the middle of a hostile situation, this time aboard a half flooded nuclear submarine, grounded on the rocks in the middle of the ocean on a dark stormy night.

name: House of Alice
summary: The latest release of Indie game House of Alice is now available on Steam! Explore new scenes and characters. Unlike many VR games, this virtual bunny hunt starts out in a beautiful real-looking house. You can pick up vases and candlesticks and throw them around for an exciting crash or chase after the rabbits to collect points. Like Alice in Wonderland, this family-friendly game explores shifting perspectives of large and small and you can jump through the looking glass for surreal adventures.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - A New Venture on the Eighth Dawn
summary:
Version 2.7 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Sunday and Fugue
• New Trailblaze Mission: "A New Venture on the Eighth Dawn"
• New areas: Party Car and Trailblazer's Room
• New main event: Cosmic Home Décor Guide
• …and more!

name: HoloParade
summary: Collect your favorite characters, nurture them, and have fun just watching in this hololive fan game! It's a 2D tower defense game that offers depth for dedicated players, strategic elements, and easy enjoyment for casual players.

name: Hot Wheels Turbo Racing
summary: Hot Wheels Turbo Racing is a racing video game for the Nintendo 64 released in 1999. It features vehicles based on the Hot Wheels series of toys. It also features Kyle Petty's 1999 NASCAR stock car, as it was sponsored by Hot Wheels. It also features music from artists like Primus and Mix Master Mike. The focus of the game is racing one of a selection of cars through various themed tracks. Secret tracks can be accessed by winning and new cars can be used by finding the 'new car' bonuses hidden in each stage.

name: Hoshimago
summary: Who said ink war is reserved to squids and octopus?! In Hoshimago, change the world's color with or against your friends.

name: Holic Online
summary: Holic is a cute-style MMORPG developed by the well-known online game developer Mgame based in Seoul, South Korea. The game features meticulous scene setting, adorable characters and plenty of action and emotes. In addition, the game is unique for its class revolving system, over kill combat system, man canon, etc.

name: Horizon Midnight Sky Combat Aircraft: War Arena Flight Simulator 2022
summary: In this game you will not be playing lightly, you will have to develop strategies, battle techniques, and skills to survive the air war.

name: How the Little Match Girl Got Her Colt Paterson Revolver, and Taught a Virtue to a Goblin
summary: The little match girl acquires a Colt Paterson revolver and teaches a virtue to a goblin.

name: Hong Kong Phooey: No.1 Super Guy
How the Little Match Girl Met the Queen of Vampires
summary: The little match girl plays a magical flute.

name: Holo-Graham
summary:
Holo-Graham is a strategic puzzle game based in a 4D World!
Record your holo-grahams to perform actions in real time and work along side them to solve complex puzzles.

name: Honey
summary:
Honey is a free add-on, made available in the second update of the QUAKE remaster.

An old, abandoned village lies in front of you, and a large church looms overhead. It appears to have been empty for quite some time, but what caused this?

Enter the church and it's depths below and find out.

name: Homebound Mariana
summary:
The lemon shark tailed mermaid warrior Kaisa is out on her daily patrol when she notices that the sea is somehow... upset. The balance of nature has been disturbed, and monsters of the deep have been let loose into the salty waters.

On top of that, a nearby research submarine is broadcasting an emergency signal. Kaisa sets out to investigate, and hopefully find answers and solutions. Restoring the balance of the ocean is up to her!

name: Home Sweet Home: Episode 2
summary: Terror and mystery meet in Home Sweet Home Sweet Home Episode 2, the sequel to last year’s cult-hit first-person horror game, Home Sweet Home. Immerse yourself in a world where evil hides behind every corner, in a world inspired by Thai folklore and mythology.

name: Hoyle Official Book of Games: Volume 2
Honey Grove
summary: Honey Grove is the cozy gardening and farming game you’ve always wanted to play! Plant and nurture an ever-changing garden of flowers, vegetables, and fruits, with each bloom and harvest bringing you closer to rebuilding the town. Design your dream garden with real flower species and adorable decorations you collect along the way!

name: House of Jigsaw: Masters of Art
summary: Imagine yourself being in the greatest musea by solving the Jigsaw Puzzles of master artists like Monet, Haring, Kadinsky, Hokusai, Rousseau and Rembrandt. All major art style are represented in more dan 100 high quality puzzles. Enjoy the modern UI and 4 difficulty levels (30/120/300/600 pieces).

name: Hot Noon
summary: A local-coop party game that's all about the classical western stand-off. Draw faster than your opponents and prepare to catch their incoming bullets mid-air! Hot Noon is fast-paced and filled with tension. Are you skilled enough to outsmart your friends in this wits-filled stand-off?

name: Hop Step Sing! High Quality Edition
summary: Enjoy a front row ticket to a perfomance by Japan's newest idol group: Hop Step Sing! Niina, Mikasa and Shikiri will sing and dance their way into your hearts in this, an immersive VR experience of their debut single: "Kisekiteki Shining!".

name: Honor of Knight King
summary: 《吾王的荣耀》是一款第三人称角色扮演RPG动作游戏，玩家将在竞技场里面与大巫师召唤出来的古代军队进行战斗，您的生存将受到严峻的挑战，残存的军队将视你为敌，只有把他们都消灭了，你才有资格挑战大巫师，在挑战中磨炼自己的反应和直觉，不断变强，直到打败大巫师，让一切重归于平静。

name: Hot Plates
summary: Discover the future world of cooking! The Chef of a space-restaurant needs to know all about management and how to satisfy his customers personal taste. Organize your kitchen and earn prestige in space. Rise to be the best cook in the galaxy.

name: Hotel Solitaire
summary: Take some me-time, book yourself into Hotel Solitaire and enjoy some mental exercise!

name: How We Die
summary: A story-driven adventure about you, your dreams, and what you are willing to sacrifice to make them come true. Flee your boring everyday life and venture into a strange fantasy world where you are the hero and savior. Pick up a gun and liberate your dreams. But remember: choices have consequences.

name: Honor and Duty: D-Day
summary: Honor and Duty: D-Day is an online PVP shooter set during the D-Day invasion of World War II. Players compete in Team Death Match, Domination, and Free For All matches or in a separate Battle Royale mode. Online games put 32 players in a fast paced environment which also includes vehicle combat.

name: House Flipper: Mega Pack
summary: Discover Endless Garden Possibilities and Find Your Perfect Pet Companions in this version of the game with all available DLCs!

name: Honey Hunt
summary:
Honey Hunt is a simple game where you guide your bee from open flower to flower, collecting nectar and returning it to your hive. Bee assassins, dragonflies, and spider webs are all out to get you. Dragonflies fly around the screen. Bee assassins skip from flower to flower. Spider webs are static, but make navigating nearby very hazardous. 
 
From time to time, a bear wanders by. If the speech synthesizer is attached, you'll hear it say, "Time to get the honey!" You must return to your hive to defend it. Simply being present in the hive is sufficient to ward off the bear.

name: Hoshi no Meiling
summary:
Get your hands on the legendary "Dragonstar"!
A 2D action game in the style of GameBoy.

name: Hoverboard Chase
summary: HoverBoard Chase - 3d hoverboard race where you have to dodge cops, earn influence points for tricks and monitor your character's health bar, because in the end you can get caught!

name: Homeless
summary: Live the story of Nelson Santana, a man who returns to his homeland seeking his own past. Face your biggest fears in this journey of psychological horror set in the country side of Brazil.Survive the deafening silence...Welcome to Santa Cecília.

name: Hotel Mario
summary: Hotel Mario is a puzzle/platformer game who takes place in hotels. The general goal in each stage is to close all the doors on every floor. However, various enemies will interfere and reopen them at times. Elevators are needed to travel between floors. The first six hotels have ten stages, whilst the seventh has fifteen. The game had low sales partially due to a lack of interest in the CD-i system, and received mainly poor reviews.

name: Holiday Hits
summary: Holiday Hits is a limit-removing set of 7 small simple DOOM 2 maps that uses Arsinikk's 2023 updated version of the classic Doom X-Mas pack.

name: Home Run
summary: This is the first of three iterations of baseball from Atari and is the most simple. The pitcher pitches and controls the direction of the ball. The batter hits and keeps running until he's made to stop. There are up to 3 defensive players that can try to get the batter out after he hits. All hits are grounders and defensive players can't throw the ball.

name: Hover Attack
summary: An early run & gun shooter released for Japanese computers in 1984.

name: Honey Homer RPS
summary: Play Rock-Paper-Scissors and take off clothes if lose. Win the league and win the tournament! With the coins available after play, you can also collect the cards used in play.

name: Hoshi Saga 2
summary: This game is to discover a star covered in the stage.

name: Holosseum
summary: A player versus player or player versus computer fighting game. Players can choose from one of four 'masters' of certain fighting disciplines.

name: Home Defender
summary: Home Defender is an adventure game where you play as a young boy who is alone in his home at a winter night. Your goal is to protect your home from two burglars who are trying to get you.

name: Hot Mars 69
summary: You play for the commander of the special forces group - Elon, ​​and you need to kill all the devil-mutants in the colony on Mars to avenge for the dead comrades, and to escape.

name: Hovercab Station
summary: A bit of a spiritual successor to my 2022 wad, Herschel Spaceport. Blast your way through demons from Hell in a rundown city block. The action takes place up top on the streets, in a (hover!) train station, and in the water filtration system below.

name: Hobby Farm
summary: A time management escape from demanding city life. Jill's dream is finally coming true when she stumbles upon an island farm while on vacation. Harvest exotic fruits, care for free-roaming animals, and use handheld tools to produce even more lovely items in over 50 levels.

name: Homeland: Lay to Rest
summary: Homeland: Lay to Rest is a third person action-adventure game about a monk in training who fights corrupted guardians with a thrown homing weapon to redeem their overrun childhood home.

name: How Stories Die
summary: Time travel, assassins and one magical gangster rabbit! The demon king threatens your kingdom and it's up to you, the prince, to find a suitable hero to fight it. Not an easy task, as it will require you to shed a lot of blood and maybe even die. But at least you will save everyone... right?

name: Hostile Takeover
summary: Hostile Takeover is a 2001 fan add-on for Blood by Dustin "Bloatoid" Twilley, previous creator of Inherit the Earth (1999) and much later Death Wish (2011, 2017-2020). It features a ghost town, underwater base, carnival and island level, among others. Twilley re-issued the pack as a version 1.1 on July 18, 2013.

name: Hotspace station
summary: Hotspace Station is a fast-paced action arcade game where you use a grappling hook to navigate and defeat enemies. With unique mechanics, various weapons, and pixel graphics, it offers thrilling gameplay across multiple levels.

name: Hotel Simulator
summary: In Hotel Simulator, you become the new owner of an old and neglected hotel. Bring back its splendor by cleaning, renovation, and interior design. Hire the crew, manage your business, and make it known as the fanciest hotel in the city!

name: Hoshi no Mahoroba
summary: First BL game released in Japan for consumer consoles. Tells the tale of a group of boys with the ability to speak to spirits and harness their powers.

name: Hot Pussy College 2
summary: Hot Pussy College 2 is a short adult Visual Novel focusing on the fun parts of college life. The game is packed with humor, romance, and lots of sex. Play as a young male attending college at B&R and guide him through the experience.

name: Horror Rollercoaster
summary: Looking to get scared at high speeds? Look no further! This rollercoaster game will take your breath away!

name: Horny Suika: Wet Watermelon
summary: Horny Suika - Wet Watermelon is an adorable and fun game about dropping "fruits" into a container, with a little twist. New features and different game modes. Combine small "fruits" to make them larger, creating big "watermelons" without overflowing the container, and enjoy your worthy "rewards".

name: House of Ghosts and Cats
summary: Protect your cat, defeat the monsters, and build a happy home for your cat. Battles, crafting, exploration and conversations lead to the truth of the mansion and the whereabouts of your cat. A dark and heartwarming mansion-robbing horror adventure begins.

name: Hot And Lovely: Tease
summary: Hot And Lovely: Tease is a classic matching game. Slide the blocks to make three or more adjacent blocks of the same pattern disappear. After eliminating specific blocks, you can enter the next level. The game is easy to operate and easy to play.

name: Horrible Histories: Ruthless Romans
summary: Horrible Histories: The Ruthless Romans, a fun party game based on the hugely popular children's books by Terry Deary. You take on the role of a young Gladiator making his way to the Coliseum. Learn fighting techniques and explore ancient Rome as you go. Each mini-game has a learning aspect and is set in an entertaining, enjoyable and exciting world.

name: Hovercrash: Turbo Boost Racing
summary:
Welcome to Hovercrash, a futuristic anti-gravity racer with thrills, tunnels and turbo boosts! Jump in to a hypersonic hovercraft and test your reflexes on the high speed race track!
Dodge crazy obstacles and fly at breakneck speeds as far as possible. And when you have learned the basics, lift your finger off the screen and increase your score multiplier even faster!
The energetic EDM soundtrack will give you an extra rush in the race for the high score!

name: Host Security Guard
summary: To save them and bring back our peaceful life. He deicides to become the "Host".

name: Hot And Lovely: Uniform
summary: Hot And Lovely: Uniform is a classic puzzle game. Players need to eliminate more than three blocks of the same type to complete the goal and pass the level. After completing all the levels, the game is successful!

name: Hockey Legacy Manager 24
summary: Build the ultimate legacy as the general manager of a professional hockey team!

name: Hoyeon
summary: Hoyeon tells a story that takes place three years prior to Blade & Soul, featuring a trendy reinterpretation and a fresh look in a radiant world. In this collectible RPG, put together a composition of unique heroes and use Hoyeon's unique switching feature to play in both turn-based mode and field battle mode.

name: Homicide
summary: This is a decryption game (first-person perspective),The player is at a murder scene.The player must first find the body,Then find five clues scattered around the scene,Then you can pass the level.There are two levels in this game,The player focuses on the corpse or clue for more than 2s,Can trigger the dialog box (meanings the body or...

name: Hotel Story
summary: Start your Life in Odd Town to build up a Hotel of your Dream´s from dusty and broken to shiny and luxurious. Explore a vast modern City and it´s surrounding Land with unique resident´s and strange twist´s. Collect all Furniture to get the Guest attention!

name: Hood Warfare
summary: Welcome to Detroit. Gang violence has become an epidemic, forcing all civilians and police to leave the city. All that remains are soldiers of the Bloods and Crips. The city has become an abandoned battlefield where gangs engage in large scale firefights known as "Hood Warfare".

name: Hoversurf in the Mess
summary: Now it's time for surfing !!! Everybody can surf !!! Miner will now surf all over the world !!! A new adventure super fun and that causes great adrenaline !!!

name: Hole.io
summary:
Enter the arena and face the other holes in a fierce battle.
Eat everything in sight with your black hole and expand it to eat more! Show them who is the biggest hole in town!

name: Hot Rod Racing
summary: Hot Rod is a top-down arcade racing game developed by Sega. It allows up to four players simultaneously, and the player competes in races with three other cars. It is possible to upgrade the car at a Parts Shop. Every time a player falls off screen, they will be penalized by having gas subtracted from their gas meter. If the gas meter reaches "0", the game is over. The player can pick up flashing targets symbolized with a "G". By picking up the target, 20 units gas will be added to the player's gas meter. If the player successfully crosses the finish line, they will be rewarded additional units of gas.

name: Homerun Clash
summary:
HOMERUN CLASH is an arcade-style home run derby game featuring real-time multiplayer PvP, single-player challenge mode, story mode, bi-weekly tournaments and clan battles.

Gameplay is fast and exciting, with simple controls and high-quality graphics. In multi-play, player can use special skills to interrupt the opponents. Players must choose a batter, each with unique skills strategically selected with skill cards that add to their bonus.

The game launched worldwide in 2019 and placed in the top 10 highest grossing sports games category on the App Store and Google Play in over 70 countries.

name: Hotel: Lake DLC
summary: This DLC adds an additional resort location: an idyllic lake and the surrounding forest. This haven of tranquillity is an ideal place to build a hotel for holidaymakers seeking nature and the great outdoors!

name: Hot and Lovely 3
summary: This is an interesting leisure origami game, which can exercise your hands-on ability. In the game, you must fold the paper as much as possible into the specified cute graphics in the specified origami times. The game is very challenging from easy to difficult.

name: Hovermania
summary: 3D puzzle driving platformer game with a global leaderboard. Find where you stand in each of the surprisingly difficult levels

name: Hovering Castle
summary: Hovering castle is one of the first Bulgarian games for PC. The game is a representative of the Quest genre, it was created in 1992 and is not commercial. The authors are Hristo Bozhinov, Ivan Kolev and Stanislav Evstatiev. Ivan Kolev and Stanislav Evstatiev later founded Dimension Design and Garga Games. The game has graphics of (320x200x256 colors) with drawn characters and setting, and even becomes "cult" for many players. The game is partly controlled by text commands in Bulgarian, such as "Вземи чашата", and there are constantly witty messages in Bulgarian.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Just a Scratch Pack
summary: OK, maybe these cars have seen better days… but what they don't give you in design and aesthetics, it's balanced out with performance that will crush your opponents! Add Speed Bump and Sudden Stop to your collection with the exclusive Just a Scratch Pack!

name: Hoyle Classic Games
summary: Hoyle Classic Games is the fifth in the Hoyle series of licensed computer game simulations of popular non-electronic games. This volume is a collection of card games (Draw Poker, Bridge, Cribbage, Gin Rummy, Hearts, Solitaire, Old Maid, and Crazy 8's) and board games (Backgammon, and Checkers). There are different opponents to compete against and they can be selected from a list of business, animated, or icons pictures. Each opponent has a bio and a different skill level (beginner, average, or expert). Some games are single-player, while others are played by two or four players.

name: Hotdog Runner
summary: You are Simon, a lover of hotdogs. Can you guide him to collect the most hotdogs EVER?

name: Hodge Dodge
summary: Crank this, dodge that. Only on Playdate

name: Housekeeping to Room 501
summary: A work simulator set in an old hotel that is definitely not haunted. Clean the rooms and make sure our guests feel at home!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Rust and Fast Pack
summary: In the Rust and Fast Pack you will find nothing less than two legends like Mod Rod and the futuristic FusionBusta. Mod Rod combines a classic look with modern details, combining the best of both worlds for a result that is all style and energy, with its signature all-round windows that makes it even more badass. And when modern isn't enough, get behind the wheel of the futuristic FusionBusta and its super-powered engine, that takes the hot rods towards new horizons of evolution!

name: Hot Zone
summary: Hot Zone is a Survival Game set in a post - apocalyptic future try to survive against hunger, thirst and nature. Explore, Loot, Craft, Build, Hunt and cook to stay alive in this rough radiated World.

name: Home Computer Heroes Collection 1
summary: Home Computer Heroes Collection 1 for Evercade brings the Indie Heroes philosophy to the home computer space! Enjoy seven "modern retro" titles designed for classic home computers on Evercade, including Planet X2 and Attack of the PETSCII Robots by The 8-Bit Guy, the official C64 version of the beloved Farming Simulator series, our first MSX title, The Sword of Ianna, plus Tanks Furry and Bridge Strike from Amiga demoscene veterans Project R3D.

name: Hoop Shoot
summary: Shoot hoops over poles!

name: Home In Alien
summary: Welcome to Home In Alien, a 2D sandbox survival and construction game where you'll play as a human survivor on his own in a strange and dangerous alien world, battling with various factions, building and operating his own colony, and exploring and unraveling the mysteries of the planet.

name: Horny Sekai
summary: Horny Sekai is a visual novel with simple drawings like a gaming element. Meet different girls of the world. Give gifts to build relationships with each of them. All girls have animated CG.

name: HotCake!
summary:
~This game is a hot cake-making game that destroys the food tower~

Players control their fists and hit the handle of the frying pan.Then the pancake pops out of the frying pan.At this time, the angle at which the hotcake is served changes depending on the speed and angle of the fist.Then destroy the pancake by hitting the food tower.

Also, there are hidden events in the background of the game, and the official team is implemented from the configuration, so it's a game that makes you laugh after touching various things.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: The Phantom of the Theater
summary:
Version 4.8 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Starchasm Nyx (Seele)
• New Story Chapter XXIV: The Legion Theater
• New Featured Event: Stan Wars!
• ...and more!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Cutting Dreams at Dawn
summary:
Version 6.9 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Miracle Magical Girl
• New Story Chapter XL: Seven Karma Phala
• New Captainverse Event: After the Blood Moon Fades
• New Promare Collaboration
• ...and more!

name: House of the Dead 2 & 3 Return
summary: The House of the Dead 2 & 3 Return is a compilation and re-release of The House of the Dead 2 and 3 for Wii.

name: Hot Cleopatra
summary: The scorching sun of the desert pleasantly warms the skin, and the air is filled with the aroma of flowers growing near the palace. The mistress of seas, sands, and hearts is ready to travel the Nile.

name: Horse Stable: Herd Care Simulator
summary: Go to the horse farm and get ready for adventures, quests, fights with predators and the opportunity to create a whole herd of horses!

name: Hot Wheels: Pink Fashion Customization Pack
summary: If your rivals made you see red, after the race get some relaxation surrounded by soothing shades of pink and fancy decorations. A fashion touch for your Basement and your Unleashed Profile to show off your style, not just in the race!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: DC Super Heroes Racing Season
summary: A fantastic new season begins and it will be... super fun! This DLC unlocks all the premium items of the season, including vehicles and customizations that can be obtained by winning new exciting challenges! And Nightwing is immediately yours!

name: Horde
summary: low poly fps where you have to survive unlimited waves of zombies

name: Horizon: Zero Dawn - Thunderjaw Collector's Edition
summary: This edition includes the following Premium Packaging, Premium Thunderjaw Statue, Aloy's "Focus" Earpiece, Exclusive Litographs, and Exclusive World Map

name: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes & Hand Grenades
summary: Do you like hot dogs? How about horseshoes? Hand grenades? (everyone likes hand grenades) Anyway, we got all that, and guns. So if you like cooking, lawn games, and ordnance, this is the VR sandbox game for you.

name: Hours After Midnight
summary: Dive deep into a roguelike survival quest against Rettam'diov, the Consumer of Worlds. Progress, earn experience, refine characters, and uncover potent tools. Face relentless hordes alone or amplify the thrill, teaming up cross-platform in our distinctive co-op mode.

name: Homeworld
summary: Homeworld is a 3D real-time strategy game set in space and focusing on the conflict between the Kushan, who are attempting to locate their long-lost homeworld, and the Taiidan Empire which is trying to destroy them.

name: Hoyle Casino Games 2013
summary:
Be a winner, beat the house and brave the odds with Hoyle Casino Games. 
Feeling lucky? Go all in with Hoyle's Vegas-style casino action for your PC and Mac! Includes two BONUS slot games! 
 
Includes all your favorite casino games: 
Texas Hold 'Em 
Craps 
Pai Gow Poker 
Video Poker 
Baccarat 
Roulette 
Video Blackjack 
Blackjack 
Keno 
30+ Video Slots 
Poker 
 
Features: 
Learn, practice and master your favorite casino games! 
Track your progress with in-game statistics and achievements. 
Select from a variety of card designs, environments, characters, speed of play and more. 
Updated graphics. 
Larger, easy-to-read cards. Modern in-game interface design. 
Smarter game logic and A.I. keeps the stakes high. 
Select from a variety of challenges, speed of play, characters, and more! 
Hone your skills or learn a new game with HOYLE's strategy guide. 
2 Bonus Games Hoyle Slots and Hoyle Swashbucklin' Slots!

name: Hotel Transylvania: Hotel Havoc
summary: In Hotel Transylvania: Hotel Havoc, you and your child play together in your LOCAL PLAYGROUND to help Mavis run the iconic hotel! And with our Augmented Reality experience, you can meet Mavis in the Hotel lobby itself.

name: Holo8
summary: Escape from the looping office. Observe the office carefully and look for any anomaly to reach the main entrance.

name: Hover Strike: Unconquered Lands
summary: Hover Strike is a futuristic 3D action game where you pilot a lone hovercraft in a series of missions against overwhelming enemy forces. You must use your speed, firepower, and displays to outfight and outwit the enemy. The game presents a series of missions which must be completed before you can advance. Goals include destroying a certain number or type of enemy units. The missions take place in a variety of different planetary environments.

name: Hokkaido Rensa Satsujin: Okhotsk ni Kiyu
Holobunnies
summary: Holobunnies is a side-scrolling adventure through space featuring a team of holographic rabbits.

name: Hostile Dimension
summary: Defend your space flagship from hordes of alien fighters.

name: Holly Hobbie & Friends
summary: Play a series of minigames featuring the characters from the American Greetings brand.

name: Hogworld: Gnart's Adventure
summary:
his is the brand new extended version of Hogworld: Gnart’s Adventure – the children’s interactive story app Wired called “brilliant”, USA Today hailed as “one of the most sophisticated yet accessible book apps published so far” and Apple included on its AppStore Best of 2011 list.

Meet the shy yet lovable hog-bunny Gnart who has to make it to the dentist by sundown. To get there he has to pass through some pretty scary places. On his way, Gnart will confront his fears and make new friends. The story gives readers a true interactive experience.

Stunning artwork enhanced by 3D effects and animations combined with music, sound effects and voice-over makes this a unique application. An intuitive user interface lets you follow the engaging story and then go back to explore the environments, which are full of beautiful landscapes and amazing surprises. Or, you can pause the narrative anytime and explore right away.

Hogworld is made for the 4 + age group. That said, we do think quite a few adults might like it too.

We are offering the full application in a free ad-supported try-before-you-buy version. Parents may want to upgrade to the ad-free premium version for their children. You can also buy other language versions within the app.

✭ ✭ KEY FEATURES ✭ ✭

A true interactive story – not a game, not an eBook, but a hybrid somewhere in between.
16 Chapters
Purchase additional languages within the app
Many interactive elements and surprises including several mini-games
Collect cute Plumpets, Jellyfish and Fireflies, even click when you encounter the scary Creeper, to gather points. Go back and find more
30-45 minutes to go through the story first time and loads of replay value
Requires IPad 2 or above and iOS 5 to install. Optimized for the iPad, but can also be installed on iPhone 4 and above
Intuitive user interface

name: Hotel Renovator: Kawaii Furniture Set
summary: Invite your guests on the most adorable stay with the Kawaii Furniture set.Give your hotel that youthful glow with the Kawaii Furniture set, packed with the cutest 53 items that will make any of your customers' heart melt. With its bright colors and playful patterns, life truly is all sunshine and rainbows!

name: Honey Select 2: Libido
summary: Honey Select 2 Libido is a 3D eroge created by the Japanese H-game company Illusion. Though it's a successor to Honey Select gameplay-wise, on the technical side it shares many similarities and is cross-compatible with AI Shoujo.

name: Holly 2: Magic Land
summary: Explore a magical world of childhood dreams on a challenging search for hidden objects in Holly 2 - Magic Land. Help Holly find her daughter by tracking down more than 3,500 cleverly hidden objects in 49 vibrant levels. Featuring original mini-games and beautiful hand-drawn artwork, Holly 2 - Magic Land is a wonderful adventure. Slip away to this world of hidden object fun!

name: Hooligan Simulator: San Gangster Andreas Fight for City, Battle Gangs, Shooter, Police
summary: Do you want to become a hooligan, be respected by those around you and try any unethical way that can make you rich quickly?

name: Holiday Party: Mascot Brawl
summary: A silly multiplayer party game, Holiday Party: Mascot Brawl brings festive cheer with battles and mini-games matched with absurd weapons. Compete against friends and roast them with a flamethrower and slap them with a GIANT FISH. Jump into this hilarious holiday-themed brawling mayhem today!

name: Hold The Noise
summary: Listen to beautiful and captivating noises! It will be truly amazing. Are you ready to hear some great noise? Just press and hold the space bar. Are you really ready now?

name: Hot Wheels: Barbie Dream Camper
summary: Don't be fooled by its appearance: the Barbie Dream Camper isn't your classic Sunday driver vehicle. Born for the outdoors, this compact and multifunctional RV will surprise you even on the longest indoor races. And if someone needs a vacation, it will be your rivals, after you overtake them on the finish line!

name: Honey Magician
summary: Have you ever been attracted to a sexy, mysterious beauty magician? This game will let you enjoy and participate in the beautiful magician's performance.

name: Hollow Mine
summary: Hollow Mine is a roguelike hack-and-slash dungeon crawler. Explore mysterious mines where levels are generated randomly every play. Fight enemy hordes and tough bosses. You can choose from various weapons and abilities to upgrade your character and create your own combination.

name: Honourbound
summary: A 2D side-scrolling beat'em up about a samurai who has been driven insane by the horrors of war, and derives unnatural power from his hallucinatory visions. He journeys to save his son, as his mental state degrades.

name: House Flipper: Pets Bundle
summary: Experience House Flipper with addition of Pet Companions!

name: Hotel Dracula
summary: Make yourself comfortable and ... wait a minute, did I say make yourself comfortable? There is no time for lazing around! Uniform in hand and to work! Hotel guests will not handle themselves and they don’t belong to patient...

name: Hot Redheads

name: How to Train Your Dragon
summary:
How to Train Your Dragon is an action-adventure video game which takes place after the film with the same name and before its sequel, How to Train Your Dragon 2. Gameplay consists of exploring the Island of Berk, which serves as a hub for various minigames including dragon fighting. At the start of the game, you can choose to play as either Hiccup or Astrid. As a Viking hero, you will then embark upon an epic quest to become the ultimate dragon trainer. The vast Island of Berk features expanded locales from the film including Vikings' Village, Wild Zone, Training Zone and Fight Arena. In this truly larger-than-life adventure, players will train dragons, explore environments and battle in prestigious dragon tournaments as they battle for Viking victory. Plus, gamers can become the Dragon hero of their living room as they square-off with friends and family in endless head-to-head multiplayer combat.

Create Your Very Own Dragon - The "Create Your Dragon" feature allows players to customize six different types of dragons, providing virtually unending combinations of ways to modify your dragon's appearance.
Train your Dragon for Battle - "Level Up" your dragon's speed, power, fire and other abilities through intense training to face the critical Viking challenge of becoming the ultimate dragon trainer. Then use your arsenal of trained dragons to battle friends in a variety of unique environments.
Pick up Where the Movie Left Off - Players enjoy an all-new post-movie adventure as they jump into battle as their favorite characters. Explore the picturesque Island of Berk as Hiccup or Astrid in Adventure Mode or experience fierce battle action in Arena Mode as you fight for your crown as ultimate dragon warrior.
Head-to-Head Multiplayer Mode - Arcade mode allows friends to select their dream team of four individually customized dragons or dragons chosen from the arcade roster, then jump in and battle against each other. In addition to Astrid and Hiccup, additional characters are playable in Multiplayer Mode including Tuffnut T., Ruffnut T., Fishlegs, and Snotlout.
Mini-Games - Mini-games include Ice Sculpting, Looping Race, Flying Sheppard, Memory Torch, and Puzzle Dragon. Excelling in mini-games earns players experience points toward leveling up your dragon, winning gold and other items to help care for dragons.

name: Homecoming: Morenatsu Revisited
summary:
A remake of the classic Japanese visual novel Morenatsu.

In "Homecoming", you take on the role of a young Japanese snow fox named Hiroyuki Nishimura. After moving away from your hometown Minasato to Osaka five years ago, you receive an unexpected letter from an old friend inviting you back for one last summer vacation before completing your senior year of high school. What complicates things is how you've neglected to contact any of your friends over the years. Although nervous, you accept the invitation.

What awaits you back in Minasato? Will you be welcomed with open arms, or has it been so long that everyone has forgotten about you? Will this be yet another wasted summer, or will you finally have the chance to experience what makes life worth living?

Homecoming is a visual novel about nostalgia, romance, living life to the fullest, reconnecting with old friends, and learning to face your demons, all wrapped up in the cute Japanese kemono aesthetic. The game Homecoming is based on, Morenatsu, is considered to be one of the classic entries in furry culture. Although it was canceled in 2015, dedicated fans have continued to keep its legacy alive through fanworks such as this.

While rough around the edges, the original game captured many hearts, including the members of the Stormsinger Studios development team. Stormsinger is aiming to create the best visual novel they can make: addressing and changing questionable aspects of the original while doing justice to the source material that has inspired so many.

name: Hopepunk City
summary:
Hopepunk City is the fourth game of the Date Ariane series at arianeb.com. It was inspired by events that happened in the United States during 2020 and 2021.

In the near future, thanks to perpetual infighting, the US Government lost it's ability to keep society stable. The land that once was the United States got divided into various mini-states, thanks to a period of conflict known as The Second Civil Wars.

The 96 governments that formed in its place, raging in size from cities to multiple former states, come in many forms: Some feudal, some neo-liberal, some communist, some tribal, and many theocratic.

You are in the now renamed District of Artema, a "solarpunk" society surrounded by less stable states.

You play as a refugee, either male or female, assigned to a household of three women, one who lost loved ones in the war, one whose family split apart by war, and one who works in the government. Getting along with your roommates is a major part of the game.

You can play as the player character from Date Ariane and Something's In The Air, or as the player character from Ariane in Paradise or play as a brand new character.

Many jobs have been automated, limiting jobs to those sectors that can’t be automated, most of which are part time. Finding a job you like is another major part of the game.

The final act involves a crisis to be averted, but only if you make the right connections and get your roommates to cooperate.

Of course this is also an erotic visual novel, with the usual amounts of satirical comedy, nudity, and sex spread throughout the narrative. As with all my games, I am constantly trying to reinvent the genre.

The shapes keep moving down on every turn and all you have to do is stop them from filling up the whole screen. 

Strategize every move depending on the position of the different shapes. Get rewarded with amazing POWERS like Masterstroke, Antigravity, Reshuffle and Bonanza & use them judiciously at the right time to tilt the balance of power.

Highlights of the game:

• Novel game mechanics bringing together the best of polyomino shapes and match 2 puzzle mechanics.
• 60 missions of different variety spread over 20 levels to keep it fun and engaging.

name: Homestar Portable
summary:
Planetarium Creator Ohira Takayuki Kanshuu Homestar Portable is a PlayStation Portable adaption of Sega Toys' popular Homestar series of consumer planetariums.

The Homestar systems are portable planetarium projectors made by SEGA, intended for domestic use, and retail for around 20-25'000yen. The main restriction with gadgets like that will always be how brightly they can project over an average size room. Homestar Portable for the PlayStation Portable doesn't have this problem.

It's not a game, but an astronomy tool for the PSP generation. The view of the heavens depends on the position of the observer on the Earth. This can be set manually, or automatically by the PSP GPS unit (sold separately at almost three times the price of the software). Up/down and left/right on the D-pad control the altitude and azimuth respectively, allowing the player to change the section of sky they are viewing. The shoulder buttons zoom in and out of the star field, and the analog nub can be used to get more information about particular objects. There are numerous options, including changing the threshold for the stars that are visible, adjusting the rate at which time passes and the position of the viewer on the Earth. Some novelties have been thrown in as well, like the night sky on Easter Island the day the Moai statues were discovered, what the sky was like during the last ice age, etc. Novel but not particularly useful - the Easter Island one is basically the sky with some Moai statues on the land.
