Create your own rags-to-riches journey, from being a stablehand to owning the greatest racing stable in the game.

name: HoVRboard
summary: Extreme VR freeriding with a unique physics-based locomotion method – Explore a giant hoVRpark and race your way through >30 challenges! Do tricks! Build your speed boost! Grind on rails! Blast away obstacles! Defy gravity!

name: Hoverboy
summary: Explore different worlds and interact with the environment to the sound of a musical playlist showcasing music from Jesse Aidyn, Multi-Memory Controller, and Ginger Breaker.

name: Hood Story: Kaito Yamazaki
summary: Play as "Kaito Yamazaki" a young Japanese delinquent from the underprivileged Kamagasaki district of Osaka. He will have to juggle love, friendship and violence to get his life back on track.

name: Hoops VR
summary: Hoops VR is specially designed for the HTC Vive so you can live out the ultimate basketball free-throw challenge. Use the motion controls and shoot hoops as naturally as you would out on the basketball court. Compete online for the top of the global leaderboards as well as locally against your friends. There are a handful of different modes covering a range of difficulties making Hoops VR fun whether you're a noob or total baller!

name: Homebound: New Beginnings
summary: Explore, craft, build and thrive in the magical lands of Solaria. Discover the curse that destroyed these lands and your connection to the past as you grow relationships between clans of magic and monsters, but maybe not all is as it seems?

name: Hoodie Survivor
summary: Auto shooter score attack survival game where your character moves forward continuously and you control the direction of travel by rotating left and right

name: Horizon of Horus
summary: Embark on a thrilling journey through the mesmerizing landscapes of Ancient Egypt in "Horizon of Horus" – a Virtual Reality action-tower defense game. Immerse yourself in a world of magic and mythology, where you are the last line of defense against mythological creatures.

name: Hooked!
summary:
An 18+ Visual Novel set in the early 2000s, about three girls trying to make their way into the adult entertainment industry! They meet you, a clueless fisherman, who has no idea about his potential.

Get to know the girls closely, and make fun naughty videos with them! It's a comedic, lighthearted and goofy story filled with lewd stuff!

name: Hocus Pocus Prince
summary: Otome visual novel where boys are cursed into "beasts."

name: Hollow Knight: Godmaster
summary: Godmaster was the fourth and final free content pack for Hollow Knight.

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Crusade of Chasing Shadows
summary:
Version 7.5 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Part 2 Story Chapter 3: A Crime Foretold
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Lone Destruction: Shadowchaser (Lantern)
• New Featured Event: Lantern Against Shadows
• New Event: Non-Stop Stage Clears Carnival
• ...and more!

name: Holoquest
summary: Holoquest is a comical JRPG featuring the girls of HoloMyth: Mori Calliope, Takanashi Kiara, Watson Amelia, Ninomae Ina'nis, and Gawr Gura. Familiarity with Hololive and its characters is not required to play and complete the game.

name: Holiday Island
summary: Holiday Island is a business simulation video game developed by German game design company Sunflowers. Most of the gameplay involves juggling funds to build hotels, accommodation, leisure activities and restaurants. The number and location of these is important, as is the interconnectivity between different facilities.

name: Horticular
summary: You have been magically summoned by mysterious gnomes to restore a long-lost garden. Attract adorable animals, build a lush environment, and immerse yourself in this relaxing garden-builder. Will you manage to reclaim the wasteland or succumb to a looming corruption?

name: Hover Strike
summary:
Terrakian Pirates have taken over a colonized planet under Federation control. They've set up an atmospheric cannon, making invasion impossible. Your job, as a hovercraft pilot, is to launch a pre-emptive strike on the planet's surface.

Hover Strike for the Jaguar is a mission-based tank game. In each mission, you will drop to the surface of the planet, destroy some targets, and then return to your ship in orbit. The hovercraft you pilot is heavily armored and includes various weapons systems to take out enemies and targets.

name: Home
summary: "Home" is a game that integrates survival, fighting, and leisure. You can play freely in this game world. You can stay at home, read books, order takeout, read books, and so on. You can also explore outside, Parkour, and even find monsters and challenge various boss.If you don't play, you'll regret it.

name: Horn
summary:
HORN is a 3rd person action adventure game - a completely unique experience where anyone can fully explore and enjoy a beautiful and engaging console-style world, all controllable by touch gestures.

You play as a young blacksmith's apprentice named Horn who wakes up to find your village and lands over run by large fantastic, and sometimes humorous, monsters. It is revealed these creatures are actually the people and animals from your village transformed by a curse, and you alone have the power to free them. On your incredible adventure you carry the loud-mouthed head of one such fantastic creature with you - a somewhat uncooperative and ill-tempered but grudgingly helpful sidekick. Along with this new companion you must use your sword, crossbow, trusty musical horn, and wits to explore the lands, defeat the enemies, and solve puzzles in your quest to undo the curse that engulfs your homeland.

name: HoloParade: DLC with BGM and Costume - Shirakami Fubuki
summary: This DLC unlocks Shirakami Fubuki's swimsuit costume and the BGM "KONKON Beats" in HoloParade, and activates a gift code that allows you to scout Shirakami Fubuki. The BGM can be set for all UR talents, changing the music when the talents march to liven up the parade!

name: Hover 2030
summary: Hoverboards, evil robots, and cloning! Welcome to the future.

name: Holy Chick!
summary: In a world where bloodthirsty chickens have taken over the planet, it’s hard to keep your cool. You find shelter in a suspicious camper trailer, but angry beaks are pecking at the windows outside. Time is running out. Can you figure out a way out of this predicament?

name: House of Jigsaw: Vintage Revival
summary: Relive the elegance of the past and embark the vintage charm in this expansion.

name: House of Horror: Outside is Better
summary: House of Horror: Outside is better" is a first-person psychological horror video game that offers an immersive and terrifying experience. With the help of your wits and strength, and a dynamo flashlight, explore the facilities of the house of horror, solve puzzles, and try to get out of it alive.

name: Hot Runback: VR Runner
summary:
Have you ever actually run while playing runners? Or you just sit and watch your character run on a smartphone screen without burning any single calorie? 
 
Now you have a chance to experience some-thing completely new, run your character through troubles, while actually run with your VR headset on. Run, evade obstacles and throw your weapons to everything your eye catches. Sometimes it would be a policeman, sometimes — a neighbour’s car. But what the most important is — you would have to run. Run for your life. Challenge yourself.

name: Holospecter
summary:
Deep underground lies a secret facility. An organization seeking to strengthen humanity in a world that is becoming ever increasingly harsh. Like many of the subjects, Samantha waits locked away and guarded. Tested on against her will.

However, a day comes when her cell door mysteriously unlocks. The lab is devoid of all life and its subjects have been left in solitude. The question is why? What lies in wait in these emptied halls?

name: Home Makeover: Hidden Object
summary: Find the hidden objects, sell them, and renovate your grandparent's home in this fun and inspiring hidden object game.

name: Hokuto no Ken: Shin Seikimatsu Kyuuseishu Densetsu
Hokuto no Ken
summary: Hokuto no Ken for the Family Computer (Famicom for short) is a side-scrolling action video game published by Toei Animation and developed by Shouei Systems. It was released on August 10, 1986 exclusively in Japan and was the first of four Hokuto no Ken video games released for the Famicom. While it features gameplay similar to Sega's earlier Mark III version of Hokuto no Ken, it is an unrelated game made by a different developer.

name: Homespace
summary:
Welcome to Homespace! Transform your charming fixer upper into a one-of-a-kind home made just for you, designed by you! Take rooms from drab to fab by playing puzzles to earn unique furniture and decor. 
 
Beat challenging puzzle levels to fix and furnish rooms in your new house. Are you up to the task? Home is where your story begins

name: Horror Bar VR
summary: Horror Bar is an incredibly engaging Zombie Bar simulator where you can take on the role of bartender and serve your scarily nice customers multiple crazy dishes and drinks.

name: Hoversteppers
summary: Hoversteppers is a freestyle hoverboard skating game. Flip, spin, and test your boarding skills with timed challenges across multiple stages.

name: Hot Springs
summary: Immerse yourself in the warm waters and relaxing atmosphere of Japanese's Onsen

name: How to Draw
summary: Discover your talent as an illustrator! This beginner game teaches you how to draw step by step with easy tutorials, varied themes and digital tools.

name: Home Run Nighter '90: The Pennant League
summary: Home Run Night '90: The Pennant League is a Sports game, developed and published by Data East, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: Homestuck
summary: Homestuck is a webcomic that started in 2009. In 2012, its creator posted and surpassed funding on a Kickstarter to make a game based on it.

name: Horse Paradise: My Dream Ranch
summary: Play and race as your dream wild horse in an exciting multiplayer adventure!

name: Hollowhead's VR Time Machine
summary: You, the time traveler, explore ancient habitats and observe species – from the first bacteria to powerful dinosaurs to modern mammals – in action as they struggle to survive in their environment. Each life-form the time traveler encounters will have a corresponding recorded narration.

name: House of Horror: 7 Psychos
summary: Face seven deadly psychopaths, each guarding a terrifying floor. Solve puzzles, avoid traps, and exploit their weaknesses to escape the nightmare.

name: Holiday Farm
summary: A sandbox game that simulates life on a farm. Experience life, growing vegetables, raising animals, diving in mineral water on a happy island.

name: Hopper
summary: Hopper is a game similar to the arcade game Pengo. The player is a kangaroo trying to escape from three circus trainers. The game is played on single screen levels each full of crates. The kangaroo can move around in all directions and push the crates in front of him. The three trainers move around the screen trying to catch the kangaroo and to defeat them crates have to be pushed onto them. To advance to the next level, all of the trainers have to be squished. The player has four lives and when they are all gone the game is over.

name: HolySpirit
summary: Holyspirit is a 2D isometric hack'n'slash game. A hack'n'Slash is an action role playing game, like Diablo. You play a Holyspirit, which is an old corrupted soul who has been enlisted in God's army. You must liberate the country from the evil who has been unleashed against the living ones. The game is developped in C++, with the SFML. Official demo announced for 2011.

name: Hot Tentacles Shooter
summary: Hot Tentacles Shooter is a formidable 80's style shooter with a pixel art modern and irresistible.

name: Horror Night: The Slenderman Takings
summary: The most famous creepypasta has finally arrived to Horror Night's universe, to hunt all survivors down in a much more terrifying new map: The Forest. Play with your friends against an AI Slenderman, while trying to solve multiple puzzles to escape.

name: Hole in the Clouds
summary: Leave the ground behind in this skill-testing game of airborne golf. Pop the clouds and beat the obstacles to sink your ball under par. Find out if you’ve got what it takes to beat all 54 holes of mind-bending challenges.

name: Hover League
summary:
Welcome to Hover League - compete with people all around the world, in a new unique track every day!
Fine-tune your racing lines to achieve the best possible time, and make your way up the Leagues!

name: Hologram
summary: Hologram is a sokoban type game with holograms.

name: Hoshi no Natchan
summary: This is a pixel art 2D action game. Use dash, jump and attack to reach the goal. There are no complicated operations or material collection, so you can start playing right away. It's an easy and kindness game.

name: Honey Are You There?
summary: Matthew Nate, a middle-aged man plagued with mental health problems whose home has become a site of unexplainable paranormal activity and a malevolent female entity is pursuing him to his death.

name: Hot Blood
summary: Take down zombies as a deadly cutie in 3D low-poly style! Hot Blood is physics-based brawling fun inspired by action movies of the 80s & 90s.

name: Horizon Shift '81
summary: Horizon Shift '81 is an explosive wave based single screen shooter with a real retro feel to it. You can even play the game in Tate screen mode!

name: Honor and Duty: Arcade Edition
summary: Fast paced, arcade style, FPS action awaits in this World War II based shooter. Traditional FPS gameplay is joined with some elements of RTS base building to provide a unique FPS experience.

name: Hole io: Animals DLC
summary: Wear animal skins and visit new Farm map with your friends!

name: Home World Run
summary: Two baseball playing sisters have been kidnapped by aliens, now they have to use their athletic skills to avoid hazards, solve puzzles, and most importantly bash some slimy creatures to bits in this hand drawn platformer beat-em-up!

name: Home Domes
summary: Explore this life sim on a new planet. Create your new home on the rugged surface of Mars during the early days of colonization inside the safety of your new Dome. Everyday life on a new planet has new challenges and more difficulties of surviving out on the Domestead.

name: Hot Garbage: A Keysmash Story
summary: an interactive fiction game, and #4 in the keysmash series

name: Hong Kong Obscure
summary: Experience the trippy and mysterious world of "Hong Kong Obscure". Armed with a magic flashlight, frisbee, and projectile gun, uncover hidden secrets and hunt down invisible spies in the gritty slums of Hong Kong.

name: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Enjoy the End of the World
summary: Turn-Based RPG set in post-Covid times where you take on an elite secret society that is depopulating the world using Saturnalian Monsters, Military, Hospital and Government personnel to conquer humanity. Satire/Parody/Comedy.

name: Holdfast: Nations At War
summary: Fight on multiple fronts in Holdfast: Nations At War - A multiplayer first and third-person shooter set during the great Napoleonic Era and WW1. Charge into battle with over 150 players per server!

name: Homerun King - Pro Baseball
summary:
Try Multiplay game mode to win 
Compete with global players in Multiplay mode 
 
Let's be the member of national team 
Play with global players and make a contribution to your country! 
 
It's easy and unique. also amazing. 
You can be the MLB major league best homerun King 
 
Act Now!! Let they know you are the real Homerun King!! 
 
 
How far can you hit? 
Homerun is just the beginning 
Play with your friend to get the highest score

name: House of Jigsaw: A Day at the Park
summary: Experience the charm and vibrancy of a leisurely day outdoors with House of Jigsaw: A Day at the Park DLC.

name: Hope Springs Hotel: Whisper Of Winter
summary: April, 2017. Phoenix Wright, a rising defense attorney, arrives at a remote inn called Hope Springs Hotel after receiving a mysterious letter. Once there, Wright finds himself embroiled in a mystery of lies, betrayal and murder. And over the course of the night, he will discover something very sinister about the hotel itself, and the occupants which currently inhabit it...

name: Hold Your Ground
summary: Hold Your Ground is a Virtual Reality Archery Defense game, in which You, the sole defender of your keep, need to hold off multiple waves of increasingly numerous enemies!

name: Hoverbear
summary: You're a thrill seeking bear, equipped with the latest hoverboard technology, it is your mission to go fast and get to the finish line before anyone else. Any tricks performed along the way are at your own risk!

name: Holfraine
summary: Be a part of the most powerful mercenaries of the universe and face your opponents in frenetic PvP online battles to achieve victory.

name: Home Improvement: Power Tool Pursuit!
summary: Home Improvement: Power Tool Pursuit! is an 2D action platformer video game for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System very loosely based on the sitcom Home Improvement.

name: Hood: Outlaws & Legends - Forest Lords Pack
summary: This content requires the base game Hood: Outlaws & Legends on Steam in order to play.Strike down your enemies with four unique outfits and weapon skins to ensure your place among legends.

name: Hoshi wo Miru Hito
summary:
Hoshi wo Miru Hito is a role-playing video game produced and sold exclusively in Japan for the Family Computer in 1987. Published by HOT・B, it is based on their earlier 1984 cyberpunk-themed computer role-playing game Psychic City.

The game is set in a decadent cyberpunk-style future world in which everyone has extrasensory perception. These powers can also be used by the player characters when they confront the various monsters in the game through combat. The eventual target of the game is to defeat the villains. In order to accomplish this, the player's characters must go to the Ark City and eventually to outer space. Unlike the Final Fantasy series, the game does not give the player an automatic "game over" when it is impossible to win the battle. This makes it possible for players to accidentally walk into a walking dead situation every time they are forced to do battle with the game's monsters.

name: Hooked! Again: Real Motion Fishing
summary: Players once again cast, hook, and fight fish as they use their Wii Remote to reel in the big one in Hooked! Again, the sequel to Hooked! Real Motion Fishing. The action takes place on a number of fictional lakes across three modes of play: Practice, Time Attack, and Tournament. Players can also challenge up to three friends online via the Wii's Wi-Fi connection.

name: Hollow Doll
summary: Hollow Doll is a first-person survival horror game set in a post-humanity earth inhabited by remnant "doll" life. Follow the elusive netdiver, Cel, as she chases after the whispers of a dead network known as the Red_Sea. Explore dystopian megastructure locales and exorcise the corrupted ghosts of drowned netdivers bleeding from the Red_Sea.

name: Hockey Player VR
summary: Play hockey in first person view and develop your own tactics and tricks. Finally, a hockey game where you have 100% control. Test out your puck skills in online multiplayer mode.

name: Hot Girls Delivery Club
summary: A silent driver rescues girls from human trafficking. Can he and his operator Greta overcome the main enemy, and find themselves?

name: Hordound
summary: Hordound is a mysterious and prosperous city full of puzzles and mysteries. But the darkness broke out and enveloped the city, hiding it under water.

name: Hopping girl Kohane Jumping Kingdom: Princess of the Black Rabbit
summary: his game is an action puzzle game that the player operates Kohane who rides pogo-stick to aim for a goal.

name: Homeworld 2
summary: Homeworld 2 is the third game in the Homeworld series. Although well-received and praised for its lavish graphics, Homeworld 2 did not receive the same level of acclaim as Homeworld 1 or Cataclysm. Patches and an active modding community has helped keep Homeworld 2 popular until its re-release by Gearbox Software in 2015.

name: Honey Sweet Lies
summary:
Discover the truth - but at what cost?

Honey Sweet Lies is a psychological horror mystery visual novel project. Throughout the game, you have 5 opportunities to ask various characters questions. But, be aware of getting too close to the truth, as some truths can be too hard to handle.

Pay attention to the World Warning System; a sign that you’re getting close to an unwanted truth, and to proceed and make decisions carefully.

name: Hope; or How We Survived
summary: A tower guard protects the town’s survivors but how does he pass the time when not shooting zombies? Hope; or How We Survived is a short, narrative focused game with pick up and play shooting and dialogue mechanics.

name: Hocus Pocus
summary: Terexin, leader of the Council of Wizards, is sending the young sorcerer, Hocus, on a special mission to prove his worthiness.

name: Hole in One Golf
summary: It's a quiet day on the links. You tee up your ball, and drive it 200 yards down the center of the fairway, leaving a 150-yard approach shot. After taking the approach shot, the ball stops rolling 3-feet from the pin. On the green, you sink the relatively easy putt, and you start your round with a birdie. While most golfers never have days like this, they can with HOLE IN ONE GOLF. Get out on three different courses and try to get the lowest score possible. However, the courses are located in rural areas, so you never know when birds, squirrels, or bears will come onto the course and mess with your shots. Try to play the round of your life with HOLE IN ONE GOLF.

name: How to Date an Entity (and stay alive)
summary: This game is a Visual Novel game with a length of about 15 to 20 minutes (per ending—so it actually takes some time to get all of them). It’s about an MC who wakes up in their room and encounters a tall mysterious woman. He must date her to survive. The game incorporates elements of both Dating Sim and analog horror, featuring a total of 10 possible endings. All endings based on "Interest Meter", so you need to be aware of it.

name: Homeless Guy
summary: An out-of-place man wanders into a town with nothing but a photograph. Get employed, invest, join gangs, commit crime, and rise above in this cynical comedy.

name: House of 1000 Doors: The Palm of Zoroaster
summary: Guide Kate Reed as she searches for the artifacts that can break the power of a cursed gem, solves clever puzzles and finds ingeniously hidden objects.

name: Horse Race
summary: Simple, random "horse racing" game for Playdate

name: Hotel Renovator: Five Star Edition
summary: The Hotel Renovator Five Star Edition includes the base game and a pack of 7 DLC to be released in the upcoming months. Expand your inner designer experience with 7 packs featuring amazing decoration items that will make your hotel stand out from the rest.

name: Hop 'n' Marty
summary: Hop 'n' Marty is a retro 3D platformer for the modern age. Journey through sprawling worlds to find all of the collectables and meet the eccentric inhabitants within. Rescue the captured pygmies who have been trapped in cages and bring them back to safety.

name: Horizon Chase 2
summary: Horizon Chase 2 is a classic fast-paced and accessible arcade racing game with a unique art style, thrilling soundtrack, and online multiplayer for all game modes.

name: Hogan's Alley
summary: Hogan's Alley is a 1984 video game by Nintendo. It was one of the first games to use a light gun as an input device. The game presents players with "cardboard cut-outs" of villains and innocent civilians. The player must shoot the villains and spare the innocent people.

name: Holy Wars: Sons of Enoch
summary: Year - 5468 BC. 11 years have passed since the - supposed - defeat of the Golab demons. Under the protection of the angel Azaziel, the 'Holy Knights' order has been watching over the young Arrata kingdom, and over its king, Jonas. But have the Golabs really been eliminated?... It is now time for you to play the heroes of the comic book "Holy Wars" in this exciting fighting/magic/RPG game.

name: Hoshi Ori Yume Mirai: Converted Edition
Horror Story
summary: Demon's World, released in Japan as Horror Story (ホラーストーリー?), is a platformer arcade game that was developed by Toaplan and published by Taito in 1989. This game is multi-regional, meaning that it can be configured for different regions via the DIP switches. These settings change the legal warnings, can display the Taito licensing message and can change the title between the English version (Demon's World) and the Japanese version (Horror Story).

name: Hoptix
summary: Hoptix is a movement playground game where style and speed come easy! Play as Rocket, a cyborg rabbit who is as cute as they are radical. Explore, race, and stunt on rollercoasters and skateparks in idyllic spaces. Share footage of your movement style with your friends.

name: Hot Shots Tennis
summary:
The sixth game, and first tennis spin-off, in the Hot Shots Golf series.

"Finally, a Tennis game for everyone! Filled with classic Hot Shots personality and true tennis gameplay, Hot Shots Tennis delivers an experience both amateurs and pros can enjoy! Play a quirky cast of tennis pros then challenge friends and family in singles or even 4 player doubles matches.

The sport of Tennis will never be the same."

name: Hooking Season
summary: Hooking Season is a chaotic couch competitive new take on the twin stick shooter gameplay, up to four players. Use your hook for maneuvering around the levels, and grabbing your opponents. The more you eat the fatter you get and in this world the fatter the better.

name: Host 714
summary:
In Host 714, you are going to live as Squid, a drug addicted hobo who was invited by a governmental organization, the Orange Institute, to join a drug addiction rehab center with experimental treatment and social reintegration.
Arriving at the Institute on a faraway island, Squid realizes that the proposal was not what they claimed to be. Now you are a test subject, with an uncertain fate. Help our protagonist escape from the Orange Institute in this challenging stealth game!

name: Hook
summary: In this video game adaption of the Steven Spielberg film Hook, the player takes the role of a grown-up Peter Pan, whose kids have been kidnapped by Captain Hook. Tinker Bell takes Peter back to Neverland where he must again become Pan and reclaim his children.

name: House Party: Halloween Holiday Pack
summary: Enjoy spine-chilling seasonal decorations, sinister costumes, creepy critters, and more in House Party's petrifying free Halloween holiday pack. Keep an eye out for ongoing spooky season updates!
